original: @376a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @376a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i dzny'a na badzra sa mu tstsa ya /
analyzed: shr'i dzny'a na badzra sa mu tstsa ya /
translated: Śrī-jñāna-vajra-saṃuccaya.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa /
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa /
translated: The Glorious Compendium of Vajra Wisdom.

original: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Mañjuvajra.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa yis //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa yis //
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: dus gcig tshe na bcom ldan 'das //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: dus gcig tshe na bcom ldan 'das // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
translated: The Blessed One

original: gsang ba'i dbyings su bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbyings su bdag nyid kyis //
translated: In the secret space of all tathāgatas,

original: ye shes ngo bor bzhugs gyur pas //🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: ye shes ngo bor bzhugs gyur pas // sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
translated: Abiding as the essence of wisdom,

original: ro mnyam dam tshig rdo rje nyid //
analyzed: ro mnyam dam tshig rdo rje nyid //
translated: The vajra of samaya equal in taste to the body, speech, and mind of all buddhas,

original: mi byed ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs so /
analyzed: mi byed ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs so /
translated: Enters into the equipoise of non-action samādhi.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni //
translated: Then the bodhisattva

original: sems dpa' chen po byams pa sogs //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po byams pa sogs //
translated: Great beings such as Maitreya,

original: rnams kyis zhus shing gsol btab ni //
analyzed: rnams kyis zhus shing gsol btab ni //
translated: Having requested and supplicated,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus //
translated: Then asked the Blessed One:

original: ma rig pa dang sems byung dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang sems byung dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags //
translated: What is called ignorance, mind, and mental factors?

original: de skad ces ni gsol pa dang // bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi //🔽sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje yi //
analyzed: de skad ces ni gsol pa dang // bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi // sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje yi //
translated: Having made this request,🔽the Blessed One, the nature of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas,

original: bdag nyid can gyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bdag nyid can gyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: said this:

original: rigs kyi bu rnams legs nyon cig /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu rnams legs nyon cig /
translated: “Listen properly, sons of good family!

original: ye shes gsum ni rdo rje las //
analyzed: ye shes gsum ni rdo rje las //
translated: The three pristine consciousnesses are the vajra.

original: byang sems rdo rje de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: byang sems rdo rje de bzhin nyid //
translated: The bodhicitta is the suchness

original: yang dag 'byung ba de yi phyir //
analyzed: yang dag 'byung ba de yi phyir //
translated: that arises from the perfect.

original: ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the vajra of pristine consciousness

original: de yi don ni 'di lta ste //
analyzed: de yi don ni 'di lta ste //
translated: is the meaning of that.

original: @376b ye shes gsum ni dag pa'i sems snang ba gsum gyi 'byung gnas rdo rje las mi phyed pa rlung rig tha mi dad du gnas pa nyid de /
analyzed: @376b ye shes gsum ni dag pa'i sems snang ba gsum gyi 'byung gnas rdo rje las mi phyed pa rlung rig tha mi dad du gnas pa nyid de /
translated: This is the meaning: The three pristine consciousnesses are the vajra that arises from the three appearances of the pure mind, abiding as the indivisible vāyu and vidyā.

original: byang chub sems ni kun rdzob don dam dbyer med pa ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni kun rdzob don dam dbyer med pa ste //
translated: Bodhicitta is the indivisibility of the relative and the ultimate.

original: rdo rje de bzhin nyid ni gded ma nas lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid las yang dag par 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: rdo rje de bzhin nyid ni gded ma nas lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid las yang dag par 'byung ba ni //
translated: Vajra suchness arises from the perfect, the natural, innate dharmatā.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo bde chen /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo bde chen /
translated: The nature of all phenomena is great bliss.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'byung zhing 'jug la gnas pa de'i phyir na //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'byung zhing 'jug la gnas pa de'i phyir na //
translated: Because it arises from, enters, and abides in the vajra body, speech, and mind of the buddhas,

original: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye shes rdo rje rlung sems dbyer med thogs pa med pas khyab cing dbang byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye shes rdo rje rlung sems dbyer med thogs pa med pas khyab cing dbang byed pa nyid do //
translated: all phenomena of samsara and nirvana are pervaded and controlled by the unobstructed vajra wind and mind of timeless awareness, which are inseparable.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa ni //
translated: The transcendent state of all tathagatas

original: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa nyid //
analyzed: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa nyid //
translated: is the nonduality of basic space and timeless awareness.

original: mngon par byang chub nyid las rab 'byung ba //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub nyid las rab 'byung ba //
translated: It arises from manifest enlightenment itself.

original: rlung rig dbyer med pa las dus kun tu //
analyzed: rlung rig dbyer med pa las dus kun tu //
translated: At all times, it arises from the inseparable wind and awareness.

original: snang ba gsum du shar ba 'gag pa med //
analyzed: snang ba gsum du shar ba 'gag pa med //
translated: The three appearances arise without ceasing.

original: de nyid lhan cig skyes par rab rtogs bya //
analyzed: de nyid lhan cig skyes par rab rtogs bya //
translated: One should fully realize that to be coemergent.

original: yang dag don ni zab pa ste //
analyzed: yang dag don ni zab pa ste //
translated: The utterly pure meaning is profound.

original: rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag bshad kyi don la ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag bshad kyi don la ni //
translated: The essence of the vajra is explained to be the utterly pure meaning.

original: gsang ba yang dang byang chub sems //
analyzed: gsang ba yang dang byang chub sems //
translated: The secret is the bodhichitta.

original: rlung sems dbyer med chos nyid las //
analyzed: rlung sems dbyer med chos nyid las //
translated: From the dharmata of the inseparable wind and mind,

original: zab pa mi 'gyur rang rig ni //
analyzed: zab pa mi 'gyur rang rig ni //
translated: the profound, unchanging, and reflexive awareness

original: spros med 'gag pa med cing zhi //
analyzed: spros med 'gag pa med cing zhi //
translated: is free of proliferation, unceasing, and peaceful.

original: skye med mnyam nyid ngar las ni //🔽rtogs pa med kyang rgyu rkyen las //
analyzed: skye med mnyam nyid ngar las ni // rtogs pa med kyang rgyu rkyen las //
translated: From the unborn, uniform nature of things,🔽Consciousness arises through causes and conditions,

original: shes pa ma rig de nyid ni //
analyzed: shes pa ma rig de nyid ni //
translated: Even though there is no conceptualization.

original: 'byung gnas thog ma mtha' ma med //
analyzed: 'byung gnas thog ma mtha' ma med //
translated: It is the source of all things, without beginning or end.

original: de las lhan skyes ma rig pa //
analyzed: de las lhan skyes ma rig pa //
translated: From that, the innate ignorance

original: nye bar thob pa dngos med pa //
analyzed: nye bar thob pa dngos med pa //
translated: Arises, which is the non-apprehension of the non-existent.

original: bdag med thams cad snying po las //🔽snang med pa las ma 'gags pas //
analyzed: bdag med thams cad snying po las // snang med pa las ma 'gags pas //
translated: From the essence of the selflessness of all things,🔽The non-appearance arises, without obstruction.

original: rim pa ma yin 'char ba yang //
analyzed: rim pa ma yin 'char ba yang //
translated: The arising is not gradual.

original: zab pa stong chen por 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: zab pa stong chen por 'byung ba'i //
translated: The profound arises in the great emptiness.

original: ma rig pa las rkyen snang ba //
analyzed: ma rig pa las rkyen snang ba //
translated: From ignorance, the appearances of conditions arise.

original: @377a *// snang ba thob pa mi rtog pa //
analyzed: @377a *// snang ba thob pa mi rtog pa //
translated: The attainment of appearance is non-conceptual.

original: de las rang bzhin sems las byung //
analyzed: de las rang bzhin sems las byung //
translated: From that, the nature arises from the mind.

original: de las snang ba mched pa ste //
analyzed: de las snang ba mched pa ste //
translated: From that, the appearance expands,

original: shin tu gsal zhing stong pa che //
analyzed: shin tu gsal zhing stong pa che //
translated: Very clear and greatly empty.

original: sems las 'byung ba'i rgyan dag ni //
analyzed: sems las 'byung ba'i rgyan dag ni //
translated: The ornaments of mental events

original: rgyu dang mig yul dbang po dag /
analyzed: rgyu dang mig yul dbang po dag /
translated: Are the cause, the eye, the object, and the sense faculty.

original: mtshungs pa'i de ma thag pa las //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i de ma thag pa las //
translated: From the similar immediately preceding conditions,

original: sems zhes bya ba 'byung ba ste //🔽de ni snang ba'i don dang ni //
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba 'byung ba ste // de ni snang ba'i don dang ni //
translated: The so-called mind arises.🔽That is said to be the meaning of appearance

original: stong pa nyid du gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du gsungs pa yin //
translated: And emptiness.

original: sems ni don la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: sems ni don la gnas pa ste //
translated: The mind is the abiding state of the meaning.

original: sems byung bye brag rnam par ston //
analyzed: sems byung bye brag rnam par ston //
translated: The mind’s arising is the display of the distinctions of the mind’s arising.

original: ma rig de nyid chos nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig de nyid chos nyid do //
translated: Ignorance is the dharmatā.

original: chos nyid bdag nyid mi gnas pas //
analyzed: chos nyid bdag nyid mi gnas pas //
translated: The dharmatā does not abide in a self.

original: snang dang stong pa de dag ni //
analyzed: snang dang stong pa de dag ni //
translated: Those appearances and emptinesses

original: gsum gsum spros pa med 'byung ba //
analyzed: gsum gsum spros pa med 'byung ba //
translated: arise without the elaborations of the three sets of three.

original: 'od gsal dang las 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: 'od gsal dang las 'byung ba ste //
translated: They arise from luminosity and karma.

original: gsal bde stong pa dbyer med pas //🔽rdo rje byang sems ngo bor bstan //
analyzed: gsal bde stong pa dbyer med pas // rdo rje byang sems ngo bor bstan //
translated: Since clarity, bliss, and emptiness are inseparable,

original: ces pas bstan te /
analyzed: ces pas bstan te /
translated: they are explained to be the essence of the vajra bodhicitta.

original: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i dus la shin tu ngo mtshar can du ngo mtshar skyes te cang mi smra bar gyur to //
analyzed: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i dus la shin tu ngo mtshar can du ngo mtshar skyes te cang mi smra bar gyur to //
translated: Then, the bodhisattvas, such as Maitreya, were amazed at that time and became silent.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams cang mi smra bar gyur pa gzigs nas bka' stsal pa ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar 'dug /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams cang mi smra bar gyur pa gzigs nas bka' stsal pa ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar 'dug /
translated: Then, the bhagavān, the one who is the nature of the vajra body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas, seeing that those bodhisattvas became silent, said, “Why are you silent?”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis //
translated: Then the great bodhisattvas

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te //
translated: bowed to the Bhagavān’s two feet

original: mgo bos gtugs te gzhan yang zhus pa //
analyzed: mgo bos gtugs te gzhan yang zhus pa //
translated: and, touching their heads [to his feet], asked further:

original: ae ma ho ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: ae ma ho ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: “Emaho, Teacher Vajradhara,

original: rtogs par dka' ba'i rnam shes ni //
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba'i rnam shes ni //
translated: the consciousness that is difficult to realize

original: gsum gyi dbye ba mchog zab pa //
analyzed: gsum gyi dbye ba mchog zab pa //
translated: has the supreme, profound division into three.

original: bcom ldan @377b 'das kyis bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bcom ldan @377b 'das kyis bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain, Bhagavān,

original: bde bar gshegs pas gsung du gsol //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pas gsung du gsol //
translated: please teach, Sugata.”🔽When they had made this request,

original: de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: the Bhagavān replied:

original: gang dag 'od gsal las byung de nyid ni //
analyzed: gang dag 'od gsal las byung de nyid ni //
translated: “That which arises from luminosity

original: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes //
analyzed: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes //
translated: is called mind, mentation, and consciousness.

original: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa ste //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa ste //
translated: It is the root of all phenomena

original: kun nyon mongs dang rnam par byang ba yi //
analyzed: kun nyon mongs dang rnam par byang ba yi //
translated: and is the nature of both affliction and purification.

original: bdag nyid de las rtogs pa gnyis rim byed //
analyzed: bdag nyid de las rtogs pa gnyis rim byed //
translated: From it, the two realizations arise in sequence.

original: rnam shes de yi bzhon pa rlung yin te //
analyzed: rnam shes de yi bzhon pa rlung yin te //
translated: The mount of that consciousness is wind,

original: rlung las me dang me las chu 'byung zhing //
analyzed: rlung las me dang me las chu 'byung zhing //
translated: from wind arises fire, and from fire arises water.

original: chu las sa yang rab tu 'byung bar bshad //
analyzed: chu las sa yang rab tu 'byung bar bshad //
translated: And earth from water, it is taught.🔽The five aggregates, the six sense sources, and the five objects

original: de rnams 'dus las phung po lnga nyid dang // skye mched drug dang yul lngar snang ba gang //
analyzed: de rnams 'dus las phung po lnga nyid dang // skye mched drug dang yul lngar snang ba gang //
translated: That appear from the gathering of those

original: de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste //
translated: Are dependent origination.

original: rlung dang rnam shes nye bar 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: rlung dang rnam shes nye bar 'dres pa'o //
translated: They are a mixture of wind and consciousness.

original: de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyis ni //
analyzed: de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyis ni //
translated: Then, by the three consciousnesses,

original: rang bzhin gyi ni snang bar rab gsal bar //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi ni snang bar rab gsal bar //
translated: The appearances of the nature are fully illuminated.

original: spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed pa'o //
translated: They are experienced in conduct.

original: snang ba'i rgyu 'bras kyis ni rang bzhin rnams //
analyzed: snang ba'i rgyu 'bras kyis ni rang bzhin rnams //
translated: The cause and result of appearances are🔽The nature that arises correctly

original: yang dag par yang rab tu 'byung ba dang // rmi lam sgyu ma ltar ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag par yang rab tu 'byung ba dang // rmi lam sgyu ma ltar ni snang ba'o //
translated: And appears like a dream or an illusion.🔽Moreover, luminosity is without abiding,

original: de yang 'od gsal gnas pa med pa dang // 'gag pa dang ni skye ba med pa ste //
analyzed: de yang 'od gsal gnas pa med pa dang // 'gag pa dang ni skye ba med pa ste //
translated: Without cessation or birth,

original: don dam bden pa yang dag pa yi mtha'//
analyzed: don dam bden pa yang dag pa yi mtha'//
translated: The ultimate truth, the perfect limit.

original: de las 'byung ba mun pa'i snang ba ni //
analyzed: de las 'byung ba mun pa'i snang ba ni //
translated: The appearance of darkness that arises from that

original: 'gog pa ma rig pa zhes bya bar bstan //
analyzed: 'gog pa ma rig pa zhes bya bar bstan //
translated: Is taught to be the cessation of ignorance.

original: de yi rang bzhin snang ba dang // 'khrul dang rnam par g-yeng ba dang // dran pa med dang le lo dang // mi smra ba dang mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin snang ba dang // 'khrul dang rnam par g-yeng ba dang // dran pa med dang le lo dang // mi smra ba dang mi gsal ba'o //
translated: silence, and obscurity.

original: ma rig pa yang sems las byung ba ste //
analyzed: ma rig pa yang sems las byung ba ste //
translated: Ignorance is also a mental factor.

original: ngo bo chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa //
analyzed: ngo bo chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa //
translated: Its essence is the non-conceptual dharmatā.

original: mar me ltar 'bar snang ba nyer thob las //
analyzed: mar me ltar 'bar snang ba nyer thob las //
translated: Like a burning lamp, appearance arises from attainment.

original: rlung gi khams nyid phra bar 'jug @378a *//
analyzed: rlung gi khams nyid phra bar 'jug @378a *//
translated: The subtle wind element enters,

original: pas ni // ma ning ltar ni shes dang mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: pas ni // ma ning ltar ni shes dang mi gsal ba'o //
translated: like a neuter, with unclear cognition.🔽It is taught to be like the light of the sun,

original: nyi ma'i snang ba lta bur bstan pa dang // shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu lta bu ste //
analyzed: nyi ma'i snang ba lta bur bstan pa dang // shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu lta bu ste //
translated: and like a very clear mirage.🔽Its nature is attachment, joy,

original: de yi rang bzhin chags dang dga' ba dang // mchog tu dga' dang drag po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin chags dang dga' ba dang // mchog tu dga' dang drag po la sogs pa'o //
translated: supreme joy, wrath, and so on.🔽The relative is taught by direct perception,🔽the form of the arisen one, the assembly of father deities,

original: kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyis bstan dang // skyes pa'i gzugs dang yab lha'i tshogs dag dang // mtshan ma rdo rje zhes ni rang brtags pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyis bstan dang // skyes pa'i gzugs dang yab lha'i tshogs dag dang // mtshan ma rdo rje zhes ni rang brtags pa'o //
translated: and the imagined vajra sign.

original: sems las sems zhes bshad pa yin //
analyzed: sems las sems zhes bshad pa yin //
translated: The mind is explained as the mind.

original: zla ba'i snang dang shin tu gsal ba ste //
analyzed: zla ba'i snang dang shin tu gsal ba ste //
translated: And the appearance of the moon, and very clear,

original: chu yi zla ba lta bur bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba lta bur bstan pa'o //
translated: Is taught to be like the moon in the water.

original: rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature is freedom from attachment and so forth.

original: kun rdzob tu gsal ba las /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu gsal ba las /
translated: From the clarity in the relative,

original: bud med dang / bha ga dang / padma dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o //
analyzed: bud med dang / bha ga dang / padma dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o //
translated: The symbols of the woman, the bhaga, the lotus, and the host of goddesses arise.

original: 'dir chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dir chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Here, in order to teach the mode of being of all phenomena,

original: gang dag 'od gsal las byung de nyid ni chos nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal dbyings las /
analyzed: gang dag 'od gsal las byung de nyid ni chos nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal dbyings las /
translated: That which arises from luminosity is the dharmatā, the naturally pure dhātu.

original: rig pa rtog med kyi shes pa phra ba'i rlung dang lhan cig tu 'byung bas na /
analyzed: rig pa rtog med kyi shes pa phra ba'i rlung dang lhan cig tu 'byung bas na /
translated: Since the subtle vāyu of nonconceptual vidyā arises together,

original: sems ni kun gzhi'o //
analyzed: sems ni kun gzhi'o //
translated: The mind is the all-basis.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni spro ba dang sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni spro ba dang sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: The mental consciousness is that which emanates and gathers.

original: rnam par shes pa ni tshogs brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni tshogs brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The consciousness is endowed with the eight collections.

original: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni //
translated: The root of all phenomena

original: byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba rdo rje nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid do //🔽sa bon ma dag pa las 'gro ba 'khrul pa kun nas nyon mongs par snang la /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba rdo rje nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid do // sa bon ma dag pa las 'gro ba 'khrul pa kun nas nyon mongs par snang la /
translated: The unchanging mind of awakening is the uniformity of the vajra that is equal to space.🔽From the impure seed, migrating beings appear as the all-conflicting emotions of delusion.

original: bag chags dag las 'khrul pa las log pa /
analyzed: bag chags dag las 'khrul pa las log pa /
translated: From the pure traces, delusion is reversed.

original: rnam par byang ba nyid du yang dag par snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba nyid du yang dag par snang ba'o //
translated: It is the pure appearances of purification.

original: phyi @378b rol pas btags pa'i tha snyad sna tshogs pa bdag tu btags pa de las /
analyzed: phyi @378b rol pas btags pa'i tha snyad sna tshogs pa bdag tu btags pa de las /
translated: The various designations of the external designations of self are

original: rtog pa gnyis su gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rtog pa gnyis su gyur pa ste /
translated: the two concepts.

original: gzung 'dzin du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin du 'byung ba'o //
translated: They arise as percepts and perceivers.

original: bdag dang gzhan ni bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin pa gnyis su btags pas /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan ni bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin pa gnyis su btags pas /
translated: Since self and other are designated as the two apprehensions of self and entities,

original: dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa /
analyzed: dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa /
translated: they are apprehended as entities and signs.

original: sems su rig par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: sems su rig par byed pa nyid do //
translated: They are known as the mind.

original: de las rnam par shes pa nyid du snang /
analyzed: de las rnam par shes pa nyid du snang /
translated: From that, consciousness itself appears.

original: de nyid du chos nyid kyi rlung las /
analyzed: de nyid du chos nyid kyi rlung las /
translated: From the wind of dharmatā itself,

original: 'od snang rang byung gi snang bar shar ba'o //
analyzed: 'od snang rang byung gi snang bar shar ba'o //
translated: the appearances of light arise as self-originated appearances.

original: der las rlung las kun tu g-yo bas /
analyzed: der las rlung las kun tu g-yo bas /
translated: Since the karma vāyu moves there,

original: chags pa las me byung /
analyzed: chags pa las me byung /
translated: from attachment, fire arises.

original: bsrub pa las zhe sdang gi chu snang /
analyzed: bsrub pa las zhe sdang gi chu snang /
translated: The water element of anger appears from churning.

original: drod gsher las gti mug gi sa'i khams bskyed cing /
analyzed: drod gsher las gti mug gi sa'i khams bskyed cing /
translated: The earth element of ignorance is generated from warmth and moisture.

original: der 'byung ba lnga lhan cig tu tshogs shing 'dus pa las /
analyzed: der 'byung ba lnga lhan cig tu tshogs shing 'dus pa las /
translated: The five elements gather and assemble together there.

original: rtsa kun gzhi'i rig pa snying ga tsam du brten te /
analyzed: rtsa kun gzhi'i rig pa snying ga tsam du brten te /
translated: The nāḍī of the all-basis is supported in the heart.

original: de las gzung 'dzin du 'khrul pa las /
analyzed: de las gzung 'dzin du 'khrul pa las /
translated: From that, there is delusion as an object and a subject.

original: de rnams 'dus pa las phung po lnga dang ni skye mched drug dang yul lngar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams 'dus pa las phung po lnga dang ni skye mched drug dang yul lngar snang ba ste /
translated: From the gathering of those, the five aggregates, the six sense bases, and the five objects appear.

original: de nyid rlung dang rnam shes tha dad med par nye bar 'dres pas /
analyzed: de nyid rlung dang rnam shes tha dad med par nye bar 'dres pas /
translated: Since those are inseparable from the vāyu and the consciousness,

original: 'gag pa med pa kun tu snang ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa kun tu snang ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid du'o //
translated: they are unceasing, all-illuminating dependent origination.

original: chos nyid rtog med kyi ngang las /
analyzed: chos nyid rtog med kyi ngang las /
translated: From the state of nonconceptual dharmatā,

original: rlung dang lhan cig tu 'byung bas /
analyzed: rlung dang lhan cig tu 'byung bas /
translated: since the vāyu arises together with the consciousness,

original: srid pa bar dor yul lha spyod tshul ni /🔽de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi ni /
analyzed: srid pa bar dor yul lha spyod tshul ni / de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi ni /
translated: the way the object is experienced in the bardo of existence is as follows:

original: rkyen las 'char ba'i snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa ste /
analyzed: rkyen las 'char ba'i snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa ste /
translated: Then, the appearances that arise from the condition of the three consciousnesses are the appearance, the increase of the appearance, and the culmination of the appearance.

original: rgyu'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa dang / dbang po bdag po dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa las /🔽mngon par 'byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa dang / dbang po bdag po dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa las / mngon par 'byung ba /
translated: The causes are the causal condition, the objective condition, the dominant condition, and the immediate condition.🔽The nature of the appearance of the three appearances is the arising of the three appearances.🔽The nature of the three appearances is the appearance of the nature of the three concepts.

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba /
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba /
translated: The nature of the three concepts is the appearance of the nature of the three ignorances.🔽The nature of the three ignorances is the appearance of the nature of the three kāyas.

original: rang bzhin sum cu rtsa @379a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin sum cu rtsa @379a *//
translated: The nature of the three kāyas is the appearance of the nature of the three pristine consciousnesses.🔽The nature of the three pristine consciousnesses is the appearance of the nature of the three lights.🔽The nature of the three lights is the appearance of the nature of the three pristine consciousnesses.🔽The nature of the three pristine consciousnesses is the appearance of the nature of the three kāyas.

original: gsum dang / mtshan nyid bzhi bcu dang ma rig pa'i skad cig ma bdun du rab tu gsal bar nyin dang mtshan du spyod pas /
analyzed: gsum dang / mtshan nyid bzhi bcu dang ma rig pa'i skad cig ma bdun du rab tu gsal bar nyin dang mtshan du spyod pas /
translated: The nature of the three kāyas is the appearance of the nature of the three ignorances.🔽The nature of the three ignorances is the appearance of the nature of the three concepts.🔽The nature of the three concepts is the appearance of the nature of the three appearances.

original: rjes su nyams su myong bar byed pa ma dag pa'i dus so //🔽yang rlung dal zhing rig pa cung zad gnas pa'i tshe /🔽snang ba gsum gyi rgyu 'bras thams cad sgyu ma lta bur gyur pas //
analyzed: rjes su nyams su myong bar byed pa ma dag pa'i dus so // yang rlung dal zhing rig pa cung zad gnas pa'i tshe / snang ba gsum gyi rgyu 'bras thams cad sgyu ma lta bur gyur pas //
translated: The nature of the three appearances is the arising of the three appearances.🔽The nature of the arising of the three appearances is the appearance of the nature of the three lights.🔽The nature of the three lights is the appearance of the nature of the three pristine consciousnesses.🔽The nature of the three pristine consciousnesses is the appearance of the nature of the three kāyas.

original: rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad ye shes kyi ngang du rang dag rang zhi rang sar grol bas /
analyzed: rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad ye shes kyi ngang du rang dag rang zhi rang sar grol bas /
translated: The nature of the three kāyas is the appearance of the nature of the three ignorances.🔽The nature of the three ignorances is the appearance of the nature of the three concepts.🔽The nature of the three concepts is the appearance of the nature of the three appearances.

original: yang dag par rab tu 'byung ba /
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu 'byung ba /
translated: The nature of the three appearances is the arising of the three appearances.🔽The nature of the arising of the three appearances is the appearance of the nature of the three lights.🔽The nature of the three lights is the appearance of the nature of the three pristine consciousnesses.🔽The nature of the three pristine consciousnesses is the appearance of the nature of the three kāyas.🔽The nature of the three kāyas is the appearance of the nature of the three ignorances.🔽The nature of the three ignorances is the appearance of the nature of the three concepts.

original: de bzhin nyid du bde ba /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du bde ba /
translated: The nature

original: gsal ba / stong zhing bdag med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'char bas //
analyzed: gsal ba / stong zhing bdag med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'char bas //
translated: The nonconceptual wisdom of clarity, emptiness, and selflessness arises.

original: bag chags rnam par dag pa'i bar dor rmi lam gyi bar dor lus ngag sgyu ma ltar kun tu snang ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags rnam par dag pa'i bar dor rmi lam gyi bar dor lus ngag sgyu ma ltar kun tu snang ba'o //
translated: In the bardo of purification of habitual patterns, the illusory body appears like a dream in the bardo of dreams.

original: sgyu lus kyi snang ba de nyid kun rdzob kyi spyod pa dag par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgyu lus kyi snang ba de nyid kun rdzob kyi spyod pa dag par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to purify the relative conduct, that appearance of the illusory body

original: de yang 'od gsal ba la rab tu 'jug pas ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su gzhig pa'i bsam gtan gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dri ma rnam par dag pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de yang 'od gsal ba la rab tu 'jug pas ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su gzhig pa'i bsam gtan gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dri ma rnam par dag pa'i tshe /
translated: enters luminosity. When the stains of coemergence are purified by the meditative absorptions of total apprehension and subsequent destruction,

original: gang la yang gnas pa med pa dang / chos rnams kun la 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med cing /🔽skye ba med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la yang gnas pa med pa dang / chos rnams kun la 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med cing / skye ba med pa ste /
translated: there is no abiding in anything, no cessation of any phenomena, and no abiding or arising.

original: spros med don dam pa'i bden pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i don //
analyzed: spros med don dam pa'i bden pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i don //
translated: The ultimate truth free of elaborations is the meaning of nonabiding.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' snang ba med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' snang ba med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The limit of reality is called “nonappearance.”

original: de nyid las ni lugs las bzlog gyur pa'i //
analyzed: de nyid las ni lugs las bzlog gyur pa'i //
translated: From that, the reverse process

original: mun pa lta bu'i snang ba pra rlung las //
analyzed: mun pa lta bu'i snang ba pra rlung las //
translated: The appearance that is like darkness is taught to be

original: 'gog pa ma rig pa zhes bya bar bstan //
analyzed: 'gog pa ma rig pa zhes bya bar bstan //
translated: the cessation called ignorance.🔽Its nature is the arising of appearances,🔽delusion, distraction, doubt,🔽forgetfulness, laziness,

original: de yi rang bzhin snang ba 'byung ba dang // 'khrul dang rnam g-yeng the tshom dang / @379b brjed ngas pa dang le lo dang // mi smra gyur dang skyo gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin snang ba 'byung ba dang // 'khrul dang rnam g-yeng the tshom dang / @379b brjed ngas pa dang le lo dang // mi smra gyur dang skyo gyur pa'o //
translated: silence, and discouragement.

original: ma rig pa yang sems las byung ba ste //
analyzed: ma rig pa yang sems las byung ba ste //
translated: Ignorance also arises from the mind.

original: snang ba nyer thob mar me ltar 'bar las //
analyzed: snang ba nyer thob mar me ltar 'bar las //
translated: From the appearance that is about to be attained,

original: ngo bo chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa //
analyzed: ngo bo chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa //
translated: the essence, the dharmatā, is nonconceptual.

original: rlung gi khams nyid phra bar 'jug pas ni //
analyzed: rlung gi khams nyid phra bar 'jug pas ni //
translated: Since the subtle element of air moves,

original: ma ning ltar ni shes pa ma g-yos pa'o //
analyzed: ma ning ltar ni shes pa ma g-yos pa'o //
translated: the neutral state is the nonmoving consciousness.

original: padma 'dab brgyad lte bar ldan pa la //
analyzed: padma 'dab brgyad lte bar ldan pa la //
translated: In the center of the eight-petaled lotus,

original: stong pa bzhi bcas ma ning yi ge gnas //
analyzed: stong pa bzhi bcas ma ning yi ge gnas //
translated: the neutral syllable of the four empty states

original: hr'i:ni thig le ldan pa dbus su dmigs //
analyzed: hr'i:ni thig le ldan pa dbus su dmigs //
translated: is visualized in the center, endowed with a bindu.

original: snang ba thob pa nyid kyi don 'di'o //🔽snang ba mched pa nyi ma lta bur bstan //
analyzed: snang ba thob pa nyid kyi don 'di'o // snang ba mched pa nyi ma lta bur bstan //
translated: This is the meaning of the attainment of appearance.🔽The increase of appearance is explained to be like the sun.

original: shin tu gsal ba smig rgyu lta bu ste //
analyzed: shin tu gsal ba smig rgyu lta bu ste //
translated: The very clear [appearance] is like a mirage.

original: de yi rang bzhin 'dod chags dga' ba dang // mchog tu dga' ba drag po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin 'dod chags dga' ba dang // mchog tu dga' ba drag po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Its nature is desire, joy, supreme joy, and passion, and so forth.🔽The sign is taught by direct perception in the relative,

original: kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyis bstan dang // skyes pa'i gzugs dang lha yi tshogs dag la //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyis bstan dang // skyes pa'i gzugs dang lha yi tshogs dag la //
translated: the form of the born one, and the assembly of deities.

original: mtshan ma rdo rje zhes ni rang brtags pa'o //🔽padma de nyid lte bar nyi ma'i dal //
analyzed: mtshan ma rdo rje zhes ni rang brtags pa'o // padma de nyid lte bar nyi ma'i dal //
translated: The vajra is imagined in the lotus.🔽In the center of the sun maṇḍala in the navel of that lotus,

original: dbus su rdo rje thig le ldan pa la //
analyzed: dbus su rdo rje thig le ldan pa la //
translated: there is a vajra drop.

original: k'a li gsal byed yi ge sum cu bdun //
analyzed: k'a li gsal byed yi ge sum cu bdun //
translated: The thirty-seven ka and ali letters

original: snang ba mched pa de nyid gsal ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba mched pa de nyid gsal ba'o //
translated: are the appearance of the clear light.

original: sems las byung ba la ni sems zhes bshad //
analyzed: sems las byung ba la ni sems zhes bshad //
translated: Mental factors are explained as the mind.

original: rgyu ba'i snang ba rab tu gsal ba ste //
analyzed: rgyu ba'i snang ba rab tu gsal ba ste //
translated: The appearance of movement is very clear,

original: chu yi zla ba lta bur bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba lta bur bstan pa'o //
translated: taught to be like the moon in the water.

original: rang bzhin chags pa dang bral la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin chags pa dang bral la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature is free from attachment, and so forth.🔽The relative appearance is the symbol of the assembly of goddesses,

original: kun rdzob gsal ba las ni bud med dang // bha ga padma lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob gsal ba las ni bud med dang // bha ga padma lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o //
translated: the bhaga lotus, and the women.

original: snga ma ltar las zla dbus padmar bcas //
analyzed: snga ma ltar las zla dbus padmar bcas //
translated: As before, in the center of the moon, there is a lotus.

original: dbyangs yig phyogs su brkyang ba 'od 'bar ba //
analyzed: dbyangs yig phyogs su brkyang ba 'od 'bar ba //
translated: The vowels are extended in the directions, blazing with light.

original: mtshams su zung bcas bcu gnyis rim par dgod //
analyzed: mtshams su zung bcas bcu gnyis rim par dgod //
translated: Sometimes, the twelve pairs are arranged in sequence.

original: gsang sngags 'khor lo rim pa kun rdzogs byed //🔽dmigs bcas bzlas pa sems @380a *//
analyzed: gsang sngags 'khor lo rim pa kun rdzogs byed // dmigs bcas bzlas pa sems @380a *//
translated: The wheel of the mantra is completely perfected in stages.

original: gsum sgyu mar 'char //
analyzed: gsum sgyu mar 'char //
translated: The visualization and repetition arise as the three illusory minds.

original: 'od gsal ye shes ngang las zung 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ye shes ngang las zung 'jug pa'o //
translated: From the state of the wisdom of clear light, there is union.

original: snang ba mched pa bde ba ste //
analyzed: snang ba mched pa bde ba ste //
translated: The appearance of increase is bliss.

original: gzung du med pas chags zhen bral //
analyzed: gzung du med pas chags zhen bral //
translated: Since it is ungraspable, it is free from attachment and clinging.

original: nyi ma ltar gsal ngang gis bde //
analyzed: nyi ma ltar gsal ngang gis bde //
translated: Like the sun, it is naturally clear and bright.

original: 'gro 'ong gnas nyid skad cig ma //
analyzed: 'gro 'ong gnas nyid skad cig ma //
translated: The coming, going, and abiding are momentary.

original: mtshan ma bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: mtshan ma bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin //
translated: The samādhi free from signs

original: go 'byed mun pa 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: go 'byed mun pa 'joms pa'o //
translated: opens up and conquers darkness.

original: snang ba thob pa'i ye shes sems //
analyzed: snang ba thob pa'i ye shes sems //
translated: The wisdom mind that obtains the appearance

original: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid can //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid can //
translated: has the nature of nonconceptuality.

original: ma rig de nyid rnam dag pa //
analyzed: ma rig de nyid rnam dag pa //
translated: That ignorance is pure

original: mun ba med cing snang ba bral //
analyzed: mun ba med cing snang ba bral //
translated: in the absence of darkness and the absence of appearances.

original: sgron ma ltar 'char lhun grub pa //
analyzed: sgron ma ltar 'char lhun grub pa //
translated: Like a lamp, it arises as natural perfection.

original: g-yo med mi g-yo rnam dag pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo med mi g-yo rnam dag pa'o //
translated: It is motionless, unmoving, and completely pure.

original: gnas med chos nyid ngang du dag /
analyzed: gnas med chos nyid ngang du dag /
translated: It is pure in the state of the dharmatā without location.🔽The emptiness, the great emptiness,

original: stong dang stong pa chen po dang // shin tu stong pa dngos med pa //
analyzed: stong dang stong pa chen po dang // shin tu stong pa dngos med pa //
translated: the utter emptiness, and the absence of things🔽are the four emptinesses.

original: thams cad stong pa zag pa med //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa zag pa med //
translated: Everything is empty, without outflows.

original: nye bar thob pa snang med pa //
analyzed: nye bar thob pa snang med pa //
translated: The attainment is without appearances.

original: mkha' ltar dag pa 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: mkha' ltar dag pa 'od gsal ba //
translated: Pure like space, it is clear light.

original: mnyam med gnyis med phyag rgya che //
analyzed: mnyam med gnyis med phyag rgya che //
translated: The great seal is incomparable, nondual.

original: lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi dbyings //
translated: The innate is the dharmadhātu.

original: lhag mthong dmigs pa kun las 'das //
analyzed: lhag mthong dmigs pa kun las 'das //
translated: Vipaśyanā transcends all reference.

original: kun khyab zhi ba spros med pa //
analyzed: kun khyab zhi ba spros med pa //
translated: Pervasive, peaceful, and unelaborate,

original: stong nyid ngang las rtog pa dang // mi rtog mtha' las 'das pa ste //
analyzed: stong nyid ngang las rtog pa dang // mi rtog mtha' las 'das pa ste //
translated: It is emptiness, beyond thought and nonthought.

original: chos nyid zab dang rgya che ba'i //
analyzed: chos nyid zab dang rgya che ba'i //
translated: The profound and vast reality

original: rgya mtsho chen po rang dngos la //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po rang dngos la //
translated: Is the great ocean of one’s own nature.

original: rtsa shing g-yo bcas sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: rtsa shing g-yo bcas sna tshogs pa //
translated: The roots and trees, moving and various,

original: steng du lhung zhing 'gro 'ong nyid //
analyzed: steng du lhung zhing 'gro 'ong nyid //
translated: Fall above and come and go.

original: du mas khebs shing bskyod gyur kyang //
analyzed: du mas khebs shing bskyod gyur kyang //
translated: Though covered by many and shaken,

original: rtog med rang bzhin gnas med pas //
analyzed: rtog med rang bzhin gnas med pas //
translated: It is nonconceptual, without a place to stay.

original: ro gcig 'gyur med mkha' ltar ro //
analyzed: ro gcig 'gyur med mkha' ltar ro //
translated: It is of one taste, unchanging, like space.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o ////
translated: This is the first chapter of the glorious Wisdom Vajra Compendium.

original: rnal 'byor lus @380b nyid sgyu ma rmi lam ltar //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lus @380b nyid sgyu ma rmi lam ltar //
translated: The yogi’s body is like an illusion or a dream.

original: gnas lus nges par 'gyur ba de nyid las //
analyzed: gnas lus nges par 'gyur ba de nyid las //
translated: From that very [state] the body and place are definitely transformed.

original: rdo rje padma yang dag par sbyor ba shes rab kyi ye shes rab tu 'byung ba las rang gi rdo rje sbyor ba las me'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padma yang dag par sbyor ba shes rab kyi ye shes rab tu 'byung ba las rang gi rdo rje sbyor ba las me'o //
translated: From the union of the vajra and lotus, the wisdom of wisdom arises. From the union of one's vajra, fire arises.

original: me las chu /
analyzed: me las chu /
translated: From fire, water arises.

original: chu las nur nur po rnams dang / de nas mer mer po rnams dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor po dag go /
analyzed: chu las nur nur po rnams dang / de nas mer mer po rnams dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor po dag go /
translated: From water, the kalala, arbuda, peśin, and ghana stages arise.

original: de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba las te /
analyzed: de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba las te /
translated: Then, from the appearance of passion,

original: khrag gi gong bu las mkhrang 'gyur rnams so //
analyzed: khrag gi gong bu las mkhrang 'gyur rnams so //
translated: from the mass of blood, the flesh stage arises.

original: khyab 'jug rus sbal gyi rnam pa can de dag pha ma'i khu khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: khyab 'jug rus sbal gyi rnam pa can de dag pha ma'i khu khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o //
translated: Viṣṇu in the form of a tortoise generates those from the parents' semen and blood.

original: de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i chags pa las /
analyzed: de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i chags pa las /
translated: Then, from the passion of the union of the two organs,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba bar ma'i cha las shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba bar ma'i cha las shes par bya ste /
translated: one should understand from the part of passion and the part of the middle of passion.

original: de las rtsva rnams lus la mngon par 'byung ba /
analyzed: de las rtsva rnams lus la mngon par 'byung ba /
translated: From that, the grasses appear on the body.

original: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa /
analyzed: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa /
translated: [They] have seventy-two thousand [channels].

original: kun 'dar ma dang / ro ma dang / rkyang ma dang / lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo dang / gsang ba dang / mdzod spu'i 'khor lo dag dang / yang na sum cu gnyis dang / rtsa kha gsum pa dang /
analyzed: kun 'dar ma dang / ro ma dang / rkyang ma dang / lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo dang / gsang ba dang / mdzod spu'i 'khor lo dag dang / yang na sum cu gnyis dang / rtsa kha gsum pa dang /
translated: the channel of the all-embracing, the channel of taste, the channel of the solitary, the navel, the heart, the throat, the crown, the secret place, and the channel wheel of the point between the eyebrows, or else the thirty-two channel wheels, the three channel openings,

original: rtsa lu gu rgyud dang / rtsa ba'i mig lta bu dang / rtsa bar ta ka rin po che'i pho brang dang / rtsa rig ba'i gnas dang / gzhu chen gyi dbyibs dang / bde skyong nor bu'i 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: rtsa lu gu rgyud dang / rtsa ba'i mig lta bu dang / rtsa bar ta ka rin po che'i pho brang dang / rtsa rig ba'i gnas dang / gzhu chen gyi dbyibs dang / bde skyong nor bu'i 'khor lo ste //
translated: the channel of the chain, the channel like the eye of a needle, the channel palace of the precious vase, the channel of the abode of awareness, the shape of a great bow, and the channel wheel of the jewel of the sustaining bliss.

original: dbyibs tha dad dum las yi ge'i rnam pa sogs srog tu gyur pa snying por gnas pa las /
analyzed: dbyibs tha dad dum las yi ge'i rnam pa sogs srog tu gyur pa snying por gnas pa las /
translated: From the essence of the life-force, which is the shape of the syllables and so forth, in the different shapes of the segments,

original: khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba'i rgyud dpag tu med pa las skyon dang yon tan mtha' dag gi rten can te /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba'i rgyud dpag tu med pa las skyon dang yon tan mtha' dag gi rten can te /
translated: the basis of all faults and qualities of the immeasurable mind streams of beings of the three realms exists.

original: de'i phyir lus dang lus las @381a *//
analyzed: de'i phyir lus dang lus las @381a *//
translated: Therefore, the body and the mind are inseparable.

original: 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'char ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsung gi bzlas pa'i phyir phyag rgya dang / bsgom pa'i phyag rgya gsum du gyur pa dang / a'a li k'a li las yang dag par 'byung ba'i sngags dang sems kyi thabs su gyur pa shes rab dang /🔽mi phyed pas bde ba chen po ltar dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'char ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsung gi bzlas pa'i phyir phyag rgya dang / bsgom pa'i phyag rgya gsum du gyur pa dang / a'a li k'a li las yang dag par 'byung ba'i sngags dang sems kyi thabs su gyur pa shes rab dang / mi phyed pas bde ba chen po ltar dmigs pa'o //
translated: The method of the mantra that arises from the alikāli and the wisdom of the mind are visualized as the great bliss of indivisibility.

original: yab yum bsrubs pa'i bde bde nyid las //
analyzed: yab yum bsrubs pa'i bde bde nyid las //
translated: The great bliss of the churning of the father and mother

original: gnas skabs dag las rigs kyi cha thob pa //
analyzed: gnas skabs dag las rigs kyi cha thob pa //
translated: is the attainment of the portion of the family from the occasion.

original: mngon par byang chub ye shes lngar 'byung las //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub ye shes lngar 'byung las //
translated: The five gnoses arise from the manifest enlightenment

original: lus rdzogs 'byung bas bya ba byed 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: lus rdzogs 'byung bas bya ba byed 'gyur ba'o //
translated: and the body is complete, arising as the agent of activity.🔽All phenomena are accomplished as the self,

original: chos rnams kun ni bdag tu bsgrub pa dang // bdag ni lhar bsgrub lha nyid ye shes so //
analyzed: chos rnams kun ni bdag tu bsgrub pa dang // bdag ni lhar bsgrub lha nyid ye shes so //
translated: the self is accomplished as the deity, and the deity is gnosis.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dbang po gnyis thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dbang po gnyis thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The method is the two, the object and the sense organ, such as form and so on.

original: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni /
translated: The union of the vajra and lotus

original: sems dang sems las 'byung bdag gi thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems las 'byung bdag gi thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The mind and mental factors are the means for the self.

original: sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thabs shes rab ro mnyam par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thabs shes rab ro mnyam par gyur pa'o //
translated: The sameness of the mind and mental factors in the samadhi of great bliss is the union of means and wisdom.

original: de sgyu ma lta bu'i dpe nye bar mtshon te /
analyzed: de sgyu ma lta bu'i dpe nye bar mtshon te /
translated: That is illustrated by the example of an illusion.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+g'a'i bye ma snyed kyi zhing khams rnams //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+g'a'i bye ma snyed kyi zhing khams rnams //
translated: Then the tathagatas of the realms of the sand of the Ganges

original: sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
translated: are like an illusion, a reflection in water, a mirage, a dream, an echo, a gandharva city, an optical illusion, a rainbow, a flash of lightning, a water bubble, and a reflection in a mirror.

original: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis /
translated: The twelve examples of illusion

original: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon pa'i tshul lo //🔽rdo rje lus kyi rtsa dang @381b rlung //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon pa'i tshul lo // rdo rje lus kyi rtsa dang @381b rlung //
translated: are the way to illustrate the samadhi of great bliss.🔽The channels, winds,

original: yi ge thig le gnas bdag /
analyzed: yi ge thig le gnas bdag /
translated: and syllables of the vajra body are the self.

original: dbyangs dang gsal byed tshogs rnams las //
analyzed: dbyangs dang gsal byed tshogs rnams las //
translated: From the collection of vowels and consonants,

original: thabs dang shes rab ro mnyam 'char //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ro mnyam 'char //
translated: The taste of method and wisdom arises equally.

original: gsal dang bde ba brten pa nyid //
analyzed: gsal dang bde ba brten pa nyid //
translated: Clarity, bliss, and stability

original: mi rtog chos nyid ngang las ni //
analyzed: mi rtog chos nyid ngang las ni //
translated: From the state of non-conceptual dharmatā,

original: rlung ngang shes pa mnyam du yang //
analyzed: rlung ngang shes pa mnyam du yang //
translated: The vāyu and consciousness are equal

original: 'byung 'jug gnas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'byung 'jug gnas pa nyid yin no //
translated: In exhalation, inhalation, and abiding.

original: chos nyid snang ba kun gzhi ste //
analyzed: chos nyid snang ba kun gzhi ste //
translated: Dharmatā appearances are the all-basis.

original: rnam shes ma bcos rang gsal ba //🔽sgrib med rang byung kun tu ni //
analyzed: rnam shes ma bcos rang gsal ba // sgrib med rang byung kun tu ni //
translated: Unfabricated consciousness is naturally clear.🔽Unimpeded, self-originated, and all-pervading,

original: g-yo bcas 'gyur med kun tu ni //
analyzed: g-yo bcas 'gyur med kun tu ni //
translated: The moving and unchanging are all-pervading.

original: de nyid gnas brten gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gnas brten gyur pa'o //
translated: That is the support of the abodes.

original: rnam pa sems byung 'char ba yang //
analyzed: rnam pa sems byung 'char ba yang //
translated: The arising of the aspects and mental events🔽Is manifold, with a nature of sequence

original: du ma nyid ni go rims dang // go rims med pa'i rang bzhin rnams //
analyzed: du ma nyid ni go rims dang // go rims med pa'i rang bzhin rnams //
translated: And no sequence.🔽The proliferation of thoughts arises as three:

original: rtog pa'i 'du 'phro rkyen gyis bsgyur chags bral gsum du 'byung ba nyid //
analyzed: rtog pa'i 'du 'phro rkyen gyis bsgyur chags bral gsum du 'byung ba nyid //
translated: Free from attachment, free from attachment, and free from attachment.🔽Mental activity is coming and going,

original: yid la byed pa 'gro 'ong dang // rig brgod par byed dang yid 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa 'gro 'ong dang // rig brgod par byed dang yid 'byung ba'o //
translated: Excitement, and mental agitation.

original: mya ngam gsum ni ma dad pa //
analyzed: mya ngam gsum ni ma dad pa //
translated: The three wastes are lack of faith,

original: zhe sdang med bas zhi bar gnas //
analyzed: zhe sdang med bas zhi bar gnas //
translated: And abiding in peace through non-aversion.

original: kun tu rtog pa khong khro ba //
analyzed: kun tu rtog pa khong khro ba //
translated: The three are: imagination, anger,🔽and fear.

original: 'jigs pa tsam mo 'tshig pa ste //🔽reg pa khre bo'i spyod pa dang // 'khon du 'dzin nyid 'jigs chen po //
analyzed: 'jigs pa tsam mo 'tshig pa ste // reg pa khre bo'i spyod pa dang // 'khon du 'dzin nyid 'jigs chen po //
translated: The three are: touch, harshness,🔽and enmity.

original: sred pa che 'bring gsum 'byung ba //
analyzed: sred pa che 'bring gsum 'byung ba //
translated: The three are: great, middling, and small craving.

original: nyer len bzhi ste 'chab bcan //
analyzed: nyer len bzhi ste 'chab bcan //
translated: The four are: appropriation, concealment,

original: mi dge dkres skom gdung ba po //🔽rig 'dzin yid la byed pa bzhi //
analyzed: mi dge dkres skom gdung ba po // rig 'dzin yid la byed pa bzhi //
translated: non-virtue, and hunger and thirst.🔽The four are: the four vidyadhara mental engagements.

original: rig pa po ste gnas pa las //
analyzed: rig pa po ste gnas pa las //
translated: The four are: the knower, the abider,

original: tshim par byed pa tshor ba ni //
analyzed: tshim par byed pa tshor ba ni //
translated: the satisfier, and the feeler.

original: rnam pa gsum ste sems pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum ste sems pa'o //
translated: The three are: feeling, intention,🔽sleep, regret, investigation,

original: gnyid dang 'gyod pa rtog dpyod pa //🔽ngo tsha shes dang bag yod pa //
analyzed: gnyid dang 'gyod pa rtog dpyod pa // ngo tsha shes dang bag yod pa //
translated: and analysis.🔽The three are: shame, conscientiousness,🔽and non-violence.🔽The three are: compassion, love, and affection.

original: rnam par mi 'tshe snying rje dang // brtse ba byams pa gsum gsum dang // dogs dang bsags pa ser sna dang // phrag dog rtog pa rang bzhin te //
analyzed: rnam par mi 'tshe snying rje dang // brtse ba byams pa gsum gsum dang // dogs dang bsags pa ser sna dang // phrag dog rtog pa rang bzhin te //
translated: The three are: doubt, miserliness, and jealousy.

original: snang ba'i ngang du spro @382a *//
analyzed: snang ba'i ngang du spro @382a *//
translated: The three are: imagination, appearance,🔽and nature.🔽The three are: expansion, gathering, and contraction.🔽The three are: attachment, clinging, and delight.

original: zhing sdud // chags pa zhen dang dga' ba dang // dga' zhing shin tu dga' ba ste //
analyzed: zhing sdud // chags pa zhen dang dga' ba dang // dga' zhing shin tu dga' ba ste //
translated: The three are: joy, great joy, and supreme joy.

original: 'dod chags rtogs par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags rtogs par 'byung ba'o //
translated: Attachment is the realization of the element.🔽Joy is bliss, stupidity is satisfaction,🔽wonder is laughter, and delight is contentment.

original: bde bas yi rangs gti mug mod rab tu mgub shes rab dang // ngo mtshar dgod par byed dang tshim //
analyzed: bde bas yi rangs gti mug mod rab tu mgub shes rab dang // ngo mtshar dgod par byed dang tshim //
translated: The union of the elements is kissing,

original: 'byung ba kha sprod 'jib pa dang // rten pa de nyid ting 'dzin te //
analyzed: 'byung ba kha sprod 'jib pa dang // rten pa de nyid ting 'dzin te //
translated: the support is samādhi,🔽the action is effort, the victory is the hero,

original: brtson 'grus byed dang rgyal ba dang // bya dang 'phrog pa las gyur yin //
analyzed: brtson 'grus byed dang rgyal ba dang // bya dang 'phrog pa las gyur yin //
translated: and the taking is the rakshasa.

original: stobs ngom rgyags pa dregs byed do //
analyzed: stobs ngom rgyags pa dregs byed do //
translated: The power is the peacock, the arrogance is the elephant,

original: mos pas spro bar gyur pa ste //
analyzed: mos pas spro bar gyur pa ste //
translated: and the pride is the bull.🔽The faith is the horse,

original: lhan cig skyes bdag btang snyoms so //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes bdag btang snyoms so //
translated: and the equanimity is the human.

original: tha dad med pa shin tu'o //
analyzed: tha dad med pa shin tu'o //
translated: The nondifferentiation is the lion.

original: drug po rnam sgeg zhe 'gras byed //
analyzed: drug po rnam sgeg zhe 'gras byed //
translated: The six are the peacock, the elephant, the bull,🔽the horse, the human, and the lion.

original: bag yod pa yi dge ba ste //
analyzed: bag yod pa yi dge ba ste //
translated: The virtue is the conscientious one,🔽the clear speech is the truth speaker,

original: tshig gsal bden smra dad pa dang // g-yo med dran pa ldan pa can //🔽mi bden pa dang de bzhin nges //
analyzed: tshig gsal bden smra dad pa dang // g-yo med dran pa ldan pa can // mi bden pa dang de bzhin nges //
translated: the faith is the faithful one, the mindfulness is the mindful one,🔽the nonarisen is the nonarisen one, and the ceased is the ceased one.🔽The uncertain is the uncertain one,

original: shes bzhin ma yin ma nges pa //
analyzed: shes bzhin ma yin ma nges pa //
translated: and the unarisen is the unarisen one.

original: nye bar mi len ma chags sems //
analyzed: nye bar mi len ma chags sems //
translated: The nonappropriated is the nonattached mind,

original: sbyin byed bskul ba mdun pa nyid //
analyzed: sbyin byed bskul ba mdun pa nyid //
translated: the giver is the one who gives, and the one who is in front is the one who is in front.

original: de bzhin des dang ngo tsha med //
analyzed: de bzhin des dang ngo tsha med //
translated: Likewise, the one with shame is the one with shame, and the one without shame is the one without shame.

original: dpa' bas rnam par 'tshe byed pa //
analyzed: dpa' bas rnam par 'tshe byed pa //
translated: The hero is the one who is violent.

original: bag med pa dang khrel med pa //
analyzed: bag med pa dang khrel med pa //
translated: The one who is heedless and shameless

original: shes bzhin bral ba ma yin pa //
analyzed: shes bzhin bral ba ma yin pa //
translated: is not free from vigilance.🔽The one who is unruly due to displaying deceit and guile,

original: g-yo sgyu ston pas mi bsrun dang // gya gyur byed pa rgod bag can //
analyzed: g-yo sgyu ston pas mi bsrun dang // gya gyur byed pa rgod bag can //
translated: the one who is fickle and boisterous,

original: 'di dag rtog pa 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: 'di dag rtog pa 'byung ba ste //
translated: these are the arising of concepts.🔽From the consciousness of the appearance of the increase

original: snang ba mched pa'i shes pa las //
analyzed: snang ba mched pa'i shes pa las //
translated: of light,

original: kun tu rgyu zhing 'jug par byed //
analyzed: kun tu rgyu zhing 'jug par byed //
translated: they spread out and engage.

original: mtshan nyid 'di dag bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'di dag bstan pa'o //
translated: These are the characteristics that are explained.

original: chags pa bar ma'i skad cig ma //
analyzed: chags pa bar ma'i skad cig ma //
translated: The moment of middling attachment

original: ma rig pa nyid min pa ltar //
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid min pa ltar //
translated: is not ignorance itself.

original: 'thibs shing snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'thibs shing snang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is obscured and without appearance.

original: brjed ngas pa dang rmugs pa'o //
analyzed: brjed ngas pa dang rmugs pa'o //
translated: It is forgetfulness and sluggishness.

original: 'khrul chen log @382b par lta ba can //
analyzed: 'khrul chen log @382b par lta ba can //
translated: The great delusion has a wrong view.

original: brjod med 'gog pas 'jug pa zad //
analyzed: brjod med 'gog pas 'jug pa zad //
translated: The engagement of the cessation that is inexpressible is exhausted.

original: skyo zhing le lo snyom las byed //
analyzed: skyo zhing le lo snyom las byed //
translated: One is discouraged, lazy, and indolent.

original: the tshom gyur pa yid spyod pa //
analyzed: the tshom gyur pa yid spyod pa //
translated: Doubtful, the mind engages.🔽The neuter arises from the subtle and coarse

original: ma ning 'byung ba phra ba dang // rags pa skye 'gag gnas pa las //
analyzed: ma ning 'byung ba phra ba dang // rags pa skye 'gag gnas pa las //
translated: arising, ceasing, and abiding.

original: bag chags dri ma'i rtog pa kun //
analyzed: bag chags dri ma'i rtog pa kun //
translated: All concepts of the stains of traces

original: snang ba thob pa'i de nyid du //
analyzed: snang ba thob pa'i de nyid du //
translated: are the reality of attaining appearances.

original: stong nyid spros pa bral gyur pas //
analyzed: stong nyid spros pa bral gyur pas //
translated: Since emptiness is free from conceptual elaborations,

original: rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: it is pure, luminous clarity.

original: nang gi rnam par shes pa de nyid ni //
analyzed: nang gi rnam par shes pa de nyid ni //
translated: That very inner consciousness

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i chos nyid rtog med pa //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i chos nyid rtog med pa //
translated: is the nonconceptual intrinsic nature of coemergence,

original: 'od gsal ngo bo stong zhing bdag med pa //
analyzed: 'od gsal ngo bo stong zhing bdag med pa //
translated: the essence of luminous clarity, empty and selfless,

original: rlung gis bskyod par mtshan ma'i rnam par byung //
analyzed: rlung gis bskyod par mtshan ma'i rnam par byung //
translated: arising as the forms of signs, stirred by the winds.

original: de yi skad cig rang bzhin 'byung 'jug pa //
analyzed: de yi skad cig rang bzhin 'byung 'jug pa //
translated: Its momentary nature arises and enters,

original: mtshan ma snang ba gsum du mngon par 'byung //
analyzed: mtshan ma snang ba gsum du mngon par 'byung //
translated: manifesting as the three appearances of signs.

original: de bas na 'di dag nges par rtogs pas ji ltar 'o ma dang / til dag gis yang dag pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / til mar gyi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgya mngon par 'du bya ba'i rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar brtag par mi nus so //
analyzed: de bas na 'di dag nges par rtogs pas ji ltar 'o ma dang / til dag gis yang dag pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / til mar gyi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgya mngon par 'du bya ba'i rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar brtag par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, just as butter and oil cannot be produced without the proper application of effort with the curds and sesame seeds, likewise, without the proper application of mantra and mudra, the union of the vajra and lotus, the three consciousnesses cannot be ascertained.

original: gang du rlung med na kun gzhi rten pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang du rlung med na kun gzhi rten pa med pa'o //
translated: Where there is no wind, there is no support for the all-base.

original: gang du kun gzhi'i rten pa med na rnam par shes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du kun gzhi'i rten pa med na rnam par shes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Where there is no support of the ālaya, there is no consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid med na gang bha ga dang ling+ga yang dag par sbyor bar nus pa med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid med na gang bha ga dang ling+ga yang dag par sbyor bar nus pa med de /
translated: Without consciousness, there is no ability to unite the bhaga and the liṅga.

original: des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do //
analyzed: des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do //
translated: Thus, one does not attain the samādhi of great bliss.

original: ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang // ji ltar til mar te /
analyzed: ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang // ji ltar til mar te /
translated: Just as butter is churned from milk, and oil from sesame seeds,

original: de bzhin du rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes nye bar brtag pa'i phyir dang / padma shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar brtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes nye bar brtag pa'i phyir dang / padma shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar brtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in the same way, in order to examine the gnosis of the vajra method and the gnosis of the lotus wisdom.

original: @383a *// yul 'jug pa med cing /
analyzed: @383a *// yul 'jug pa med cing /
translated: Without the engagement of objects,

original: de la sems pa med pas /
analyzed: de la sems pa med pas /
translated: and without the mind being there,

original: rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa rlung med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa rlung med do //
translated: there is no wind, the mount of consciousness.

original: de med pas phyi rol 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / nang khams dang skye mched med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de med pas phyi rol 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / nang khams dang skye mched med par 'gyur te /
translated: Without that, the external four great elements and the internal elements and sense bases do not exist.

original: snang ba gsum du dmigs pa yang mi 'byung bas //
analyzed: snang ba gsum du dmigs pa yang mi 'byung bas //
translated: The observation of the three appearances also does not occur.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa med pa na //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa med pa na //
translated: When there is no engagement in the limit of reality,

original: zung du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zung du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not be united.

original: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The essence of bodhicitta

original: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la //
analyzed: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la //
translated: Is the guru Vajradhara.

original: mos gus mthar phyin gyur pas ni //
analyzed: mos gus mthar phyin gyur pas ni //
translated: By perfecting devotion to him,

original: lam gyi rim pa kun rdzogs pa //
analyzed: lam gyi rim pa kun rdzogs pa //
translated: All the stages of the path are completed.

original: sgrib dag yon tan thob pa ste //
analyzed: sgrib dag yon tan thob pa ste //
translated: Obstructions are purified and qualities are attained.

original: dbang gi rgyal ba rnyed pa bzhin //
analyzed: dbang gi rgyal ba rnyed pa bzhin //
translated: It is like finding a treasure of empowerment.

original: las dang dngos grub ma lus pa //
analyzed: las dang dngos grub ma lus pa //
translated: All activities and accomplishments

original: ye shes mi zad gnas thob bo //
analyzed: ye shes mi zad gnas thob bo //
translated: Are obtained through the inexhaustible abode of wisdom.

original: gang rnal 'byor lam gyi rim pa thams cad cig car du rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lhag par mos pa tsam gyis /
analyzed: gang rnal 'byor lam gyi rim pa thams cad cig car du rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lhag par mos pa tsam gyis /
translated: Those who have perfected all the stages of the path of yoga simultaneously through the samādhi of great bliss merely by devotion

original: las dang po la gnas par 'gyur te phyir mi ldog pa la yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las dang po la gnas par 'gyur te phyir mi ldog pa la yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: will abide in the stage of the beginner and will also abide in the stage of nonregression.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the second chapter, the chapter on the path, from the Compendium of the Pristine Consciousness of Wisdom.

original: spyi don mdo ltar ston pa bdag med pa //
analyzed: spyi don mdo ltar ston pa bdag med pa //
translated: The General Meaning: The Presentation of Selflessness

original: ae ni chos te bam ni gang zag gis //
analyzed: ae ni chos te bam ni gang zag gis //
translated: E is phenomena, and vam is the individual.

original: stong pa zhi ba dngos po med pa nyid //
analyzed: stong pa zhi ba dngos po med pa nyid //
translated: Emptiness, peace, and the absence of entities

original: phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad kun //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad kun //
translated: All aggregates, elements, and sense-fields

original: rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams thams cad bral //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams thams cad bral //
translated: Are devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: blang dor med pa'i ye shes mnyam ba nyid //
analyzed: blang dor med pa'i ye shes mnyam ba nyid //
translated: Wisdom, which is free from acceptance and rejection, is equality.

original: aae ni stong nyid spros dang bral ba las //
analyzed: aae ni stong nyid spros dang bral ba las //
translated: E is emptiness, free from conceptual elaborations.

original: bam ni thabs mchog snying rje chen por bstan //
analyzed: bam ni thabs mchog snying rje chen por bstan //
translated: Vaṃ is taught as the supreme method, great compassion.

original: gnyis med mnyam pa byang @383b sems ro gcig pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis med mnyam pa byang @383b sems ro gcig pa'o //
translated: Non-dual equality is the single taste of bodhicitta.

original: rnam thar sgo gsum pha rol phyin pa drug /
analyzed: rnam thar sgo gsum pha rol phyin pa drug /
translated: The three gates of liberation, the six perfections,

original: tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi //
analyzed: tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi //
translated: The four immeasurables, and the four means of gathering [disciples],

original: byang chub mchog chos sum cu rtsa bdun te //
analyzed: byang chub mchog chos sum cu rtsa bdun te //
translated: The supreme enlightenment, and the thirty-seven factors of awakening,

original: so so yang dag rig dang ma 'dres chos //
analyzed: so so yang dag rig dang ma 'dres chos //
translated: The correct individual knowledges, and the unshared qualities of the Buddha,

original: stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi dang bsrung ba med //
analyzed: stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi dang bsrung ba med //
translated: The ten powers, the four forms of fearlessness, and the absence of protection,

original: mkhyen pa rgyas pa de nyid kun khyab mdzad //
analyzed: mkhyen pa rgyas pa de nyid kun khyab mdzad //
translated: The vast knowledge, and the one who pervades everything,

original: ae bam brtan g-yo snang dang stong pa las //
analyzed: ae bam brtan g-yo snang dang stong pa las //
translated: From e vaṃ, the appearance and emptiness of the stable and moving [world],

original: phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad ni //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad ni //
translated: All aggregates, elements, and sense-fields

original: lha yi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dag tu'o //
analyzed: lha yi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dag tu'o //
translated: Are the nature of the deities, in the maṇḍala.

original: yig don sgra dang tha snyad du ma rnams //
analyzed: yig don sgra dang tha snyad du ma rnams //
translated: The meanings of the words and the various conventions

original: brtags pa med de sna tshogs rkyen gyur las //
analyzed: brtags pa med de sna tshogs rkyen gyur las //
translated: are not imagined, but arise from various conditions.

original: rgyu 'bras rab byed sgyu mar snang ba kun //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras rab byed sgyu mar snang ba kun //
translated: All the illusory appearances of the causes and effects of karma

original: 'jig rten rigs byed mtshon byed sgra ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten rigs byed mtshon byed sgra ldan pa'o //
translated: are endowed with the sounds that indicate the arts of the world.

original: 'dod chags chos kyi sbas pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos kyi sbas pa zhes bya ba //
translated: The one called Passion Dharmaguhya

original: rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor las //
analyzed: rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor las //
translated: through the union of the means of yoga and wisdom🔽is the first passion of various joys,

original: sna tshogs dga' ba dang po rjes chags dang // rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba nyid //
analyzed: sna tshogs dga' ba dang po rjes chags dang // rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba nyid //
translated: the supreme bliss of complete maturation.

original: mtshan nyid bral ba skad cig lhan cig skyes //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bral ba skad cig lhan cig skyes //
translated: Free from characteristics, coemergent

original: bde ba mi 'gyur ye shes phyag rgya che //
analyzed: bde ba mi 'gyur ye shes phyag rgya che //
translated: is the unchanging bliss, the great seal of wisdom.

original: rnam par nyid pa dga' bral rjes la'o //
analyzed: rnam par nyid pa dga' bral rjes la'o //
translated: The dissipation of passion is after the separation from joy.

original: de nyid snying po bla med byang chub sems //
analyzed: de nyid snying po bla med byang chub sems //
translated: That very essence is the unsurpassed bodhicitta,

original: bde stong dbyer med byang chub chen po'o //
analyzed: bde stong dbyer med byang chub chen po'o //
translated: the great enlightenment of inseparable bliss and emptiness.

original: kun de byang sems ye shes mes sbyangs pas //
analyzed: kun de byang sems ye shes mes sbyangs pas //
translated: All that is refined by the fire of bodhicitta wisdom

original: zag med bde bas lus sems rnam dag pa'o //
analyzed: zag med bde bas lus sems rnam dag pa'o //
translated: is the pure body and mind of undefiled bliss.

original: 'jig rten kun du brtan pa sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun du brtan pa sna tshogs pa //
translated: The various arts in the world

original: de rten 'byung ba 'dus pa'i ri rab dang // gzhal med khang sogs dngos po 'khrul las snang //
analyzed: de rten 'byung ba 'dus pa'i ri rab dang // gzhal med khang sogs dngos po 'khrul las snang //

analyzed: brten pa 'gro rgyud khams gsum sems can kun // sgyu ma lta bur skye zhing 'ga' par 'gyur // 'khor ba yul dang dbang @384a *//

analyzed: po rtog par byung // de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa las // zlog byed yang dag kun rdzob lam brtan pas //

analyzed: dngos po mtshan ma 'dzin pa las log nas //

analyzed: rang bzhin bden don rtog pas byang chub thob // 'od gsal ba yi de nyid ni //

original: rgya mtsho rab tu dangs pa las //
analyzed: rgya mtsho rab tu dangs pa las //
translated: The world of appearances and possibilities, whether of samsara or nirvana, arises from the dynamic energy of awareness.🔽The world of appearances and possibilities

original: de las rlung gis bskyod gyur pas //
analyzed: de las rlung gis bskyod gyur pas //
translated: From that, when stirred by the wind,

original: rab rlabs 'byung ba ji bzhin du //
analyzed: rab rlabs 'byung ba ji bzhin du //
translated: just like waves arise in water,

original: rang bzhin sems byung rtog tshogs byung //
analyzed: rang bzhin sems byung rtog tshogs byung //
translated: the thoughts of the mind arise.

original: gnas rgyu dus dang rkyen dbang gis //
analyzed: gnas rgyu dus dang rkyen dbang gis //
translated: Due to the power of the place, cause, time, and conditions,

original: gnas na 'od gsal stong nyid las //
analyzed: gnas na 'od gsal stong nyid las //
translated: when abiding, from the luminosity of emptiness,

original: rgyu ni rlung sems dbyer med pas //
analyzed: rgyu ni rlung sems dbyer med pas //
translated: the cause is the inseparable wind and mind.

original: dus gsum dus med skad cig mar //
analyzed: dus gsum dus med skad cig mar //
translated: In the three times and the time without time,

original: ngo bo stong pa rlung gis bskyod //
analyzed: ngo bo stong pa rlung gis bskyod //
