translated: the empty essence is moved by the wind.

original: rkyen las mtshan ma'i chos su snang //
analyzed: rkyen las mtshan ma'i chos su snang //
translated: From conditions, phenomena with characteristics appear.

original: gnas sgrub bye brag tha dad pas //
analyzed: gnas sgrub bye brag tha dad pas //
translated: Due to the different specific practices,🔽the consciousness itself is offered,

original: rnam shes de nyid 'bul ba dang // ma 'khrul pa las khyad par du //
analyzed: rnam shes de nyid 'bul ba dang // ma 'khrul pa las khyad par du //
translated: and from the undeluded state,

original: dge dang mi dge sna tshogs las //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge sna tshogs las //
translated: various virtues and nonvirtues

original: bde sdug nyams su myong gyur pas //
analyzed: bde sdug nyams su myong gyur pas //
translated: are experienced as happiness and suffering.

original: las dang nyon mongs bag chags las //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs bag chags las //
translated: From the traces of karma and afflictions,

original: lus ngag yid kyis spyod par snang //
analyzed: lus ngag yid kyis spyod par snang //
translated: the conduct of body, speech, and mind appears.

original: ma dag dag byed bla ma yi //
analyzed: ma dag dag byed bla ma yi //
translated: Through the instructions of the guru,

original: gdams pas kun las grol bar 'gyur //🔽bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las //
analyzed: gdams pas kun las grol bar 'gyur // bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las //
translated: the purifier of the impure, one is liberated from all.🔽The various appearances of the causes and effects

original: rgyu 'bras sna tshogs snang ba yang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras sna tshogs snang ba yang //
translated: of virtuous and nonvirtuous karma🔽are the appearances of the mind.

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i dang las ni //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i dang las ni //
translated: The activity is like space.

original: nam mkha' lta @384b bu'i cho 'phrul byung //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta @384b bu'i cho 'phrul byung //
translated: The miracle is like space.

original: de nyid skye med rang bzhin las //
analyzed: de nyid skye med rang bzhin las //
translated: From the unborn nature itself,

original: 'gag pa med par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'gag pa med par gnas pa'o //
translated: It abides without ceasing.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste //🔽de nyid bdag med chos nyid las //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste // de nyid bdag med chos nyid las //
translated: It is dependent origination.🔽From the nature of reality, which is selfless,

original: spros med dngos dang dngos med kyi //
analyzed: spros med dngos dang dngos med kyi //
translated: The unfabricated, the real and unreal,

original: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gnas med pa'o //🔽rgyar ni go rims bzhin du gnas pa la //
analyzed: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gnas med pa'o // rgyar ni go rims bzhin du gnas pa la //
translated: Are unmixed, complete, and without location.🔽The arrangement is according to the sequence,

original: sdud byed go rims 'chol ba 'khor lo brten //
analyzed: sdud byed go rims 'chol ba 'khor lo brten //
translated: The gathering is in the reverse sequence, based on the wheel.

original: dam tshig kun ldan phyag rgya snying po nyid //
analyzed: dam tshig kun ldan phyag rgya snying po nyid //
translated: The pledge is endowed with all, the essence of the seal.

original: kun dor 'byung lnga lha mo rdo rje dbyings //
analyzed: kun dor 'byung lnga lha mo rdo rje dbyings //
translated: The abandonment of all is the five elements, the goddess Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: bde chen rdo rje gsang ba phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: bde chen rdo rje gsang ba phun sum tshogs //
translated: The secret of the great bliss vajra is perfect.

original: de nyid mi 'gyur 'byung gnas thim gyur gang //
analyzed: de nyid mi 'gyur 'byung gnas thim gyur gang //
translated: That itself is the unchanging source, which dissolves into the all-basis.

original: skad cig rgyan rdzogs bum pa gang ba ltar //
analyzed: skad cig rgyan rdzogs bum pa gang ba ltar //
translated: Like a vase filled to the brim with ornaments,

original: bdud rtsi gtsug tor ye shes rgyal bar gyur //
analyzed: bdud rtsi gtsug tor ye shes rgyal bar gyur //
translated: The amṛta uṣṇīṣa becomes the jñānarāja.

original: rjod byed 'bru gsum brjod bya badzra dhr'i ka /
analyzed: rjod byed 'bru gsum brjod bya badzra dhr'i ka /
translated: The expression is the three seed syllables, the expressed is vajra dhṛk.

original: bya ba rdzogs pa'i rnam par skye ba ste //
analyzed: bya ba rdzogs pa'i rnam par skye ba ste //
translated: The arising of the perfected action is the appearance of the exhaustion of the object.

original: snang ba thob pa lhan cig tu gnas pas yul ldan pa snang ba mched pa /
analyzed: snang ba thob pa lhan cig tu gnas pas yul ldan pa snang ba mched pa /
translated: The appearance of the increase of the object is the appearance of the attainment of light, through the simultaneous presence of the possessor of the object.

original: rtog cing ba'i bye brag la rig pa 'jug pas zad pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rtog cing ba'i bye brag la rig pa 'jug pas zad pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of the exhaustion of the object is the appearance of the object of the discrimination of the various distinctions of the object.

original: byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byams pas gsol pa /
translated: Maitreya said:

original: sbas pa'i don gang lags /
analyzed: sbas pa'i don gang lags /
translated: What is the hidden meaning?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: kun rdzob bden pas sbas pa ni gang du snod bcud ma lus pa snang ba sgyu ma lta bur bdag byin gyis brlab par bzhin gyis bden pa rnam par dag ba'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pas sbas pa ni gang du snod bcud ma lus pa snang ba sgyu ma lta bur bdag byin gyis brlab par bzhin gyis bden pa rnam par dag ba'o //
translated: The hidden meaning of the conventional truth is the appearance of the entire world and its inhabitants, like an illusion, through the blessing of the self, the appearance of the purification of the truth.

original: sems snang ba gsum gyis sbas pa ni gang chos nyid las yang dag par 'byung ba /
analyzed: sems snang ba gsum gyis sbas pa ni gang chos nyid las yang dag par 'byung ba /
translated: The hidden meaning of the mind is the appearance of the three appearances, which arise from reality.

original: thob pa dang / mched pa dang / snang ba ni sems ye shes kun tu rnam par rtog pa med pa bzhin du rang bzhin dang bcas par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: thob pa dang / mched pa dang / snang ba ni sems ye shes kun tu rnam par rtog pa med pa bzhin du rang bzhin dang bcas par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The attainment, increase, and appearance arise with their nature, like the non-conceptual wisdom of the mind.

original: chos kyis sbas pa ni bde ba'i don gang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyar ba'i bde @385a *//
analyzed: chos kyis sbas pa ni bde ba'i don gang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyar ba'i bde @385a *//
translated: The Dharma-concealed is the meaning of bliss, which is indicated by the bliss of the union of vajra and lotus.

original: bas / rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i snang ba gsum nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni /
analyzed: bas / rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i snang ba gsum nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni /
translated: That which indicates the three appearances that are pure by nature

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be well-established in the state of great bliss.

original: 'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'i //
analyzed: 'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'i //
translated: This is the explanation of the concealed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa /
translated: The great bodhisattva Maitreya asked:

original: bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ci lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ci lags /
translated: Bhagavān, what is the general meaning?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos la spyod pa /
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos la spyod pa /
translated: The hearers and so forth practice the Dharma free from attachment,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba /
translated: but they are not liberated from the latent tendencies of conceptuality.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud mtha' dag tu /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud mtha' dag tu /
translated: In all the great yoga tantras,

original: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed ba de rnams las mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du gsungs pa'o
analyzed: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed ba de rnams las mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du gsungs pa'o
translated: The words abiding in the bhaga of the Vajra Queen and so forth clarify the Dharma of passion. Having heard these amazing vajra words, those who disparage them should explain them in a way that is not contradictory. This is said to be the general meaning.

original: // byams pas gsol ba /
analyzed: // byams pas gsol ba /
translated: Maitreya asked:

original: yi ge'i don gang lags /
analyzed: yi ge'i don gang lags /
translated: What is the meaning of the syllables?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: gang yang a'a li k'a li'i sgra'i don la brten nas brjod par byed pa /
analyzed: gang yang a'a li k'a li'i sgra'i don la brten nas brjod par byed pa /
translated: That which is expressed based on the meaning of the sounds of ālikāli,

original: brjod pa'i mtha'i byed pa /
analyzed: brjod pa'i mtha'i byed pa /
translated: the activity of the end of expression,

original: mtha' dang brjod pa rkyen rnams las rnam par 'byung ba /
analyzed: mtha' dang brjod pa rkyen rnams las rnam par 'byung ba /
translated: arising from the conditions of the end and expression,

original: rab tu byed pa dang bcas pa tha snyad sna tshogs pa la brten nas cha shas tsam du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa dang bcas pa tha snyad sna tshogs pa la brten nas cha shas tsam du bstan pa'o //
translated: is taught as just a fraction based on the various conventions with the analysis.

original: byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byams pas gsol pa /
translated: Maitreya said:

original: thun mong ma yin pa bla na med pa 'di ltar mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar bshad pa lags /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa bla na med pa 'di ltar mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar bshad pa lags /
translated: How is this unexcelled, uncommon ultimate explanation to be explained?

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @385b rnams la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @385b rnams la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One said:

original: legs so legs so //
analyzed: legs so legs so //
translated: Excellent, excellent!🔽to the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.🔽Listen,

original: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog dang ldan pa nyon cig //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog dang ldan pa nyon cig //
translated: bodhisattva endowed with supreme compassion.

original: mtha' ni mu ste /
analyzed: mtha' ni mu ste /
translated: The end is the extreme,

original: 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o //
translated: the utterly pure mode of luminosity, is the ultimate.

original: mtha' ldan mtha' bcas grol ba yang dag mtha'//
analyzed: mtha' ldan mtha' bcas grol ba yang dag mtha'//
translated: The end endowed with the end, the liberated with the perfect end,

original: mtha' nyid bzlog bral grub mtha' las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' nyid bzlog bral grub mtha' las 'das pa'o //
translated: the end itself, free from negation and beyond philosophical tenets.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa /
translated: The great bodhisattva said:

original: bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar thug thob pa lags //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar thug thob pa lags //
translated: Blessed One, by what means is the ultimate attained?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' snang ba gsum las stong pa gsum mo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' snang ba gsum las stong pa gsum mo //
translated: The Blessed One said:🔽The end of the aggregates, elements, sense bases, and so forth, is the three emptinesses from the three appearances.

original: dmigs pa med pa sgyu ma lta bu las stong pa gsum gyi mtha' bde stong 'od gsal pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa sgyu ma lta bu las stong pa gsum gyi mtha' bde stong 'od gsal pa'o //
translated: From the three emptinesses of the non-apprehended illusion-like [appearances], the end of the three emptinesses is the luminosity of bliss and emptiness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol ba /
translated: The great bodhisattva asked:

original: stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mthar ji ltar 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mthar ji ltar 'gyur ba lags /
translated: How does the triple emptiness become the end of luminosity?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: ji ltar mes shing bsregs pa ste 'bar bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi snang ba ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do //🔽ji ltar ta la'i lo ma yang 'bar bar byed pa de bzhin du ste 'od gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyis ye shes la mched pa rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar mes shing bsregs pa ste 'bar bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi snang ba ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do // ji ltar ta la'i lo ma yang 'bar bar byed pa de bzhin du ste 'od gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyis ye shes la mched pa rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
translated: Just as fire burns wood, so luminosity burns the light of wisdom with the long duration of gnosis.🔽Just as a palm leaf burns, so luminosity burns the spreading of gnosis with method.

original: ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu gyur pas rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu gyur pas rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
translated: Just as a cotton seed burns, so the supreme attainment of the light of gnosis burns.

original: de'i phyir shing ta la'i lo ma dang ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pas 'bar zhing thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang / stong pa @386a *//
analyzed: de'i phyir shing ta la'i lo ma dang ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pas 'bar zhing thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang / stong pa @386a *//
translated: Therefore, just as a palm leaf and a cotton seed burn and become ash, so the triple emptiness and the end of luminosity burn and become ash.

original: chen po dang / shin tu stong pa dang / thams cad stong pa rnams snang ba nye bar thob pa 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po dang / shin tu stong pa dang / thams cad stong pa rnams snang ba nye bar thob pa 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The great, the very empty, and the all empty are the attainment of the appearance of clear light.

original: 'od gsal don dam bden pa nyid //
analyzed: 'od gsal don dam bden pa nyid //
translated: Clear light is the ultimate truth.

original: mnyam nyid ye shes rtog pas ni //
analyzed: mnyam nyid ye shes rtog pas ni //
translated: The wisdom of equality is realized by thought.

original: dbyings kyi dang du rtog pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: dbyings kyi dang du rtog pa'i tshogs //
translated: The assembly of thoughts is realized as the dhātu.

original: ma dag gnyen po'i byed pa dang // rgyu rkyen yul spyod dngos po kun //
analyzed: ma dag gnyen po'i byed pa dang // rgyu rkyen yul spyod dngos po kun //
translated: All causes, conditions, objects, and activities of the impure antidote

original: rtog med rang 'byung me 'bar bas //
analyzed: rtog med rang 'byung me 'bar bas //
translated: are burned by the fire of nonconceptual self-origination.🔽Just as various kinds of wood

original: shing gi bye brag sna tshogs dang // ras bal phung po du ma yang //
analyzed: shing gi bye brag sna tshogs dang // ras bal phung po du ma yang //
translated: and many heaps of cotton

original: tshig cing dngos med byed pa ltar //
analyzed: tshig cing dngos med byed pa ltar //
translated: are burned and become nothing,

original: de bzhin gzugs 'dzin ma lus pa //
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs 'dzin ma lus pa //
translated: so also all forms

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas nyid du //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas nyid du //
translated: are burned and dissolved into the state of the dharmadhātu.

original: bsregs shing thim gyur mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bsregs shing thim gyur mi gnas pa'o //
translated: They are burned and do not remain.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: The vajra-like samādhi

original: kun rtog ma lus bcom gyur pa'i //
analyzed: kun rtog ma lus bcom gyur pa'i //
translated: destroys all concepts without exception.

original: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi //
translated: The wisdom of purity

original: mkhyen pa byang chub sems kyi rgyun //
analyzed: mkhyen pa byang chub sems kyi rgyun //
translated: is the stream of bodhicitta.

original: mi 'gag phrin las rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: mi 'gag phrin las rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: Unceasing activity is uninterrupted.

original: mi 'gyur stong nyid bde chen po //
analyzed: mi 'gyur stong nyid bde chen po //
translated: Unchanging emptiness is great bliss.

original: zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa //
analyzed: zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa //
translated: Uniting is thoroughly nonabiding.

original: thob tu med las kun tu 'byung //
analyzed: thob tu med las kun tu 'byung //
translated: Arising from the unobtainable,

original: lhun grub de bzhin nyid gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lhun grub de bzhin nyid gnas pa'o //
translated: spontaneously present suchness abides.

original: de kho na nyid las rtog pa dang mi rtog pa rnam par dag par gyur pas /
analyzed: de kho na nyid las rtog pa dang mi rtog pa rnam par dag par gyur pas /
translated: Since conceptual and nonconceptual thoughts are purified in suchness,

original: rang bzhin slob dang mi slob pa'i bye brag gis rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin slob dang mi slob pa'i bye brag gis rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro //
translated: the essence of nonabiding occurs through the distinctions of the natural and the trained.

original: 'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the ultimate.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa gsum ba'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa gsum ba'o ////
translated: This is the third chapter of the glorious Wisdom Vajra Compendium.

original: byams pas gsol ba /
analyzed: byams pas gsol ba /
translated: Maitreya asked:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavat,

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa @386b thams cad kyi mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa @386b thams cad kyi mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags //
translated: how are all the transcendent ones explained in the yoga tantras through the six limits?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa rnams so //
translated: The Blessed One said, “There are four kinds of teachings: teachings that are literal, teachings that are not literal, teachings that are literal and not literal, and teachings that are neither literal nor not literal.

original: byams pas gsol pa /🔽thugs brtse ba nye bar gzhag cing /
analyzed: byams pas gsol pa / thugs brtse ba nye bar gzhag cing /
translated: Maitreya said,

original: bcom ldan 'das tshig re re'i dbye ba bstan du gsol /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshig re re'i dbye ba bstan du gsol /
translated: “Blessed One, please explain the distinctions of these terms,🔽out of your great compassion.”🔽The Blessed One said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “The teachings that are literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are not literal are those that are literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are both literal and not literal are those that are not literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are neither literal nor not literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are not literal are those that are literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are both literal and not literal are those that are not literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are neither literal nor not literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are not literal are those that are literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are both literal and not literal are those that are not literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are neither literal nor not literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are not literal are those that are literal and are literal.

original: mthar thug pas bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mthar thug pas bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The teachings that are both literal and not literal are those that are not literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are neither literal nor not literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are not literal are those that are literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are both literal and not literal are those that are not literal and are literal.🔽The teachings that are neither literal nor not literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are literal are those that are not literal and are not literal.🔽The teachings that are not literal are those that are literal and are literal.

original: 'dod chags ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin pa dang / bar ma dbu ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin pa dang / bar ma dbu ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: The teachings that are both literal and not literal are those that are not literal and are literal.

original: bde ba zag bcas ma yin te //
analyzed: bde ba zag bcas ma yin te //
translated: The teachings that are neither literal nor not literal are those that are not

original: zag pa med pa'i bde ba nyid //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i bde ba nyid //
translated: Is the very bliss that is free of outflows.

original: bde ba spangs shing 'bras med pas //
analyzed: bde ba spangs shing 'bras med pas //
translated: Abandoning bliss and having no result,

original: sgyu ma lta bur byung ba ste //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bur byung ba ste //
translated: It arises like an illusion.

original: de nyid bde ba'i ye shes ni //
analyzed: de nyid bde ba'i ye shes ni //
translated: That very wisdom of bliss

original: dbu ma tsam du'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbu ma tsam du'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: Is not observed even as the mere middle.

original: gang zag dbang po dman pa rnams //
analyzed: gang zag dbang po dman pa rnams //
translated: For people of lesser faculties,

original: skrag byed 'gal ba ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: skrag byed 'gal ba ltar snang ngo //
translated: It appears as a contradiction that causes fear.

original: dbang po mchog rnams chos la ni //
analyzed: dbang po mchog rnams chos la ni //
translated: For those of supreme faculties,

original: sngon chad ma byung chos thos pas //
analyzed: sngon chad ma byung chos thos pas //
translated: By hearing the Dharma that has not arisen before,

original: ngo mtshar nges shes skyes pa yis //
analyzed: ngo mtshar nges shes skyes pa yis //
translated: A sense of wonder and certainty arises.

original: rmad du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin thog /
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin thog /
translated: They attain the samadhi of amazement

original: rnam par grol thob mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par grol thob mtshan nyid do //
translated: And the characteristics of attaining liberation.🔽In order to stop the impure assertions of

original: phyi rol gsang bar smra la sogs //
analyzed: phyi rol gsang bar smra la sogs //
translated: Outsiders, secret mantra, and so on,🔽The desire to be liberated while not liberated,

original: ma dag dag par 'dod pa dang // mgrol grol 'dod dgag pa dang // rang gar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ma dag dag par 'dod pa dang // mgrol grol 'dod dgag pa dang // rang gar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir //
translated: And the desire to engage in whatever one wants,

original: cung @387a *// zad 'jig rten brtags pa las //
analyzed: cung @387a *// zad 'jig rten brtags pa las //
translated: The slightly impure worldly

original: bzlog phyir ye shes zab mo'i don //
analyzed: bzlog phyir ye shes zab mo'i don //
translated: Is reversed, and the meaning of profound wisdom

original: gnas lugs 'khrul pa rnam dag ste //
analyzed: gnas lugs 'khrul pa rnam dag ste //
translated: Is the pure delusion of the natural state.

original: de nyid snying po dgongs te bshad //
analyzed: de nyid snying po dgongs te bshad //
translated: That is the explanation of the intended meaning of the essence.

original: lus dang dag dang yid med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang / dag pa dang / 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs ba ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang dag dang yid med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang / dag pa dang / 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs ba ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
translated: The vajra statements such as “there is no body, speech, or mind,” “there is no self,” “all is empty,” “all is pure,” and “all is luminosity” are literal.

original: chos thams cad la dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa la dgongs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dgongs pa min te /🔽chos thams cad bdag med par ston cing spros med de bzhin nyid las stong pa nyid du sten pa dang / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang / lus med pa ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa la dgongs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dgongs pa min te / chos thams cad bdag med par ston cing spros med de bzhin nyid las stong pa nyid du sten pa dang / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang / lus med pa ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: They are not intended because they are literal, because they are not intended to be taken literally as the apprehension of things and signs in all phenomena, and as the apprehension of a self.

original: brjod pa las 'das pas ngag med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir yid med pa ni dgongs min du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa las 'das pas ngag med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir yid med pa ni dgongs min du bshad pa'o //
translated: They are literal because they teach that all phenomena are selfless, because they teach that all phenomena are empty, because they teach that all phenomena are by nature completely pure, because they teach that all phenomena are incorporeal, because they teach that all phenomena are inexpressible, and because they teach that all phenomena are inconceivable.

original: ga bur dang / khrag chen po dang / tsan dan dmar po dang rdo rje dang / padma dang / yi ge dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don te //
analyzed: ga bur dang / khrag chen po dang / tsan dan dmar po dang rdo rje dang / padma dang / yi ge dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don te //
translated: The vajra words such as “camphor,” “great blood,” “red sandalwood,” “vajra,” “lotus,” “syllable,” and “seal” are interpretable in meaning.

original: ga bur ni khu ba dang / khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang / tsan dan dmar po'i khub dang bsres pa ni tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba'o //
analyzed: ga bur ni khu ba dang / khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang / tsan dan dmar po'i khub dang bsres pa ni tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba'o //
translated: “ Camphor” is semen, “great blood” is menstrual blood, and “red sandalwood” is a mixture of the two.

original: rdo rje dang mtshan ma dang / thabs dang / padma bha ga dang / shes rab dang / yi ge dang / phyag rgya dang / btsun mo rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig @387b rnams nges pa'i don no //
analyzed: rdo rje dang mtshan ma dang / thabs dang / padma bha ga dang / shes rab dang / yi ge dang / phyag rgya dang / btsun mo rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig @387b rnams nges pa'i don no //
translated: “ Vajra” is a symbol, “lotus” is the bhaga, “syllable” is wisdom, “seal” is a queen, and so on. These vajra words are definitive in meaning.

original: ga bur ni dkyil 'khor yig 'bru dang / khrag chen po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yig 'bru dang / tsan dan dmar po ni padma dmar po 'dab brgyad yig 'bru gsum dang bcas po dang / rdo rje'i rgyud mtshan ma yab dang / padma mtshan ma ste yum dang /
analyzed: ga bur ni dkyil 'khor yig 'bru dang / khrag chen po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yig 'bru dang / tsan dan dmar po ni padma dmar po 'dab brgyad yig 'bru gsum dang bcas po dang / rdo rje'i rgyud mtshan ma yab dang / padma mtshan ma ste yum dang /
translated: Camphor is the mandala, seed syllable, and so forth; the great blood is the sun mandala, seed syllable, and so forth; and the red sandalwood is the eight-petaled red lotus with the three seed syllables. The vajra is the sign of the male, and the lotus is the sign of the female.🔽The syllables are the mantra, the seed, and the mudra is the hand implement.

original: yi ge ni sngags te sa bon dang / phyag rgya ni phyag mtshan te sku yongs su grub pa phyag rgya bzhi ldan no //
analyzed: yi ge ni sngags te sa bon dang / phyag rgya ni phyag mtshan te sku yongs su grub pa phyag rgya bzhi ldan no //
translated: The complete form of the deity is the complete form of the deity with the four mudras.

original: lha'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su brtags pa'i lha rnams 'khrul pa bzlog pa tha mal cad las nus pa cung zang ldan pa ste thun mong pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su brtags pa'i lha rnams 'khrul pa bzlog pa tha mal cad las nus pa cung zang ldan pa ste thun mong pa'o //
translated: The common [mudra] is the complete form of the deity, the imagined deity, which has a little power to reverse delusion and is superior to ordinary [awareness].

original: yang rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'i don las ga bur ni khu ba ga bur shu ki ste rnam pa kun 'dar las rgyu ba dang / khrag chen po ni rang 'byung gi khrag ste si si lha rakta rtsa ro nas rgyu ba dang / tsandan dmar po'i khu ba ni chos 'byung nang du 'dres pa las yum gyi padma'i khongs su yongs su 'dres la 'dbyer med pa las 'gro ba'i lus mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul du yongs su rdzogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'i don las ga bur ni khu ba ga bur shu ki ste rnam pa kun 'dar las rgyu ba dang / khrag chen po ni rang 'byung gi khrag ste si si lha rakta rtsa ro nas rgyu ba dang / tsandan dmar po'i khu ba ni chos 'byung nang du 'dres pa las yum gyi padma'i khongs su yongs su 'dres la 'dbyer med pa las 'gro ba'i lus mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul du yongs su rdzogs pa nyid do //
translated: Furthermore, the meaning of the inseparability of the nature is that camphor is the fluid of camphor, śukra, which moves from all the pores. The “great blood” is the naturally arisen blood, which moves from the sissila rakta nāḍī. The “red sandalwood fluid” is completely mixed within the dharmodaya, and it is inseparable from the mother’s lotus.

original: padma bha ga ste shes rab kyi cha dang / rdo rje ling+ga ste thabs kyi cha dang / zla nyid nub pa'i ldog pa cha mnyam par gyur pa las yi ge ste sa bon yon tan grub byed /
analyzed: padma bha ga ste shes rab kyi cha dang / rdo rje ling+ga ste thabs kyi cha dang / zla nyid nub pa'i ldog pa cha mnyam par gyur pa las yi ge ste sa bon yon tan grub byed /
translated: The “moon and sun” are the wisdom section, the lotus bhaga, and the method section, the vajra liṅga. The “setting” is the reversal of the moon and sun, the equalizing of the portions.

original: phyag rgya bzhi ldan gyi yab yub rdo rje btsun mo rnams chos 'byung las mngon par bde ba'i don ye shes yang dag par bstan pa thun mong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi ldan gyi yab yub rdo rje btsun mo rnams chos 'byung las mngon par bde ba'i don ye shes yang dag par bstan pa thun mong ma yin pa'o //
translated: The father and mother with the four mudras, the vajra queen, are the uncommon teaching of the pristine consciousness that is the meaning of manifest bliss from the source of phenomena.

original: byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byams pas gsol pa /
translated: Maitreya asked:

original: de dag gi drang ba'i don gang lags /
analyzed: de dag gi drang ba'i don gang lags /
translated: “What is the provisional meaning of those?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The bhagavān replied:

original: gang yang a'a li dang k'a li'i yi ge sna tshogs sgra'i don gyi sgo nas rjod par byed pa'i mtha' dang / brjod par bya @388a *//
analyzed: gang yang a'a li dang k'a li'i yi ge sna tshogs sgra'i don gyi sgo nas rjod par byed pa'i mtha' dang / brjod par bya @388a *//
translated: “The various letters of āli and kāli are expressed by way of the meaning of sound, the end of the expressed,🔽the common phenomena of the expressed,🔽and the uncommon secret.

original: ba'i thun mong gi chos dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la bla na med pa gsang ba chen po'i gzungs sngags dang rig sngags 'di sgra'i de kho na nyid la brten nas rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: ba'i thun mong gi chos dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la bla na med pa gsang ba chen po'i gzungs sngags dang rig sngags 'di sgra'i de kho na nyid la brten nas rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang /
translated: This dhāraṇī mantra and knowledge mantra of the great secret that is unsurpassed for the bodhisattvas is to be realized in dependence on the reality of sound.

original: yang gang zag rtog ge bar gyur pa rnams la bstan gyi rjod byed thun mong du gyur pa mi phyed rdo rje'i yi ge srog tu gyur pa chos kyi phung po du ma yang de nyid las byung zhing de nyid du thos pa ni drang ba'i don du
analyzed: yang gang zag rtog ge bar gyur pa rnams la bstan gyi rjod byed thun mong du gyur pa mi phyed rdo rje'i yi ge srog tu gyur pa chos kyi phung po du ma yang de nyid las byung zhing de nyid du thos pa ni drang ba'i don du
translated: Also, the teachings for the sake of those who are logicians are the many aggregates of the Dharma that arise from that very [Vidyottama] and are heard in that very [Vidyottama].

original: bstan pa'o // de dag la yang phung po lnga dang / rigs lnga dang / 'byung ba lnga dang ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: bstan pa'o // de dag la yang phung po lnga dang / rigs lnga dang / 'byung ba lnga dang ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa /
translated: They are also the five aggregates, the five families, the five elements, and the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag go /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag go /
translated: They are the aggregates of ethical discipline, samādhi, wisdom, liberation, and the vision of the pristine consciousness of liberation.

original: thug pa phyogs bcas 'gyur pa nyid //
analyzed: thug pa phyogs bcas 'gyur pa nyid //
translated: The end is the four directions.

original: nyi zla lus kyi gnas las skyes //
analyzed: nyi zla lus kyi gnas las skyes //
translated: The sun and moon arise from the body.

original: dbang gi dkyil 'khor g-yo ldan pa //
analyzed: dbang gi dkyil 'khor g-yo ldan pa //
translated: The maṇḍala of empowerment is endowed with movement.

original: gnas bzhi las phyogs gyur pa //
analyzed: gnas bzhi las phyogs gyur pa //
translated: The four places become the four directions.

original: chu bos brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste //
analyzed: chu bos brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste //
translated: There are eighty-four rivers.

original: stong dang brgyad cu dhra 'o da ldan //
analyzed: stong dang brgyad cu dhra 'o da ldan //
translated: There are one thousand eight hundred moments.

original: de dag chos kyi sgor gyur pa //
analyzed: de dag chos kyi sgor gyur pa //
translated: They are the gateway to the Dharma,

original: phung po bla na med par 'gyur //
analyzed: phung po bla na med par 'gyur //
translated: and become the unsurpassed aggregates.

original: gnyis ka dang bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis ka dang bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste /
translated: In the Action Tantra and so forth, the clear meaning is taught literally.

original: 'di lta ste dkyil 'khor dang mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji @388b bzhin pa ste yi ge'i don gyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste dkyil 'khor dang mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji @388b bzhin pa ste yi ge'i don gyis bshad pa'o //
translated: For example, the maṇḍala, the sacrificial fire, the bali offering, the medicine, the collection of pacifying and so forth, and likewise, the eight great mundane siddhis that are taught are literal, explained by the meaning of the syllables.

original: dkyil 'khor rtog pa'i cho ga sogs //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rtog pa'i cho ga sogs //
translated: The maṇḍala, the ritual of the imagination, and so forth,

original: spyod pa bsnyen bsgrub 'bras ldan pa //
analyzed: spyod pa bsnyen bsgrub 'bras ldan pa //
translated: the conduct, the approach, the accomplishment, and the result,

original: yan lag don rgyas rnam bshad pa //
analyzed: yan lag don rgyas rnam bshad pa //
translated: the extensive explanation of the meaning of the branches,

original: ji bzhin sgra zhes bstan pa yin //
analyzed: ji bzhin sgra zhes bstan pa yin //
translated: is taught to be the literal.

original: ko ta lsha /🔽ko ta bha na /🔽ko ta we /
analyzed: ko ta lsha / ko ta bha na / ko ta we /
translated: koṭalaśa🔽koṭabhaṇa🔽koṭave

original: ko ta bha tha pa /
analyzed: ko ta bha tha pa /
translated: koṭabhaṭhapa

original: ko ta ra ka /🔽ko la kha /
analyzed: ko ta ra ka / ko la kha /
translated: koṭaraka🔽kolākha

original: ko la ba /🔽ko la bha shal /
analyzed: ko la ba / ko la bha shal /
translated: kolābha🔽kolābhaśala

original: ko la sta th'a /
analyzed: ko la sta th'a /
translated: kolāstathā

original: ki la bha bhi /
analyzed: ki la bha bhi /
translated: kilābhabbhi

original: 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te /
translated: This explains the sense faculties and the objects.

original: de lte bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgo nas sbas pa'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de lte bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgo nas sbas pa'i bshad pa'o //
translated: The vajra words such as “navel” and so forth are the hidden explanation, in terms of not being the literal meaning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda'i gsang ba gang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda'i gsang ba gang //
translated: What is the secret of the symbols of the transcendent lords?

original: ko ta kasha sogs mkha' 'gros bstan pa dang / brda spyod gsang ba 'jig rten ma grags pas //
analyzed: ko ta kasha sogs mkha' 'gros bstan pa dang / brda spyod gsang ba 'jig rten ma grags pas //
translated: The dakinis’ teachings on koṭi and so forth, and the secret symbolic language unknown in the world,

original: ji bzhin ma yin sgrar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma yin sgrar bstan pa'o //
translated: are taught as words that are not the literal meaning.

original: byang chub sems nyid spros med las //
analyzed: byang chub sems nyid spros med las //
translated: From the unelaborate reality of the enlightened mind,

original: mtha' bral rnam par mi rtog pas //
analyzed: mtha' bral rnam par mi rtog pas //
translated: the nonconceptual that is free from extremes,

original: dmigs med phyag rgya chen po ste //
analyzed: dmigs med phyag rgya chen po ste //
translated: the great seal that is without objective reference,

original: mi gnas zung 'jug bla na med //
analyzed: mi gnas zung 'jug bla na med //
translated: the unsurpassed union that does not abide,

original: rdo rje rang 'byung ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: rdo rje rang 'byung ting nge 'dzin //
translated: the vajra, the self-arisen meditative absorption,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: the very essence of the transcendent lords,

original: rgyal bas nges pa'i don du gsungs //
analyzed: rgyal bas nges pa'i don du gsungs //
translated: is taught by the Victor as the definitive meaning.

original: mtha' drug rnam par dbye ba gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' drug rnam par dbye ba gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: The definitive order of the six limits.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: The glorious compendium of Vajra Wisdom, the fourth chapter.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa /
translated: The great bodhisattva said:

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje theg pa chen po'i rgyud sde gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje theg pa chen po'i rgyud sde gang lags /
translated: “Bhagavān, what are the classes of tantras of the Great Vajra Vehicle?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: rgyud sde ni 'di lta ste /🔽rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang // bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog @389a *//
analyzed: rgyud sde ni 'di lta ste / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang // bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog @389a *//
translated: “The classes of tantras are as follows:

original: pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: pa'i rgyud do //
translated: the tantras of highest yoga, the tantras of yoga, the tantras of performance, the tantras of action, and the tantras of imagination.

original: byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byams pas gsol pa /
translated: Maitreya asked:

original: rgyud de rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags /
analyzed: rgyud de rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags /
translated: “What is the extent of those tantras?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: rnal 'byor bla na med pa rgyud ni stong phrag bcu gnyis te rgyas par phyen grangs med do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla na med pa rgyud ni stong phrag bcu gnyis te rgyas par phyen grangs med do //
translated: “The tantras of highest yoga are twelve thousand, and if expanded, they are innumerable.

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la stong phrag drug go /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la stong phrag drug go /
translated: The tantras of yoga are six thousand.

original: spyod pa'i rgyud la stong phrag brgyad do //
analyzed: spyod pa'i rgyud la stong phrag brgyad do //
translated: The tantras of performance are eight thousand.

original: bya ba'i rgyud la stong phrag bzhi'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud la stong phrag bzhi'o //
translated: The tantras of action are four thousand.

original: rtog pa dang phra mo'i rgyud la stong phrag bzhi'o //
analyzed: rtog pa dang phra mo'i rgyud la stong phrag bzhi'o //
translated: The tantras of imagination and subtle are four thousand.

original: de dag stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni /🔽ka kha ga gha nga /
analyzed: de dag stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni / ka kha ga gha nga /
translated: These are thirty-four thousand, as many as there are final letters in the names of the tantras and the [explanatory] commentaries.

original: tsa tsha rdza rdzha nya /🔽ta tha da dha na /
analyzed: tsa tsha rdza rdzha nya / ta tha da dha na /
translated: Ka, kha, ga, gha, ṅa,🔽ca, cha, ja, jha, ña,🔽ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa,

original: ta th'a da dha ni /
analyzed: ta th'a da dha ni /
translated: ta, tha, da, dha, na,

original: pa pha ba bha ma /
analyzed: pa pha ba bha ma /
translated: pa, pha, ba, bha, ma,

original: ya ra la wa /
analyzed: ya ra la wa /
translated: ya, ra, la, va,

original: sha sha sa ha katha /🔽aa a'a ai a'i au a'u /
analyzed: sha sha sa ha katha / aa a'a ai a'i au a'u /
translated: śa, ṣa, sa, ha, kṣa,

original: ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam a:/
analyzed: ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam a:/
translated: a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, ṛ, ṛ, ḷ, ḷ, e, ai, o, au, am, aḥ.

original: 'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i tshogs rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i tshogs rnams so //
translated: These are the groups of letters.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa /
translated: The great bodhisattva said:

original: bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa'i cho ga dang sgrub pa de gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa'i cho ga dang sgrub pa de gang lags /
translated: Blessed One, what are their functions, rituals, and accomplishments?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: don dam pa'i bden pa las rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa las rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje
translated: Having arisen from ultimate truth by the stage of self-consecration, in order to demonstrate the abode of enlightenment arisen from passion, in the midst of the retinue of queens, in the form of a universal monarch, with the samādhi of great bliss, the vajra

original: btsun mo'i bha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te /
analyzed: btsun mo'i bha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te /
translated: is perfectly situated in the bhaga of the queen.

original: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug dang tshul bzhi'i sgo nas rab tu spyod de bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug dang tshul bzhi'i sgo nas rab tu spyod de bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should practice and accomplish the marvelous, which is contrary to worldly conduct, by means of the six parameters and four methods of the vajra words.

original: @389b zhes rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gnas so //
analyzed: @389b zhes rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gnas so //
translated: Thus, it abides in the great yoga tantra.

original: rig ma dang lha mo dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rig ma dang lha mo dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
translated: One should place the consort and goddess together in the maṇḍala circle.

original: de nas las byed pa'i sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu spyod de sgrub par byed pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bzhugs so //
analyzed: de nas las byed pa'i sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu spyod de sgrub par byed pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bzhugs so //
translated: Then, the one who practices the accomplishment of the rite and so forth practices and accomplishes the ten kinds of reality by means of the four methods, abiding in the yoga tantra.

original: las kyi bya ba sna tshogs rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu spyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
analyzed: las kyi bya ba sna tshogs rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu spyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
translated: The tantra of extensive performance of various ritual actions, the characteristics of the seal of visualization, and the performance of practice is found in the tantra of performance.

original: 'khor ba la shin tu 'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul rang rkyen gyis rgyu'i bar spyod pa sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so ///
analyzed: 'khor ba la shin tu 'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul rang rkyen gyis rgyu'i bar spyod pa sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so ///
translated: The tantra of the performance of practice of the absence of the bliss of the gnosis being, the absence of the pride of the deity in oneself, and the performance of the field of activity of the marvelous by one’s own conditions up to the cause is found in the tantra of action.

original: sngags dang sman dang / sbyin sreg dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu spyad pa sgrub par byed pa phra mo dang rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
analyzed: sngags dang sman dang / sbyin sreg dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu spyad pa sgrub par byed pa phra mo dang rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
translated: The performance of practice of the eight great accomplishments such as mantra, medicine, fire sacrifice, eye medicine, swift feet, and so on is found in the tantra of minor and conceptual practice.

original: gsang chen rgyud kyi ngo bo dang // nges tshig sgra 'jug rgyu mtshan dang // khyad par dbye thabs dang ldan pa //
analyzed: gsang chen rgyud kyi ngo bo dang // nges tshig sgra 'jug rgyu mtshan dang // khyad par dbye thabs dang ldan pa //
translated: and the distinctions and methods of division,🔽the measure of the text, the measure of mastery,

original: gzhung tshad dang ni ldang tshad dang // brjod bya rjod byed ston tshul lo //
analyzed: gzhung tshad dang ni ldang tshad dang // brjod bya rjod byed ston tshul lo //
translated: and the way of teaching the subject matter and the means of expression.

original: sems bskyed sngon 'gro mtshungs ldan pas //
analyzed: sems bskyed sngon 'gro mtshungs ldan pas //
translated: The preliminaries of arousing bodhicitta are concordant.

original: khyad par smin lam byin rlabs lam //
analyzed: khyad par smin lam byin rlabs lam //
translated: The special ripening path is the path of blessings.

original: rjes snang 'brel pa thun mong min //
analyzed: rjes snang 'brel pa thun mong min //
translated: The subsequent appearance is the uncommon connection.

original: bde ba lam myur mthong chos 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba lam myur mthong chos 'gyur //
translated: Bliss is the swift path, the present life is transformed.

original: de nyid thabs zab bla na med //
analyzed: de nyid thabs zab bla na med //
translated: That is the profound, unsurpassed method.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyi //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyi //
translated: The essence of the supreme, great glorious Vajradhara

original: sku gsung thugs las mi phyed pa //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs las mi phyed pa //
translated: is inseparable from the body, speech, and mind.

original: bde chen mchog gi snying po nyid //
analyzed: bde chen mchog gi snying po nyid //
translated: The essence of the supreme great bliss

original: ngo bo ye shes dri med @390a *//
analyzed: ngo bo ye shes dri med @390a *//
translated: is the essence of the stainless pristine consciousness.

original: pa'o // tantra zhes pa rgyud yin te //
analyzed: pa'o // tantra zhes pa rgyud yin te //
translated: Tantra is a continuum.

original: tentra shes pa dngos la rgyu na //
analyzed: tentra shes pa dngos la rgyu na //
translated: Tantra is a cause in the actual.

original: tra ya dus gsum thog med pas //
analyzed: tra ya dus gsum thog med pas //
translated: Since there is no beginning in the three times,

original: 'dren pa rtog tshogs 'joms byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dren pa rtog tshogs 'joms byed pa'o //
translated: the guide destroys the assembly of concepts.

original: rgyun chags 'brel ba ma tshang med //
analyzed: rgyun chags 'brel ba ma tshang med //
translated: The unbroken connection is not incomplete.

original: rgyas byed sems can khams las ni //
analyzed: rgyas byed sems can khams las ni //
translated: The extensive one is from the element of sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The bodhisattvas are the practitioners.

original: sangs rgyas mdzad pa mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzad pa mtha' yas pa //
translated: The buddhas have infinite deeds.

original: bar mi bcad cing ye shes rgyun //
analyzed: bar mi bcad cing ye shes rgyun //
translated: The uninterrupted middle and the stream of gnosis

original: phrin las mi zad 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: phrin las mi zad 'khor lo ste //
translated: are the wheel of inexhaustible activity.

original: rgyud ces sgrar btags de nyid do //
analyzed: rgyud ces sgrar btags de nyid do //
translated: The designation of tantra is just that.

original: gleng bzhi gleng slong gsang chen la //
analyzed: gleng bzhi gleng slong gsang chen la //
translated: The extensive one is the great secret of the introduction of the introduction.

original: rgyas pa sdus ngo bo mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: rgyas pa sdus ngo bo mi 'gyur ba //
translated: The essence is not changed.

original: 'jig gnas mthar phyin bla na med //
analyzed: 'jig gnas mthar phyin bla na med //
translated: The highest one is the end of the destruction and dwelling.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i ldang tshad do //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i ldang tshad do //
translated: That is the measure of the Vajrayāna.

original: sngon rgyu gdung ba shes che la //🔽sprong bar mi nus 'jug phyir na //
analyzed: sngon rgyu gdung ba shes che la // sprong bar mi nus 'jug phyir na //
translated: Previously, the cause is the great knowledge of the affliction.

original: dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o //
translated: Because it is not possible to expand, it is like the great Īśvara.

original: lam la gnas pa rim gnyis chos //
analyzed: lam la gnas pa rim gnyis chos //
translated: The path is the two stages.🔽The essence is unchanging.

original: ngo bo mi 'gyur mchog gsang ba //
analyzed: ngo bo mi 'gyur mchog gsang ba //
translated: The secret is supreme.

original: sa lam bgrod pa mthar phyin pas //
analyzed: sa lam bgrod pa mthar phyin pas //
translated: The path is traversed to the end.

original: bla ma'i lam ni gtsor gyur pa //
analyzed: bla ma'i lam ni gtsor gyur pa //
translated: The guru path is the principal one.

original: bla na med pa tshe 'dis thob //
analyzed: bla na med pa tshe 'dis thob //
translated: The unsurpassed is attained in this life.

original: rgyu dang thabs lam 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang thabs lam 'bras bu ste /
translated: The cause, the path of methods, and the result

original: sgrub byed gsang brtsa ba'i rgyud //
analyzed: sgrub byed gsang brtsa ba'i rgyud //
translated: are the secret means of accomplishment, the root tantra.

original: sting bo mchog las rab 'byam spyod //
analyzed: sting bo mchog las rab 'byam spyod //
translated: The supreme essence is the conduct of the great scope.

original: gsal byed phyi ma bde blag 'gyur //
analyzed: gsal byed phyi ma bde blag 'gyur //
translated: The later elucidations are easy to understand.

original: dka' ba spyod dang kha skong byed //
analyzed: dka' ba spyod dang kha skong byed //
translated: The difficult conduct and the supplementary conduct🔽are the bestowal of certainty to the doubtful

original: the tshoms la nges ster ba dang // dus rtags blo la sbyar ba ste //
analyzed: the tshoms la nges ster ba dang // dus rtags blo la sbyar ba ste //
translated: and the application of the signs of time to the mind.

original: snod rig skal pa'i khyad par bstan //
analyzed: snod rig skal pa'i khyad par bstan //
translated: The distinctions of the fortunate one's fortune are shown.

original: gsang ba chen po spyi dang bye brag thams cad du //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po spyi dang bye brag thams cad du //
translated: In all the general and specific great secrets,🔽the different and the single abiding are samādhi,

original: tha dad bdang gcig gnas pa ting 'dzin dang // mthar thug rim pa dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni //
analyzed: tha dad bdang gcig gnas pa ting 'dzin dang // mthar thug rim pa dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni //
translated: the stages of the ultimate, the pledges, and the enlightened body, speech, and mind.

original: sdom @390b pa'i de nyid kun tu khyab pa byang chub sems //
analyzed: sdom @390b pa'i de nyid kun tu khyab pa byang chub sems //
translated: The reality of the vows is the all-pervading awakening mind,

original: yang dag bde ba chen po phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa //
analyzed: yang dag bde ba chen po phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa //
translated: sealed with the great, true bliss.

original: ye shes tshad med rgya chad phyogs su lhung ba med //
analyzed: ye shes tshad med rgya chad phyogs su lhung ba med //
translated: Wisdom is immeasurable, vast, and does not fall into extremes.

original: mnyam nyid spros pa med pa dag pa chen po ste //
analyzed: mnyam nyid spros pa med pa dag pa chen po ste //
translated: Equality is free from elaborations, the great purity,

original: sgra dang sgra min las 'das rgyud ni bla med pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang sgra min las 'das rgyud ni bla med pa'o //
translated: the unsurpassed tantra that transcends sound and nonsound.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the fifth chapter, on the tantra, in this Ornament of Abhidharma.

original: byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byams pas gsol pa /
translated: Maitreya asked,

original: bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba dang po'i mdzad pa gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba dang po'i mdzad pa gang lags /
translated: “Bhagavān, what is the activity of the first yoga?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied,

original: dpal bde ba chen po'i 'byung ba 'og min chos kyi dbyings dkyil 'khor chen po yong su dag pa tshad med pa'i phro brang du /
analyzed: dpal bde ba chen po'i 'byung ba 'og min chos kyi dbyings dkyil 'khor chen po yong su dag pa tshad med pa'i phro brang du /
translated: “In the great palace of the totally pure realm of reality, Akaniṣṭha, the source of great bliss,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus su bzhugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus su bzhugs te /
translated: the tathāgata Bodhicittavajra resided in the center, surrounded by the retinue of all tathāgatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa'i gsang ba bla na med par dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa'i gsang ba bla na med par dbang bskur ba /
translated: He conferred the unsurpassable empowerment of the secret assembly of tathāgatas to the bodhisattva mahāsattvas,

original: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po gsang ba chen po yongs su dag cing ye shes yongs su dag pa thob pa ni dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i yon tan phrin las mi zad pa rgyan gyis 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po gsang ba chen po yongs su dag cing ye shes yongs su dag pa thob pa ni dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i yon tan phrin las mi zad pa rgyan gyis 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
translated: the source of the inexhaustible ornaments of the qualities and activities of all maṇḍalas, the totally pure great secret of the essence of the vajra body, speech, and mind, the attainment of totally pure gnosis.

original: spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pa /
translated: He is the one who emanates and gathers.

original: spros pa med cing snang ba rnam par dag pa de nyid la gnas pa ni sbyor ba dang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: spros pa med cing snang ba rnam par dag pa de nyid la gnas pa ni sbyor ba dang po zhes bya'o //
translated: He is the one who abides in that very absence of conceptual elaboration and the purity of appearances. This is called the first application.

original: byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byams pas gsol pa /
translated: Maitreya said:

original: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ji ltar du ston par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ji ltar du ston par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: How will the supreme king of maṇḍalas be revealed?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: 'di nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor gdu //
analyzed: 'di nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor gdu //
translated: This very [mandala] is the immeasurable maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs @391a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs @391a *//
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the Tathāgatas

original: rdo rje bla na med pa'i mchog /🔽rten dang brten par bcas pa yi //
analyzed: rdo rje bla na med pa'i mchog / rten dang brten par bcas pa yi //
translated: Are the unsurpassed supreme vajra.🔽The essence of the palace of the Sugatas,

original: bde gshegs pho brang snying po ni //
analyzed: bde gshegs pho brang snying po ni //
translated: With the support and the supported,

original: 'dod pa khams kyi 'gro ba rnams //
analyzed: 'dod pa khams kyi 'gro ba rnams //
translated: Is the realm of desire.

original: ri rab chen po'i steng du ni //
analyzed: ri rab chen po'i steng du ni //
translated: On the top of the great Mount Meru,

original: khang bu brtsegs pa ga la bar //
analyzed: khang bu brtsegs pa ga la bar //
translated: In the direction of the multi-storied palace,

original: dbang po brgya byin 'khor bcas pa //
analyzed: dbang po brgya byin 'khor bcas pa //
translated: Indra, the lord of the gods, and his retinue,

original: nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis sogs //
analyzed: nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis sogs //
translated: The thirty-two Yāma gods, and so forth,

original: rin chen rang byung mchod sprin ldan //
analyzed: rin chen rang byung mchod sprin ldan //
translated: Possess a cloud of self-arisen precious offerings.

original: dbang bskur rim pa ston par mdzad //
analyzed: dbang bskur rim pa ston par mdzad //
translated: They bestow the stage of empowerment.

original: dbang phyug au mar bcas pa dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug gdong drug sogs //
analyzed: dbang phyug au mar bcas pa dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug gdong drug sogs //
translated: Brahmā, Viṣṇu, Gaṇeśa, and so forth,🔽in order to tame them,

original: 'dul phyir yul dang dbang po ni //
analyzed: 'dul phyir yul dang dbang po ni //
translated: the two, object and sense faculty,

original: gnyis med mnyam par sbyor ba las //
analyzed: gnyis med mnyam par sbyor ba las //
translated: are united in nondual equality.

original: longs spyod bde ba'i spyod pa yis //
analyzed: longs spyod bde ba'i spyod pa yis //
translated: Through the conduct of enjoying bliss,

original: rnam par dag pa bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bya ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to purify them,

original: dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug par mdzad //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug par mdzad //
translated: they enter the maṇḍala.

original: de nas dag khams de nyid du //
analyzed: de nas dag khams de nyid du //
translated: Then, in that very pure realm,

original: de bzhin nyid kyi dang las 'das pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi dang las 'das pa yi //
translated: beyond suchness and the stage of the ultimate,

original: byang chub sems mchog rdo rje bla med pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems mchog rdo rje bla med pa //
translated: the supreme bodhicitta, the unsurpassed vajra,

original: zil gnon rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la zhugs //
analyzed: zil gnon rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la zhugs //
translated: is the vajra samādhi of overpowering.🔽The equality of the indivisible dhātu and pristine consciousness,

original: dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med mnyam nyid dang // rnal 'byor bde chen mngon par byang chub pa //
analyzed: dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med mnyam nyid dang // rnal 'byor bde chen mngon par byang chub pa //
translated: the manifest awakening of the great bliss of yoga,

original: nyi zla padma a'a li k'a li bcas //
analyzed: nyi zla padma a'a li k'a li bcas //
translated: with the sun, moon, lotus, ālikāli,🔽and so on,

original: thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje de nyid las //
analyzed: thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje de nyid las //
translated: the reality of the vajra of mind, speech, and body,

original: 'od spros 'jig rten khams su khyab gyur pas //
analyzed: 'od spros 'jig rten khams su khyab gyur pas //
translated: emanates light that pervades the world systems

original: brtan g-yor bcas pa yongs su dag par gyur //
analyzed: brtan g-yor bcas pa yongs su dag par gyur //
translated: and purifies the animate and inanimate.

original: byin gyis brlabs kyi snang ba'i rgyud sbyangs pas //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs kyi snang ba'i rgyud sbyangs pas //
translated: By purifying the continuum of the appearance of the blessing,

original: 'gro ba rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang bkod //
analyzed: 'gro ba rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang bkod //
translated: Sentient beings are established in the state of Vajrasattva.

original: bde ba dang ni yid bde thob gyur te //
analyzed: bde ba dang ni yid bde thob gyur te //
translated: Having attained bliss and mental bliss,

original: rjes su rnal 'byor ye shes rgya mtsho las //
analyzed: rjes su rnal 'byor ye shes rgya mtsho las //
translated: From the ocean of wisdom of subsequent yoga,

original: mi byed dbang phyug byang chub sems kyi sku //
analyzed: mi byed dbang phyug byang chub sems kyi sku //
translated: The body of the bodhicitta of the non-acting Maheśvara,

original: @391b ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting 'dzin las //🔽byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa dang // sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid mchog /
analyzed: @391b ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting 'dzin las // byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa dang // sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid mchog /
translated: From the vajra samādhi of the arising of wisdom,🔽The display of the blessing is shown,🔽And the blessing of mantra is the supreme reality.

original: dbang bskur ba yi cho 'phrul bla na med //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba yi cho 'phrul bla na med //
translated: The display of the unsurpassed empowerment

original: gsol ba lhun grub snying po'i ngang la ste //
analyzed: gsol ba lhun grub snying po'i ngang la ste //
translated: Rests in the state of the spontaneously accomplished essence.

original: aom a'a: h'um dang sv'a h'a 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um dang sv'a h'a 'od 'phro ba //
translated: Om āḥ hūṃ and svāhā radiate light,

original: 'od zer gyis ni phyogs bcur khyab par mdzad //
analyzed: 'od zer gyis ni phyogs bcur khyab par mdzad //
translated: And the light pervades the ten directions.

original: l'am m'am b'am t'am a'am las 'byung ba bzhi //
analyzed: l'am m'am b'am t'am a'am las 'byung ba bzhi //
translated: The four arise from la ma ba ta a la,

original: meem thlim aom aom aom h'um aom sam las //
analyzed: meem thlim aom aom aom h'um aom sam las //
translated: And from meṃ thliṃ oṃ oṃ oṃ hūṃ oṃ saṃ,

original: rnam shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin sems dpa' che //
analyzed: rnam shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin sems dpa' che //
translated: The nature of the eight consciousnesses is the great being.

original: r'u sha ga ra spa ste 'dod yon nyid //
analyzed: r'u sha ga ra spa ste 'dod yon nyid //
translated: The six seed syllables are the six sense objects.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: h'um drug 'od 'bar las //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: h'um drug 'od 'bar las //
translated: From the six blazing light rays of JAH, HUM, VAM, HOH, HUM, and TRAM

original: mthar byed khro bo'i rgyal po yum bcas bcu //
analyzed: mthar byed khro bo'i rgyal po yum bcas bcu //
translated: Come the ten wrathful kings and their queens,

original: yan lag tshogs gnas phyogs kyi gdon 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag tshogs gnas phyogs kyi gdon 'joms pa'o //
translated: Who destroy the obstructing forces that dwell in the limbs and the directions.

original: shin tu rnal 'byor rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul ston //
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul ston //
translated: The supreme yoga is the display of magical powers.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'chang de nyid //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'chang de nyid //
translated: Then the vajra holder of the bodhichitta of all tathagatas

original: zhal gsum phyag drug rgyan bcas gzigs par gyur //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug rgyan bcas gzigs par gyur //
translated: Had three faces and six arms, and was adorned with ornaments.

original: mtshan dpe rdzogs pa phyag rgya ldan par snang //
analyzed: mtshan dpe rdzogs pa phyag rgya ldan par snang //
translated: He appeared with the major and minor marks of enlightenment and with the mudras.

original: de nyid chos dbyings rdo rje yum bcas bzhi //
analyzed: de nyid chos dbyings rdo rje yum bcas bzhi //
translated: He was the very same one, with the vajra of the dharmadhatu as his consort.

original: chos 'byung nas byon thugs ka'i dbus ma nas //
analyzed: chos 'byung nas byon thugs ka'i dbus ma nas //
translated: From the dharmodaya, he came to the center of the heart.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa du ma spros pa las //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa du ma spros pa las //
translated: He emanated many tathagatas

original: ched du brjod pa gsang ba de nyid gsungs //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa gsang ba de nyid gsungs //
translated: And uttered the secret declaration of the nature of reality.

original: kun rdzob cho 'phrul mi zad 'khor lo bstan //
analyzed: kun rdzob cho 'phrul mi zad 'khor lo bstan //
translated: He displayed the inexhaustible wheel of relative magical displays.

original: de rjes 'dod pa khams pa gdul don du //
analyzed: de rjes 'dod pa khams pa gdul don du //
translated: After that, in order to tame the beings of the desire realm,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis dang ba'i tshul //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis dang ba'i tshul //
translated: In the form of Vajrasattva, with a joyful expression.

original: rnam snang mdzad pa rdo rje 'dzin sku las //
analyzed: rnam snang mdzad pa rdo rje 'dzin sku las //
translated: From the body of Vajradhara, Vairocana,

original: sku yi cha zhu lha mo'i tshul bstan pa //
analyzed: sku yi cha zhu lha mo'i tshul bstan pa //
translated: The body melts and appears in the form of goddesses.

original: spro dang bsdu ba ye shes mngon rol pa'i //
analyzed: spro dang bsdu ba ye shes mngon rol pa'i //
translated: The conduct of the display of wisdom,

original: spyod pa bde chen dgyes bar bstan pa'o //🔽dpal ldan mi @392a *//
analyzed: spyod pa bde chen dgyes bar bstan pa'o // dpal ldan mi @392a *//
translated: Is taught as the delight of great bliss.

original: bskyod rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog /
analyzed: bskyod rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog /
translated: The supreme mandala of glorious Akṣobhya Vajra,

original: rdul med pa nyid gru bzhir byin brlabs pa //
analyzed: rdul med pa nyid gru bzhir byin brlabs pa //
translated: Is blessed as the dustless, four-cornered [space].

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dpag med //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dpag med //
translated: Then, the assembly of immeasurable tathāgatas,

original: phyogs dus kun nas khyab cing yongs su bskor //
analyzed: phyogs dus kun nas khyab cing yongs su bskor //
translated: Pervading and surrounding in all directions and times,

original: byang chub sems nyid rdo rje dbus bzhugs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems nyid rdo rje dbus bzhugs so //
translated: Reside in the center of the vajra of awakening mind.

original: bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad pa rin chen 'byung //
analyzed: bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad pa rin chen 'byung //
translated: The blessed Vairocana, Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: 'od dpag med pa gdon mi za ba nyid //
analyzed: 'od dpag med pa gdon mi za ba nyid //
translated: Amitābha, and Amoghasiddhi themselves,

original: bder gshegs dpag med rnams dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: bder gshegs dpag med rnams dang lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with the immeasurable sugatas,

original: bar snang ye shes yum dang gnyis med pa //
analyzed: bar snang ye shes yum dang gnyis med pa //
translated: In the space, non-dual with the mother of wisdom,

original: shin tu rnal 'byor rim pa yang dag pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor rim pa yang dag pa'o //
translated: Is the perfect stage of the highest yoga.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjes byin rlabs pa //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjes byin rlabs pa //
translated: Blessed by the vajra of body, speech, and mind,

original: dam tshig pa dang ye shes sems dpa' che //
analyzed: dam tshig pa dang ye shes sems dpa' che //
translated: The pledge being and the great wisdom being,

original: nus pa brtan dang dbang bskur rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa brtan dang dbang bskur rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Stable capacity and the seal of empowerment.

original: ting 'dzin sems dpa' thugs kar nges gnas pa //
analyzed: ting 'dzin sems dpa' thugs kar nges gnas pa //
translated: The concentration being definitely abides in the heart,

original: rnal 'byor chen po yi ni mgon po mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po yi ni mgon po mchog /
translated: The supreme lord of great yoga,

original: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The being of great awareness, the tathāgata,

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Abides in nondual method and wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med 'dus pa'i dus //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med 'dus pa'i dus //
translated: At the time of the assembly of immeasurable tathāgatas,

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med brjod mi lang //🔽rdo rje rin chen padma sprin phreng ba'i //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med brjod mi lang // rdo rje rin chen padma sprin phreng ba'i //
translated: The assembly of immeasurable, inexpressible maṇḍalas🔽Is offered with clouds of offerings filling the sky

original: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis bar snang gang bas mchod //
analyzed: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis bar snang gang bas mchod //
translated: Of the assemblies of vajra, jewel, lotus, and garland offerings.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin gshegs pa la //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin gshegs pa la //
translated: To Mahāvajradhara, the tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs dang sems dpa' thams cad kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs dang sems dpa' thams cad kyis //
translated: The tathāgatas and all the bodhisattvas

original: thun mong du ni gsol ba btab gyur pa //
analyzed: thun mong du ni gsol ba btab gyur pa //
translated: Make a common request:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
translated: “All tathāgatas,

original: 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba //
analyzed: 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the secret assembly,

original: rdo rje snying pos bsdus pa yi //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos bsdus pa yi //
translated: The vajra essence is included in the vajra essence.

original: bcom @392b ldan snying po bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bcom @392b ldan snying po bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain the essence of the Bhagavān.”

original: zhes zhus shing gsol pa btab par gyur la //
analyzed: zhes zhus shing gsol pa btab par gyur la //
translated: Thus they made requests and supplications.

original: de tshe rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: de tshe rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa //
translated: At that time, Vajradhara replied:

original: 'dir ni legs gyis gsang ba nges pa la //
analyzed: 'dir ni legs gyis gsang ba nges pa la //
translated: “Here, in the definitive secret,

analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // nor bu padma sdigs mdzub mdzad //

analyzed: rnam 'tshe zhi mdzad sa bdag gnon //

analyzed: las kyi gnas su khro bo rnams // sa bon phyag mtshan rtsa gnas la //

analyzed: g-yas mthing thod dbyug g-yon par ni //

analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: sgo bzhi bsrung //
