analyzed: drug ldan h'um gis brgyan pa ni // lcags kyu dpung g-yas rtse @397a *//

analyzed: gsum g-yon // lha dar dbyug pa tri sh'u la //

original: khro rgyal thams cad yum dang ldan //
analyzed: khro rgyal thams cad yum dang ldan //

original: rin chen klu dbang rgyan gyis spras //
analyzed: rin chen klu dbang rgyan gyis spras //

analyzed: yan lag rags shing brjid pa'i sku //

analyzed: ha ha h'um h'um sgra sgrogs pas //

analyzed: srid gsum g-yo bar mdzad pa po //

analyzed: log lta can rnams 'dul mdzad pa //

original: yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba dgyes //
analyzed: yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba dgyes //

original: gsang ba bde ba chen po yi //
analyzed: gsang ba bde ba chen po yi //

original: dkyil 'khor ye shes snying po bstan //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ye shes snying po bstan //

original: lha tshogs mngon par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: lha tshogs mngon par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to //

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the eleventh chapter of the glorious Wisdom Vajra Compendium.

original: zab pa'i rgyan la rnam par dbye ba gang //🔽mtha' ldan dang ni bshad tshul dbye ba yis //
analyzed: zab pa'i rgyan la rnam par dbye ba gang // mtha' ldan dang ni bshad tshul dbye ba yis //

original: nus pa khyad par gyur pa rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: nus pa khyad par gyur pa rgyan dang ldan //
translated: It is endowed with an ornament of special ability by means of the analysis of the end and the mode of explanation.

original: sa yi dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyan bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sa yi dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyan bstan pa'o //

original: rgya che'i rgyan la spyi dang bye brag can //
analyzed: rgya che'i rgyan la spyi dang bye brag can //
translated: The ornament of the vast has a general and a specific [part].

analyzed: rgya che la ni mtshon don ston pa dang // rigs can lngas ni nges par 'jug gyur pa //

original: gang zag dang ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i gnas //
analyzed: gang zag dang ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i gnas //

original: lnga tshad gzugs khams tshad med ldan //
analyzed: lnga tshad gzugs khams tshad med ldan //

original: tshul ldan ston pa'i mtshan nyid dang // rgyud dang gleng gzhi nges pa'i tshig /
analyzed: tshul ldan ston pa'i mtshan nyid dang // rgyud dang gleng gzhi nges pa'i tshig /

original: rgyu yis mthar 'byin spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu yis mthar 'byin spyod pa'o //

original: chos kyi tha dad pa yi rgyan //
analyzed: chos kyi tha dad pa yi rgyan //

original: tshogs slob gnyis dang bden gnyis so //
analyzed: tshogs slob gnyis dang bden gnyis so //

original: de nas byang @397b chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa //
analyzed: de nas byang @397b chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa //

original: don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyad par bgyi //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyad par bgyi //
translated: How should one practice for the benefit of sentient beings, relying on the samādhi of the supreme king of actions of the great yoga abiding in ultimate truth?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as one does not perform the benefit of sentient beings through actions such as pacification, for that long one abides in the limit of reality.

original: gang du sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug cing mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed do //
analyzed: gang du sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug cing mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed do //
translated: When one sees the benefit to be done for all sentient beings, at that time one arises from the limit of reality, performs the benefit of sentient beings, enters into the limit of reality itself, and manifests non-abiding nirvāṇa.

original: gang du 'gro ba'i don 'byung ba //
analyzed: gang du 'gro ba'i don 'byung ba //

original: dus la bab pa de yi tshe //
analyzed: dus la bab pa de yi tshe //

original: rdo rje'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i tshe //
analyzed: rdo rje'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i tshe //

original: thogs pa med par phrin las kun //
analyzed: thogs pa med par phrin las kun //
translated: all activities are unobstructed.

original: gdul bya'i bsam pa ji lta bar //
analyzed: gdul bya'i bsam pa ji lta bar //

analyzed: nges pa nyid du 'byung 'gyur ba'o //
translated: they will definitely occur.🔽When the earth wind is stabilized and

translated: The object of the vāyu is the sharp

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags /
translated: Blessed One, what are the seven ornaments?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang / bshad tshul rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas slob ma brtag pa dang /

translated: The five introductions, the four reasonings, the explanation with the six limits, the four modes of explanation, the two divisions, the examination of disciples through the five types of persons,

original: bden pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa'o //
translated: and the intention of the two truths.

original: gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste /

original: mtshan dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so //
analyzed: mtshan dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so //
translated: the title, the person, the agent, the measure, and the purpose.

original: dang po gleng gzhi gleng slong bstan pa las //
analyzed: dang po gleng gzhi gleng slong bstan pa las //

original: phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan bsdus pa //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan bsdus pa //

original: gser gyi 'khor lo rin chen chos mthun pa //
analyzed: gser gyi 'khor lo rin chen chos mthun pa //

original: spyi bo'i gnas su ae bam rdo rje bzhugs //
analyzed: spyi bo'i gnas su ae bam rdo rje bzhugs //
translated: existing in the crown as the vajra of evam.

original: ston pa chags can 'khor dang de bzhin chos //
analyzed: ston pa chags can 'khor dang de bzhin chos //

original: ye shes dus ldan tshad las dgos pa bsgrub //
analyzed: ye shes dus ldan tshad las dgos pa bsgrub //
translated: Timely pristine consciousness, and the accomplishment of the purpose.

original: byang sems rdo rje cho ga dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: byang sems rdo rje cho ga dbang bskur ba //

analyzed: rnam grangs le'u gnas tshul lnga ldan pa //

analyzed: byang chub phyogs las dum bu dbye bar gyur //

analyzed: rnal 'byor bsnyen bsgrub yan lag mchog dang ni //

analyzed: rdo rje rnam bzhi yan lag rim pas bsdus // dgos pa'i khyad par las dang dngos grub las //

analyzed: grub pa brgyad dang mchog ldan yang dag pa'o //

original: bde chen 'khor lor thig le gtso gyur pa'i //
analyzed: bde chen 'khor lor thig le gtso gyur pa'i //

analyzed: dgu brgya phrag gcig @399a *//
translated: times.

original: ye shes rlung gyur pa //
analyzed: ye shes rlung gyur pa //
translated: The pristine consciousness becomes the vāyu

original: bcu gcig bzhi cha phrag lnga'i rtsa gnas so //
analyzed: bcu gcig bzhi cha phrag lnga'i rtsa gnas so //
translated: in the nāḍī locations of the five groups of four and one-eleventh.

original: lnga bcu phrag gnyis a'a li k'a li ste //
analyzed: lnga bcu phrag gnyis a'a li k'a li ste //
translated: The two groups of fifty are ālikāli,

original: rtsibs stong ldan pa sbas pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: rtsibs stong ldan pa sbas pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: the hidden cakra with one thousand spokes.

original: spyod pa rim ldan rjes su gsang ba ste //
analyzed: spyod pa rim ldan rjes su gsang ba ste //
translated: The conduct, the sequence, and the secret,🔽The marvelous maṇḍala, the essence, the invocation,🔽The mantra, the generation of the wisdom body, the activity,

original: rmad byung dkyil 'khor snying po bskul ba dang // sngags dang ye shes sku ba bskyed 'phrin las dang // rab 'byam rigs 'dzin yan lag 'bras bu bstan //
analyzed: rmad byung dkyil 'khor snying po bskul ba dang // sngags dang ye shes sku ba bskyed 'phrin las dang // rab 'byam rigs 'dzin yan lag 'bras bu bstan //
translated: The infinite, the branch of the vidyādhara, and the result are explained.

original: sngags dang nad la mchog gzhol rnal 'byor grub //
analyzed: sngags dang nad la mchog gzhol rnal 'byor grub //
translated: The mantra, the illness, the supreme, the yoga, the accomplishment,

original: las tshogs tshar gcod rjes 'dzin rmi lam chos //
analyzed: las tshogs tshar gcod rjes 'dzin rmi lam chos //
translated: The assembly of activities, the annihilation, the protection, the dream, the Dharma,

original: rnam dag dkyil 'khor las kyi phrin las tshogs //
analyzed: rnam dag dkyil 'khor las kyi phrin las tshogs //
translated: The pure maṇḍala, the assembly of the activity, the activity,

original: dam tshig sdom pa rab rdzogs gzhung bsdus bstan //
analyzed: dam tshig sdom pa rab rdzogs gzhung bsdus bstan //
translated: The perfect pledge, the vow, and the summary are explained.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o ////
translated: From the glorious Wisdom Vajra Compendium, this is chapter thirteen.

original: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid du //
analyzed: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid du //
translated: In the heart center, the dharmacakra,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i snying po gsang ba gang //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i snying po gsang ba gang //
translated: The secret essence of the connate

original: rgyal chen sh'akya'i rigs rgyud dus ldan mchog /
analyzed: rgyal chen sh'akya'i rigs rgyud dus ldan mchog /
translated: Is the supreme time of the great king, the Śākya lineage,

original: don gyi pho brang du 'khrungs dbugs 'byin pa //
analyzed: don gyi pho brang du 'khrungs dbugs 'byin pa //
translated: Born in the palace of the meaning, the sigh of relief.

original: byang chub gleng gzhi aa kham b'ir h'um las //
analyzed: byang chub gleng gzhi aa kham b'ir h'um las //
translated: The introduction to enlightenment, from a khaṃ vaṃ hūṃ,

original: 'jig pa chu sgo yang dag thar pa'i rten //
analyzed: 'jig pa chu sgo yang dag thar pa'i rten //
translated: The place of the dissolution of the world is the basis of perfect liberation.

original: gzigs las rlung yul las 'das kun 'dar mthong //
analyzed: gzigs las rlung yul las 'das kun 'dar mthong //
translated: The place of the wind is beyond the sense of sight, and is seen as the all-trembling.

original: gshegs pa ye shes sa bon drug tu ni //
analyzed: gshegs pa ye shes sa bon drug tu ni //
translated: The place of the going of the six seeds of pristine consciousness

original: nges 'byung rang 'byung gnyis su med pa'i rten //
analyzed: nges 'byung rang 'byung gnyis su med pa'i rten //
translated: Is the basis of the nondual self-originated deliverance.

original: sngon zhing 'gog pas nges pa snying por bskul //
analyzed: sngon zhing 'gog pas nges pa snying por bskul //
translated: The former field is the essence that is impelled by the cessation of certainty.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon byed shes spyod pa //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon byed shes spyod pa //
translated: The vajra holder is the one who manifests and knows conduct.

original: 'khor lo bskor bstan snying po mchog thob pas //
analyzed: 'khor lo bskor bstan snying po mchog thob pas //
translated: The one who turns the wheel and teaches attains the supreme essence.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med par gyur //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med par gyur //
translated: He becomes the unsurpassed omniscient one.

original: de ni @399b rgyud ces mngon par byang chub lnga //
analyzed: de ni @399b rgyud ces mngon par byang chub lnga //
translated: That is the tantra, the five manifest awakenings.

original: phung po dag pa khams gsang rigs gcig nyid //
analyzed: phung po dag pa khams gsang rigs gcig nyid //
translated: The pure aggregates are the one family of the secret element.

original: gleng gzhi nges pa dbang sogs la ma rdo rje //
analyzed: gleng gzhi nges pa dbang sogs la ma rdo rje //
translated: The nidāna is the vajra of the certainty of empowerment, and so on.

original: rgyu ni spyod pa zhi drag khro tshogs 'dren //
analyzed: rgyu ni spyod pa zhi drag khro tshogs 'dren //
translated: The cause is the conduct, the leader of the assembly of peaceful and wrathful ones.

original: gleng gzhi dbye ba tshul gnyis rtogs par bya //
analyzed: gleng gzhi dbye ba tshul gnyis rtogs par bya //
translated: The nidāna should be understood in two ways.

original: yid bzhin nor bu ngo bo nyid ldan sku //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu ngo bo nyid ldan sku //
translated: The essence of the wish-fulfilling gem is the body.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o ////
translated: The glorious Jnanavajra's Compendium of Practice.

original: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lor gsung rdo rje //
analyzed: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lor gsung rdo rje //
translated: The throat chakra of enjoyment is the vajra of speech.

original: mtha' ldan drug ni glang chen stobs ldan pa //
analyzed: mtha' ldan drug ni glang chen stobs ldan pa //
translated: The six with endings are the powerful elephant.

original: brjod bya ming tshig rab byed sgra tshogs las //
analyzed: brjod bya ming tshig rab byed sgra tshogs las //
translated: From the collection of sounds of the expressions, names, and phrases,

original: zung gyur ro drug longs spyod don ldan brjod //
analyzed: zung gyur ro drug longs spyod don ldan brjod //
translated: the six pairs are expressed as the meaning of enjoyment.

original: 'gro drug gnas don nges pa rgyan du gyur //
analyzed: 'gro drug gnas don nges pa rgyan du gyur //
translated: The meaning of the abodes of the six beings is the ornament of certainty.

original: 'jig rten gnas dang 'jig rten 'das las grol //
analyzed: 'jig rten gnas dang 'jig rten 'das las grol //
translated: Liberated from worldly abodes and beyond the world,🔽the yoga of attaining vastness is like a dream,

original: yangs thob rnal 'byor rgyu 'bras rmi lam dang // mtshungs pa sgyu mar ston pa dang drang ba'i don //
analyzed: yangs thob rnal 'byor rgyu 'bras rmi lam dang // mtshungs pa sgyu mar ston pa dang drang ba'i don //
translated: the provisional meaning is taught as illusion.

original: grub mtha' rim ldan gzungs las yon tan tshogs //
analyzed: grub mtha' rim ldan gzungs las yon tan tshogs //
translated: The qualities of the tantra are from the retention of the stages of tenets.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis grol ba stong pa nyid //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis grol ba stong pa nyid //
translated: Liberated by its very nature, it is emptiness.

original: rnam par mi rtog skye med dngos rnam dag /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog skye med dngos rnam dag /
translated: Nonconceptual, unborn, and pure of substance,

original: spros bral de bzhin nyid las kun tu ston //
analyzed: spros bral de bzhin nyid las kun tu ston //
translated: it is taught from the unelaborated suchness.

original: ye shes yongs su dag pa nges pa'i don //
analyzed: ye shes yongs su dag pa nges pa'i don //
translated: The definitive meaning is the complete purity of wisdom.

original: dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blo bzlog byed //
analyzed: dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blo bzlog byed //
translated: It turns the mind away from grasping at things as having characteristics.

original: yang dag gnyis med ye shes lam ston cing //
analyzed: yang dag gnyis med ye shes lam ston cing //
translated: It teaches the path of the wisdom of the authentic nonduality.

original: dman pa zil gnon mchog don rmad gyur pa //
analyzed: dman pa zil gnon mchog don rmad gyur pa //
translated: It is the supreme meaning that outshines the inferior.

original: dgongs bshad gsang chen 'byung gnas don kun bsgrub //
analyzed: dgongs bshad gsang chen 'byung gnas don kun bsgrub //
translated: It is the meaning of the source of the great secret that explains the intention and accomplishes all purposes.

original: chos rnams 'byung ba rgya mtsho chen po las //
analyzed: chos rnams 'byung ba rgya mtsho chen po las //
translated: The source of phenomena is the great ocean.

original: thugs rje'i zhags pas 'dren pa blo gros mchog /
analyzed: thugs rje'i zhags pas 'dren pa blo gros mchog /
translated: The supreme intellect is the guide with the lasso of compassion.

original: tshig don spro bsdus byang chub gnas thob byed //
analyzed: tshig don spro bsdus byang chub gnas thob byed //
translated: The expansion and contraction of the words and meanings are the means of attaining the state of awakening.

original: yon tan dgongs pa min pa @400a *//🔽zhes brjod do //
analyzed: yon tan dgongs pa min pa @400a *// zhes brjod do //
translated: The qualities are not the intention.

original: rtsa rlung byang sems yi ge gnas dag pa //
analyzed: rtsa rlung byang sems yi ge gnas dag pa //
translated: It is said that the pure state of the nāḍīs, vāyu, and bindu,

original: ro rkyang srog rtsol drang nges khyad par gsang //
analyzed: ro rkyang srog rtsol drang nges khyad par gsang //
translated: the syllables, is the special secret of the avadhūti, the lalanā, and the rasana.

original: snying gar 'bru lnga rtsa ba 'bru lnga lhung ba dag /
analyzed: snying gar 'bru lnga rtsa ba 'bru lnga lhung ba dag /
translated: The five syllables at the heart are the five root syllables.

original: dgongs bshad drug lnga shes byed lam sbyang ba'o //🔽dgongs min a'a li gsung dbyangs yan lag gnas //
analyzed: dgongs bshad drug lnga shes byed lam sbyang ba'o // dgongs min a'a li gsung dbyangs yan lag gnas //
translated: The six and five of the explanation of the intention are the path of training in the knowable.🔽The intention is not the six and five.

original: de nyid chos rnams bdag med sgra sgrogs pa //
analyzed: de nyid chos rnams bdag med sgra sgrogs pa //
translated: The sound of the nāḍīs is the proclamation of the sound of the selflessness of phenomena.

original: a'a li k'a li drug ldan mtshan dpe ni //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li drug ldan mtshan dpe ni //
translated: The major marks and minor signs are endowed with the six aspects of the vowels and consonants.

original: ji bzhin sgra las rgyan spras bla na med //
analyzed: ji bzhin sgra las rgyan spras bla na med //
translated: The unexcelled adornment of sound is just as it is.

original: ji bzhin min sgra bcu gnas rdo rje'i dbyings //
analyzed: ji bzhin min sgra bcu gnas rdo rje'i dbyings //
translated: The ten topics of distorted sound are the vajra expanse.

original: gsang ba snying po bsdus pa brdas bshad nyid //
analyzed: gsang ba snying po bsdus pa brdas bshad nyid //
translated: The secret essence is summarized and explained through symbols.

original: thog ma bar dang mtha' mar dge ba'i chos //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang mtha' mar dge ba'i chos //
translated: The Dharma that is virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end

original: bla med mi zad rnam pa thams cad du //
analyzed: bla med mi zad rnam pa thams cad du //
translated: is unexcelled, inexhaustible, and in every way

original: rab 'byam don bsgrub rtog pa phrin las tshogs //
analyzed: rab 'byam don bsgrub rtog pa phrin las tshogs //
translated: the vast accomplishment of the meaning of the assembly of the accumulation of the activity of concepts.

original: grub steng gnas las ji bzhin sgar 'byung ston //
analyzed: grub steng gnas las ji bzhin sgar 'byung ston //
translated: The one who is established in the state of accomplishment reveals the just-as-it-is.

original: phyir mi bzlog pa bral dang mtha' las 'das //
analyzed: phyir mi bzlog pa bral dang mtha' las 'das //
translated: The irreversible one is free from the extremes.

original: khyad par brda las zab pa snying po'i don //
analyzed: khyad par brda las zab pa snying po'i don //
translated: The profound meaning of the essence is the special symbol.

original: rgyal ba'i spyod yul tha snyad las grol ba //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i spyod yul tha snyad las grol ba //
translated: The domain of the victors is free from conventions.

original: ji bzhin ma yin sgra zhes rnam par bsgrags //
analyzed: ji bzhin ma yin sgra zhes rnam par bsgrags //
translated: It is proclaimed as “distorted sound.”

original: dus gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to //
translated: The intention of another time is the expedient meaning.

original: gang zag gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang zag gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to //
translated: The intention of another person is the expedient meaning.

original: mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to //
translated: The intention of equality is the definitive meaning.

original: don gzhan la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: don gzhan la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to //
translated: The other meaning is the definitive meaning.

original: gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do //🔽bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do //
analyzed: gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do // bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do //
translated: The intention with regard to the thoughts of a person is the interpretable meaning.🔽The intention with regard to conversion is the interpretable meaning.

original: gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do //🔽gzhung la ldem por dgongs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do // gzhung la ldem por dgongs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'o //
translated: The intention with regard to the antidote is the interpretable meaning.

original: @400b mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'o //🔽dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o ////🔽lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa ni //🔽rnam par bshad pa tshul bzhin ldan pa ni //
analyzed: @400b mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'o // dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o //// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa ni // rnam par bshad pa tshul bzhin ldan pa ni //
translated: The intention with regard to the text is not the literal meaning.

original: ma nor phyin ci ma log ston pa ste //🔽'di ni rdo rje btsun mo'i chos tshal mtshungs //🔽lte ba'i 'khor lo sgra ldan yig 'bru brgyad //🔽mdo las ae bam ma y'a gsang ba nyid //
analyzed: ma nor phyin ci ma log ston pa ste //🔽'di ni rdo rje btsun mo'i chos tshal mtshungs //🔽lte ba'i 'khor lo sgra ldan yig 'bru brgyad //🔽mdo las ae bam ma y'a gsang ba nyid //
translated: The intention with regard to the characteristic is not the literal meaning.

original: rgyud spyi brda dbyibs sgra dang rgyas 'debs te //
analyzed: rgyud spyi brda dbyibs sgra dang rgyas 'debs te //
translated: The tantra is the general symbol, shape, sound, and seal.

original: kun rdzob rang gzhan bdag byin brlabs pa las //
analyzed: kun rdzob rang gzhan bdag byin brlabs pa las //
translated: From the relative, one’s own and others’ self-empowerment,

original: rmi lam sgyu lus mtshan pa bar do sbyang //
analyzed: rmi lam sgyu lus mtshan pa bar do sbyang //
translated: the dream, illusory body, and the bardo are purified.

original: sems gsum stong nyid ye shes sbas pa nyid //
analyzed: sems gsum stong nyid ye shes sbas pa nyid //
translated: The three minds are the hidden pristine consciousness of emptiness.

original: snang ba gsum las drang bzhin dag 'od gsal //
analyzed: snang ba gsum las drang bzhin dag 'od gsal //
translated: The three appearances are extracted and purified into luminosity.

original: bde ba las ni gtum mo 'bar 'dzag las //
analyzed: bde ba las ni gtum mo 'bar 'dzag las //
translated: From bliss, the blazing and dripping of caṇḍālī

original: phyi rol gnyis med gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: phyi rol gnyis med gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: is the outer nondual secret union.

original: sgyu ma'i rol pa btsun mo lta bur bstan //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rol pa btsun mo lta bur bstan //
translated: The display of illusion is taught to be like a queen.

original: dang po yi ge'i don te spyi ming tsam //
analyzed: dang po yi ge'i don te spyi ming tsam //
translated: The first is the meaning of the syllables, merely a general name.

original: smos pas a'a li k'a lis rkyen sbyar nas //
analyzed: smos pas a'a li k'a lis rkyen sbyar nas //
translated: By mentioning the vowels and consonants, the conditions are applied.

original: rnam pa du ma'i byed pa sgrar bcas pa //
analyzed: rnam pa du ma'i byed pa sgrar bcas pa //
translated: The many aspects are accompanied by sound.

original: las rnams lus dang yan lag 'brel pas mtshon //
analyzed: las rnams lus dang yan lag 'brel pas mtshon //
translated: The actions are indicated by the body and limbs.🔽The two general topics are the path of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: spyi don gnyis las mos don nyan rang dang // byang chub sems dpa'i lam mchog la dbang ste //
analyzed: spyi don gnyis las mos don nyan rang dang // byang chub sems dpa'i lam mchog la dbang ste //
translated: and the supreme path of the bodhisattvas.

original: 'jug pa rnam thar la sogs drug ldan pa //
analyzed: 'jug pa rnam thar la sogs drug ldan pa //
translated: The entry is endowed with the six, such as liberation, and so on.

original: chos rnams yongs rdzogs mkhyen bcas 'dir ston byed //
analyzed: chos rnams yongs rdzogs mkhyen bcas 'dir ston byed //
translated: And the complete knowledge of phenomena is taught here.

original: rdo rje theg pa spyi don rgyud kun gyi //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa spyi don rgyud kun gyi //
translated: The general meaning of the Vajrayāna is the view of the intent of all tantras,

original: dgongs par lta ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ston pa //
analyzed: dgongs par lta ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ston pa //
translated: The teacher of the secret is the yoga that teaches.

original: rig sngags gzung bcas gsang sngags de nyid kyi //
analyzed: rig sngags gzung bcas gsang sngags de nyid kyi //
translated: The stages of entering the assembly of the vidyā-mantras and the mantras

original: 'dus par 'jug pa'i rim pa lam gyur pa'o //🔽sbas pa'i @401a *//
analyzed: 'dus par 'jug pa'i rim pa lam gyur pa'o // sbas pa'i @401a *//
translated: Are the path that becomes the stages of the secret.

original: don las snying po gsang ba mchog /
analyzed: don las snying po gsang ba mchog /
translated: The hidden meaning is the supreme secret essence,🔽The source of the unsurpassed, like the queen,

original: bla na med pa'i 'byung gnas btsun mo dang // phyogs mtshungs phyi ltar rin chen rgyan spras bzhin //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i 'byung gnas btsun mo dang // phyogs mtshungs phyi ltar rin chen rgyan spras bzhin //
translated: And externally, like the ornaments of precious jewels.

original: spyi don gnyis kyis na bza' gos rim na //
analyzed: spyi don gnyis kyis na bza' gos rim na //
translated: The general meaning is the garments and robes,

original: sbas don gsang ba btsun mo'i lus ngag yid //
analyzed: sbas don gsang ba btsun mo'i lus ngag yid //
translated: The hidden meaning is the secret of the body, speech, and mind of the queen.

original: lus ni sgyu ma kun rdzob rmi lam ltar //
analyzed: lus ni sgyu ma kun rdzob rmi lam ltar //
translated: The body is like an illusion, relative, and dream-like.

original: ngag ni rlung sngags gnyis med sbyor ba las //
analyzed: ngag ni rlung sngags gnyis med sbyor ba las //
translated: Speech is the non-dual union of the vāyu and mantra.

original: rnam shes sems nyid snang ba gsum sbas pa //
analyzed: rnam shes sems nyid snang ba gsum sbas pa //
translated: The consciousness is the mind itself, hidden in the three appearances.

original: bde ba'i lam gyis sbas pa dga' ba bzhi //
analyzed: bde ba'i lam gyis sbas pa dga' ba bzhi //
translated: The hidden path of bliss is the four joys.

original: ye shes chen po rol pa'i gsang ba mchog /
analyzed: ye shes chen po rol pa'i gsang ba mchog /
translated: The supreme secret of the play of great wisdom

original: snying po bde chen lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: snying po bde chen lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: The essence is the innate great bliss.

original: ye shes 'byung gnas nyid ni skad cig bzhi //
analyzed: ye shes 'byung gnas nyid ni skad cig bzhi //
translated: The source of pristine awareness is the four moments.

original: mthar thug de kho na nyid 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: mthar thug de kho na nyid 'od gsal ba //
translated: The ultimate reality is the clear light.

original: de la brten pas lam myur bgrod pa ste //
analyzed: de la brten pas lam myur bgrod pa ste //
translated: By relying on that, the path is traversed quickly.

original: rang 'byung zhi gnas lhag mthong ro mnyam pa //
analyzed: rang 'byung zhi gnas lhag mthong ro mnyam pa //
translated: The self-arisen, the equal taste of calm abiding and insight,

original: zung 'jug mi 'gyur byang chub sems rdo rje //
analyzed: zung 'jug mi 'gyur byang chub sems rdo rje //
translated: Is the union, the unchanging vajra mind of enlightenment.

original: lam mthar phyin pa lhun grub ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: lam mthar phyin pa lhun grub ngo bo nyid //
translated: The culmination of the path is the spontaneously present essence itself.

original: brjod 'das rgya chen po yang de nyid do //
analyzed: brjod 'das rgya chen po yang de nyid do //
translated: It is the vastness beyond expression.

original: ae wam las ni phun tshogs lnga ldan pa //
analyzed: ae wam las ni phun tshogs lnga ldan pa //
translated: From e and vam comes the fivefold perfection.

original: dpe don gyur pa sgra dang rtags las shes //
analyzed: dpe don gyur pa sgra dang rtags las shes //
translated: It is known from the sound and the sign, the example and the meaning.

original: yi ge bzhi bcu gsang ba gleng gzhi las //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi bcu gsang ba gleng gzhi las //
translated: From the secret source of the forty letters

original: ae pam gsang ba gleng bslang mdo rgyas pa //
analyzed: ae pam gsang ba gleng bslang mdo rgyas pa //
translated: Comes the secret evam, the extensive introduction.

original: 'dzam gling gnas su dkyil 'khor snang ba bstan //
analyzed: 'dzam gling gnas su dkyil 'khor snang ba bstan //
translated: In the land of Jambudvīpa, the mandala is revealed.

original: gsang sngags dbyibs dang brda sngags don sbyar ba //
analyzed: gsang sngags dbyibs dang brda sngags don sbyar ba //
translated: The common application of the shape and sign of the mantra

original: thun mong gyur ba the tshom sel ba'o //
analyzed: thun mong gyur ba the tshom sel ba'o //
translated: Removes doubts.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o ////
translated: The glorious Jnanadarsha's Compendium of All Tantras, the sixteenth chapter.

original: smin mtshams mdzod spu'i 'khor lo mu khyud las //
analyzed: smin mtshams mdzod spu'i 'khor lo mu khyud las //
translated: From the rim of the uiiha cakra between the eyebrows,

original: rtsa yi byed pa ro rkyang thabs shes las /
analyzed: rtsa yi byed pa ro rkyang thabs shes las /
translated: the function of the nadi is the prana and apana, method and prajfia,🔽the exhalation and inhalation of the life force, the emanation and reabsorption of bodhicitta,

original: @401b srog rtsol 'byung 'jug byang sems spro bsdu dang // sgro 'dogs gcod pa phyi dang gsang ba'i tshul //
analyzed: @401b srog rtsol 'byung 'jug byang sems spro bsdu dang // sgro 'dogs gcod pa phyi dang gsang ba'i tshul //
translated: and the elimination of doubts, outer and inner.

original: rdo rje'i lus kyi gnas lugs khyad par las //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lus kyi gnas lugs khyad par las //
translated: From the special nature of the vajra body,

original: dmag dpon ral gri thogs pa lta bu ste //
analyzed: dmag dpon ral gri thogs pa lta bu ste //
translated: it is like a general with a sword.

original: tshogs slob gnyis la spyi dang rang mtshan nyid //
analyzed: tshogs slob gnyis la spyi dang rang mtshan nyid //
translated: The general and specific characteristics of the two, the accumulation and study,

original: spros dang spyod pa de nyid snang ba lam //
analyzed: spros dang spyod pa de nyid snang ba lam //
translated: are the path of the appearance of elaboration and conduct.

original: rnam shes ye shes dbang po sgo 'byed pa //
analyzed: rnam shes ye shes dbang po sgo 'byed pa //
translated: The consciousness of wisdom opens the door of the sense organ.

original: chos la rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas bstan //
analyzed: chos la rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas bstan //
translated: It is explained by means of the divisions of the dharma.

original: gang zag rigs pa dbye ba gnyis su shes //
analyzed: gang zag rigs pa dbye ba gnyis su shes //
translated: The divisions of the person are known to be two.

original: dbang gis phye ba khyad par chos la yang //
analyzed: dbang gis phye ba khyad par chos la yang //
translated: The special dharma is divided by the empowerment.

original: phyi las gzhol dang gsang ba nang gnas byed //
analyzed: phyi las gzhol dang gsang ba nang gnas byed //
translated: It is the outer activity of engaging in karma and the inner secret activity.

original: de nyid khyad par dbye ba de ni mtshon par bya //🔽'jig rten pa rnams khams gsum bsam gtan phyir ldog lam //
analyzed: de nyid khyad par dbye ba de ni mtshon par bya // 'jig rten pa rnams khams gsum bsam gtan phyir ldog lam //
translated: That itself is the division of the special ones, which is to be illustrated.

original: 'jig rten las 'das phyir mi ldog pa yang dag bstan //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das phyir mi ldog pa yang dag bstan //
translated: The mundane ones are the path of the three realms, because of the dhyanas, and the supramundane ones are the path of no return.

original: ye shes las ni bla ma'i lam rten 'don rdzogs thob //
analyzed: ye shes las ni bla ma'i lam rten 'don rdzogs thob //
translated: The path of the guru is attained from wisdom, the perfection of the path.

original: byin rlabs chu rgyun gyis ni bde chen bla med don //
analyzed: byin rlabs chu rgyun gyis ni bde chen bla med don //
translated: The meaning of the unsurpassed great bliss is accomplished by the stream of blessings.

original: rab grub bde ba dpe med ma rtogs log rtog the tshom sel //
analyzed: rab grub bde ba dpe med ma rtogs log rtog the tshom sel //
translated: The bliss that is not realized is the removal of doubts about the non-Buddhist and Buddhist paths.

original: sgro 'dogs skur 'debs bral ba dri med gsang ba grub pa can //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs skur 'debs bral ba dri med gsang ba grub pa can //
translated: The stainless secret of being free from superimposition and denial is accomplished.

original: mthar thug snying po rdzogs sangs 'bras bu lam gyur spyod pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug snying po rdzogs sangs 'bras bu lam gyur spyod pa'o //
translated: The ultimate essence is the path of the fruition of perfect buddhahood.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the seventeenth chapter of the glorious Wisdom Vajra Compendium.

original: gsang ba'i 'khor lo la brten rigs las ni //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'khor lo la brten rigs las ni //
translated: The five families of migrating beings are based on the secret chakra.

original: 'gro ba blo rigs lnga ldan dbang po ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba blo rigs lnga ldan dbang po ni //
translated: The five types of intelligence are the faculties.

original: rab dang yang rab dman pa 'bring rnams te //
analyzed: rab dang yang rab dman pa 'bring rnams te //
translated: The best, the very best, the worst, the average,

original: yan lag rlung sgo dbang po lnga spyod yul //
analyzed: yan lag rlung sgo dbang po lnga spyod yul //
translated: and the objects of the five faculties of the branches of the vāyu.

original: bdud rtsi lnga ldan de nyid blon po ste //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga ldan de nyid blon po ste //
translated: That very one endowed with the five nectars is the minister.

original: byang sems thig le bde ba'i 'byung gnas so //🔽gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo de nyid ni //
analyzed: byang sems thig le bde ba'i 'byung gnas so // gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo de nyid ni //
translated: The bindu of bodhicitta is the source of bliss.🔽That very wheel that protects the bliss of the secret

original: skal ldan blo ldan 'gro ba'i rgyud kyis bsdus //
analyzed: skal ldan blo ldan 'gro ba'i rgyud kyis bsdus //
translated: is the fortunate one, the wise one, the one who is included in the tantra of migrating beings.

original: gang zag blo rigs dpe dang sbyar ba ste //
analyzed: gang zag blo rigs dpe dang sbyar ba ste //
translated: The type of person is applied to the example.

original: @402a *// snod kyi bye brag chos mthun mtshungs pa ste //
analyzed: @402a *// snod kyi bye brag chos mthun mtshungs pa ste //
translated: The various types of vessels are similar in being concordant with the Dharma.

original: rgyud la 'jug pa'i dbang po'i rim pa ni //
analyzed: rgyud la 'jug pa'i dbang po'i rim pa ni //
translated: The stages of the faculties that enter the tantra

original: tha dad chos can blon por chos mthun pa //
analyzed: tha dad chos can blon por chos mthun pa //
translated: are the different subjects that are concordant with the minister.

original: tsandan lta bu dbang po dman pa'o //
analyzed: tsandan lta bu dbang po dman pa'o //
translated: The sandalwood type is the inferior faculty.🔽The utpala type is the average, and the white lotus type is the slightly fortunate one.

original: autpal lta bu tha mar gyur pa dang // pad dkar skal ldan 'bring gyur cung zad dang // pad dmar dbang po rab 'gyur brtson pa che //
analyzed: autpal lta bu tha mar gyur pa dang // pad dkar skal ldan 'bring gyur cung zad dang // pad dmar dbang po rab 'gyur brtson pa che //
translated: The red lotus type is the one with superior faculties who is very diligent.

original: yang rab rin chen lta bu bla na med //
analyzed: yang rab rin chen lta bu bla na med //
translated: The very best is the jewel type, the unsurpassed.

original: rtsa dang byang sems yi ge rlung dag pa //
analyzed: rtsa dang byang sems yi ge rlung dag pa //
translated: The pure nāḍīs, bodhicitta, syllables, and vāyu

original: nges pa can dang ma nges par 'byung la //
analyzed: nges pa can dang ma nges par 'byung la //
translated: are the certain and uncertain ones.

original: sbyangs pa can dang thog ma med nas kyi //
analyzed: sbyangs pa can dang thog ma med nas kyi //
translated: The one who is trained and the one who has been so from beginningless time🔽are the two types of persons.

original: rang bzhin yon tan gus pa thob gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin yon tan gus pa thob gyur pa'o //
translated: and the one who has attained the qualities of nature and respect.

original: tsandan lta bu ni nyan thos kyi rigs can /
analyzed: tsandan lta bu ni nyan thos kyi rigs can /
translated: The one like sandalwood is of the śrāvaka type.

original: autpal lta bu ni rang rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: autpal lta bu ni rang rgyal ba'o //
translated: The one like the blue lotus is the pratyekabuddha.

original: padma dkar po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: padma dkar po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The one like the white lotus is the bodhisattvas.

original: pad dpar lta bu ni gsang sngags la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: pad dpar lta bu ni gsang sngags la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The one like the lotus is the one who enters the mantra.

original: rin chen lta bu yon tan dang ldan pa ni //
analyzed: rin chen lta bu yon tan dang ldan pa ni //
translated: The one like a jewel endowed with qualities

original: dpal rdo rje 'chang gi rigs so //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje 'chang gi rigs so //
translated: is of the family of glorious Vajradhara.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the eighteenth chapter of the glorious Wisdom Vajra Compendium.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni chu zla sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni chu zla sogs pa'o //
translated: The relative truth is like the moon in water and so forth.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa nyid bco brgyad do //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa nyid bco brgyad do //
translated: The ultimate truth is the eighteen emptinesses.

original: de'i don ni rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba ltar skad cig la 'char ba'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba ltar skad cig la 'char ba'o //
translated: The meaning of that is that it arises in an instant, like the planets and stars rising in the ocean.

original: gtsug tor gnas las yon tan kun mthar phyin //
analyzed: gtsug tor gnas las yon tan kun mthar phyin //
translated: From the place of the uṣṇīṣa, all qualities are perfected.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi snying po sku gsum rdzogs //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi snying po sku gsum rdzogs //
translated: The essence of the three vajras is the perfection of the three kāyas.

original: kun 'dar byang chub sems kyis brtan gyur pa //
analyzed: kun 'dar byang chub sems kyis brtan gyur pa //
translated: All-pervading, stabilized by the bodhicitta,

original: sgro 'dogs gcod byed dmag dpon ral gri 'dzin pa'o //🔽don dam kun rdzob dbyer med rta mchog ste //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs gcod byed dmag dpon ral gri 'dzin pa'o // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med rta mchog ste //
translated: The sword-wielding general cuts through superimpositions.🔽The supreme horse is the inseparability of the ultimate and the relative.

original: dbu ma zung 'jug rab tu mi @402b gnas pa //
analyzed: dbu ma zung 'jug rab tu mi @402b gnas pa //
translated: The middle way is unity, which is completely nonabiding.

original: sku bzhi lhun grub ye shes rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: sku bzhi lhun grub ye shes rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The spontaneously present four kāyas are perfect buddhahood, the perfection of timeless awareness.

original: sbyang gzhi sbyong byed ldan par rim pa nyid //
analyzed: sbyang gzhi sbyong byed ldan par rim pa nyid //
translated: The basis of purification and the purifying processes are the stages.

original: rdo rje lus kyi rtsa gnas thams cad ni //
analyzed: rdo rje lus kyi rtsa gnas thams cad ni //
translated: All the channels and places in the vajra body

original: dbu ma la brten cha shas phra rags gang //
analyzed: dbu ma la brten cha shas phra rags gang //
translated: are based on the central channel, with their subtle and coarse parts.

original: mtshungs gyur rdo rje gsang chen gyur pa gang //
analyzed: mtshungs gyur rdo rje gsang chen gyur pa gang //
translated: The great secret vajra is the one that is the same.

original: lam gyur bden pa gnyis kyis de nyid ni //
analyzed: lam gyur bden pa gnyis kyis de nyid ni //
translated: The path is reality, which is the two truths.

original: thams cad sdud byed rim pa rab rdzogs la //
analyzed: thams cad sdud byed rim pa rab rdzogs la //
translated: The stage is the perfection of the complete inclusion of everything.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin byang chub pas //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin byang chub pas //
translated: Enlightenment is the vajralike meditative absorption.

original: thog ma bar dang mtha' ma kun tu yang //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang mtha' ma kun tu yang //
translated: In the beginning, middle, and end,

original: dus dang rnam pa thams cad rten byed pa //
analyzed: dus dang rnam pa thams cad rten byed pa //
translated: it is the support for all times and aspects.

original: khyab cing gnas med gnas ni bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: khyab cing gnas med gnas ni bsam mi khyab //
translated: It pervades and is not located, and its location is inconceivable.

original: rgyu 'bras 'gag med rten cing 'brel 'byung gi /
analyzed: rgyu 'bras 'gag med rten cing 'brel 'byung gi /
translated: It is the cause and effect that is unceasing, the dependent origination of everything.

original: sku sogs dbang phyug yon tan tshad med pa /
analyzed: sku sogs dbang phyug yon tan tshad med pa /
translated: The body and so forth, the qualities of the Lord, are immeasurable,

original: nam mkha' khyab pa yang dag zhing khams nyid //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab pa yang dag zhing khams nyid //
translated: and the pure realm is the sky.

original: zung 'jug gang du thim pa gnas gar 'jug /
analyzed: zung 'jug gang du thim pa gnas gar 'jug /
translated: Where does the union dissolve? Where does it enter?

original: gang gi ngo bo byang sems 'gyur med pa //
analyzed: gang gi ngo bo byang sems 'gyur med pa //
translated: Its essence is unchanging bodhicitta.

original: gnyis med ro mnyam gyur pa lam dang ni //
analyzed: gnyis med ro mnyam gyur pa lam dang ni //
translated: The path is the state of nondual equal taste,

original: lta la spyod pa kun tu zung 'jug pa //
analyzed: lta la spyod pa kun tu zung 'jug pa //
translated: and all view and conduct are united.

original: thogs pa med par 'byung ba'i dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: thogs pa med par 'byung ba'i dpal dang ldan //
translated: It is endowed with the glory of unobstructed arising.

original: ye shes bla med dbang phyug bcu gsum sa //
analyzed: ye shes bla med dbang phyug bcu gsum sa //
translated: The thirteen lordships of unsurpassed wisdom

original: mthar phyin skad cig byang chub dbyings ye shes //
analyzed: mthar phyin skad cig byang chub dbyings ye shes //
translated: are perfected in the instant of enlightenment, the space of the wisdom of the dhatu.

original: dbyer med byang chub chen po mgon po nyid //
analyzed: dbyer med byang chub chen po mgon po nyid //
translated: The lord himself is the great enlightenment of the indivisibility of space and wisdom.

original: bde chen mnyam nyid rang 'byung chen po'o //
analyzed: bde chen mnyam nyid rang 'byung chen po'o //
translated: It is the great equality of great bliss, the great self-arisen one.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o ////
translated: The nineteenth section of the glorious “Wisdom Vajra Compendium”

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdus so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdus so //
translated: The emptiness of the inner, the emptiness of the outer, the emptiness of the inner and outer, and the emptiness of emptiness are included in samadhi.

original: chen po stong ba nyid dang / don dam pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas ni brtson @403a *//🔽'grus kyis so //
analyzed: chen po stong ba nyid dang / don dam pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas ni brtson @403a *// 'grus kyis so //
translated: The emptiness of the great, the ultimate, the conditioned, and the unconditioned are by means of the limb of enlightenment of energy.

original: mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang / dor ba med pa ni dga' ba yang dag pas so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang / dor ba med pa ni dga' ba yang dag pas so //
translated: The transcendence of extremes, the absence of beginning and end, and the absence of rejection are by means of the limb of enlightenment of joy.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shan tu sbyangs pas so //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shan tu sbyangs pas so // rang gi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa ni /
translated: The emptiness of nature and the emptiness of all phenomena are by means of the limb of enlightenment of pliancy.

original: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gis so //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo stong pa nyid ni dran pa yang dag pas so //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gis so // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo stong pa nyid ni dran pa yang dag pas so // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The individual characteristic and the non-apprehension are by means of the limb of enlightenment of the discrimination of phenomena.🔽The emptiness of non-things and the emptiness of essence are by means of the limb of enlightenment of mindfulness.

original: btang snyoms yang dag pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: btang snyoms yang dag pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pas so //
translated: The emptiness of the essence of non-things is by means of the limb of enlightenment of equanimity.

original: skad cig ma ste chos nyid bden pa'i don to //
analyzed: skad cig ma ste chos nyid bden pa'i don to //
translated: The moment is the meaning of the truth of reality.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha said:

original: mgon po byams pa la cung zad cig bzhengs la bzod par gsol nas /
analyzed: mgon po byams pa la cung zad cig bzhengs la bzod par gsol nas /
translated: “Protector, Maitreya, please rise a little and request forbearance.

original: bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
translated: Then request the Bhagavān.

original: bdag zab don cung zad cig zhubs //🔽skabs dbye bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bdag zab don cung zad cig zhubs // skabs dbye bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: I will request the profound meaning a little.🔽Please grant permission.”

original: de'i dus la bab par shes na ci rigs par zhus shig /
analyzed: de'i dus la bab par shes na ci rigs par zhus shig /
translated: The Bhagavān said, “If you know the time has come, request as is appropriate.

original: ngas legs par bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ngas legs par bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: I will teach well.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha said:

original: gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di yi //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di yi //
translated: “In this tantra of the great secret,

original: dgongs pa zab cing rgya che bas //
analyzed: dgongs pa zab cing rgya che bas //
translated: the intention is profound and vast.

original: gting dpag dka' bar gyur pas na //
analyzed: gting dpag dka' bar gyur pas na //
translated: Since it is difficult to fathom the depths,

original: zab don snying po gsung du gsol //
analyzed: zab don snying po gsung du gsol //
translated: please teach the essence of the profound meaning.”

original: zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal /🔽nam mkha'i snying po shin tu legs //
analyzed: zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal / nam mkha'i snying po shin tu legs //
translated: He requested, and the Bhagavān said,🔽“Ākāśagarbha, that is excellent.

original: gsang chen de nyid gong @403b 'og tu //
analyzed: gsang chen de nyid gong @403b 'og tu //
translated: In the higher and lower great secret

original: snga phyi'i rim pa'i khyad par kun //
analyzed: snga phyi'i rim pa'i khyad par kun //
translated: All the differences in the sequence of earlier and later [teachings],

original: bshad kyis gus pas legs par zung //
analyzed: bshad kyis gus pas legs par zung //
translated: I will explain, so listen well with respect!

original: gsang pa'i de nyid bla na med //
analyzed: gsang pa'i de nyid bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed, secret thatness,

original: rgya 'bras  che ba //
analyzed: rgya 'bras  che ba //
translated: the great fruit of the seal,

original: thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa'i rgyud //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa'i rgyud //
translated: the tantra of the union of method and wisdom,

original: zung 'jug ba de chen bstan par bya //
analyzed: zung 'jug ba de chen bstan par bya //
translated: the union, I will teach the Great Perfection.

original: thog ma par dang mthar dge ba //
analyzed: thog ma par dang mthar dge ba //
translated: Virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end,

original: byang chub sems mchog bstan pa nyid //
analyzed: byang chub sems mchog bstan pa nyid //
translated: is the teaching of the supreme mind of enlightenment.🔽The basis, the difference of the entity,

original: gzhi dang dngos po'i khyad par dang // lam byed nus pa phrin las sogs //
analyzed: gzhi dang dngos po'i khyad par dang // lam byed nus pa phrin las sogs //
translated: the path, the ability, the activity, and so forth,

original: 'byung gnas ye shes bstan pa la //
analyzed: 'byung gnas ye shes bstan pa la //
translated: in the teaching of the source, wisdom,

original: smon pa dang ni 'jug sems bskyed //
analyzed: smon pa dang ni 'jug sems bskyed //
translated: the aspiration and engaged minds are generated.

original: don dam bstan pa'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: don dam bstan pa'i byang chub sems //
translated: The mind of enlightenment taught in the ultimate

original: yang dag don gyi sems bskyed pa //
analyzed: yang dag don gyi sems bskyed pa //
translated: is the generation of the mind of the perfect meaning.

original: kun tu bzang po'i ting 'dzin las //
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i ting 'dzin las //
translated: From the samādhi of Samantabhadra,

original: spyi por padma zla nyi la //
analyzed: spyi por padma zla nyi la //
translated: on the crown, in a lotus, moon, and sun,

original: 'khor lo aom dkar 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: 'khor lo aom dkar 'od 'phro ba //
translated: is a white wheel with an oṃ radiating light.

original: mgrin par pad dmar a'a:'od 'bar //🔽thugs kar zla ba rdo rje ni //
analyzed: mgrin par pad dmar a'a:'od 'bar // thugs kar zla ba rdo rje ni //
translated: In the throat, in a red lotus, is an āḥ blazing with light.

original: dkar po rtse lnga 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: dkar po rtse lnga 'od 'phro ba //
translated: In the heart, on a moon, is a white five-pronged vajra radiating light.

original: dngul chu'i mdog 'dra'i h'um ye shes //
analyzed: dngul chu'i mdog 'dra'i h'um ye shes //
translated: The syllable hūṃ, the color of mercury, is gnosis.

original: kun rdzob don dam byang chub sems //
analyzed: kun rdzob don dam byang chub sems //
translated: Relative and ultimate awakening minds

original: de nyid ting 'dzin gnas par bya //🔽dpral bar rin chen sa yig ser //
analyzed: de nyid ting 'dzin gnas par bya // dpral bar rin chen sa yig ser //
translated: are present in meditative absorption.🔽On the forehead is the yellow syllable sa, a jewel,

original: lte bar ral gri ha ljang ba //
analyzed: lte bar ral gri ha ljang ba //
translated: and at the navel is the green sword syllable ha.

original: 'od 'phro ye shes lnga bdag nyid //
analyzed: 'od 'phro ye shes lnga bdag nyid //
translated: Light radiates, the nature of the five gnoses.

original: 'od 'gyed 'gro ba sbyangs pa las //
analyzed: 'od 'gyed 'gro ba sbyangs pa las //
translated: Light emanates, refining migrators.

original: slar 'dus rigs kyi bdag po ni //
analyzed: slar 'dus rigs kyi bdag po ni //
translated: It reabsorbs, and the lord of the family

original: rdo rje beed'urya yi 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje beed'urya yi 'od //
translated: is a vajra, the color of beryl.

original: thugs kar rdo rje la thim pas //
analyzed: thugs kar rdo rje la thim pas //
translated: It dissolves into the vajra at the heart.

original: khro bo'i rdo rje kha gyes pas //🔽'dus pa rdo rje 'chang ngo bo //
analyzed: khro bo'i rdo rje kha gyes pas // 'dus pa rdo rje 'chang ngo bo //
translated: The wrathful vajra opens,🔽and the essence of Vajradhara is gathered.

original: byang chub sems kyi rdo rje nyid //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rdo rje nyid //
translated: The vajra of awakening mind

original: gnyis med bde ba chen por gnas //
analyzed: gnyis med bde ba chen por gnas //
translated: is present in nondual great bliss.

original: rtogs pa brjod pas bstan par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtogs pa brjod pas bstan par 'gyur //
translated: This is taught in the stories of realization.

original: rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gnas pa ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gnas pa ni //
translated: Those who abide in the yoga of meditative absorption

original: 'jig rten lam la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten lam la gnas pa ste //
translated: are on the path of the mundane.

original: phyi la mchog tu gzhol bas ni //
analyzed: phyi la mchog tu gzhol bas ni //
translated: Those who are dedicated to the supreme

original: 'jig rten chos brgyad rtog pa 'dab //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos brgyad rtog pa 'dab //
translated: are free of the concepts of the eight worldly values.

original: ma spangs lha yi dmigs pa las //
analyzed: ma spangs lha yi dmigs pa las //
translated: Without abandoning the deity’s form,

original: phra mo rlung la bslab @404a *//
analyzed: phra mo rlung la bslab @404a *//
translated: The training in the subtle energy of the vāyu

original: pa dang // rags pa thig le bsgom pas ni //
analyzed: pa dang // rags pa thig le bsgom pas ni //
translated: and the meditation on the coarse bindu

original: las chen thun mong dngos grub la //
analyzed: las chen thun mong dngos grub la //
translated: are for the sake of the common siddhi of the great activities.

original: dmigs phyir gnas skabs 'bras bu thob //🔽rim gnyis ldan pa'i ting 'dzin las //
analyzed: dmigs phyir gnas skabs 'bras bu thob // rim gnyis ldan pa'i ting 'dzin las //
translated: The temporary result is obtained.🔽The path of the yoga of the family of emanation and gathering

original: sbro bsdu rigs kyi rnal 'byor lam //
analyzed: sbro bsdu rigs kyi rnal 'byor lam //
translated: is the samādhi endowed with the two stages.

original: sa bon thig le'i de nyid las //
analyzed: sa bon thig le'i de nyid las //
translated: The essence of the bindu of the seed syllable

original: ngo bo ye shes bde chen 'grub //
analyzed: ngo bo ye shes bde chen 'grub //
translated: is the accomplishment of the great bliss of gnosis.

original: mchog gyur nang don mngon du bya //
analyzed: mchog gyur nang don mngon du bya //
translated: The supreme inner meaning is actualized.🔽The maṇḍala of the arrayed deities,

original: rnam par bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // byang chub sems dang lus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: rnam par bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // byang chub sems dang lus gnas pa'i //
translated: the maṇḍala of bodhicitta abiding in the body,

original: dkyil 'khor bde chen 'byung gnas nyid //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bde chen 'byung gnas nyid //
translated: and the maṇḍala of the source of great bliss

original: sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa //
translated: are the supreme maṇḍala of the mind.🔽The maṇḍalas of the vase, secret, wisdom,

original: bum pa gsang ba shes rab dang // de nyid snying po'i dkyil 'khor te; ;ye shes mchog t'a dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bum pa gsang ba shes rab dang // de nyid snying po'i dkyil 'khor te; ;ye shes mchog t'a dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: and the essential nature are the empowerment conferral of the supreme gnosis.

original: gsang ba'i de khon nyid ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub pa lhan cig skyes pa /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de khon nyid ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub pa lhan cig skyes pa /
translated: The maṇḍala of the gnosis of the secret tattva is the great maṇḍala of the spontaneously present, coemergent great bliss.

original: skal ba dang ldan pa rnams las /
analyzed: skal ba dang ldan pa rnams las /
translated: For the fortunate ones,

original: tshad med pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes kyi dbang rdo rjes thogs pa med par kun tu dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes kyi dbang rdo rjes thogs pa med par kun tu dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: the immeasurable empowerment of ultimate pristine consciousness is bestowed with the unimpeded vajra.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the twentieth chapter of the glorious Tantra of the Esoteric Vajra, the chapter on empowerment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa yi //
translated: The deeds of the tathāgatas

original: chos don de nyid bla na med //
analyzed: chos don de nyid bla na med //
translated: are the unsurpassed meaning of the Dharma.

original: spyod pa'i gsar ba mngon du byung //
analyzed: spyod pa'i gsar ba mngon du byung //
translated: The new conduct is actualized

original: khyad par snod ldan rtogs gyur pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par snod ldan rtogs gyur pa'o //
translated: and the special vessel is realized.🔽The pure place and the assembly of retinue

original: dag pa'i gnas dang 'khor 'dus la //
analyzed: dag pa'i gnas dang 'khor 'dus la //
translated: are gathered.

original: ci phyir tshig ni 'di lta bu //
analyzed: ci phyir tshig ni 'di lta bu //
translated: Why are the words like this?

original: rigs pa ma yin ces pa'i don //
analyzed: rigs pa ma yin ces pa'i don //
translated: The meaning of “not reasonable”

original: the tshom gnas su gyur pa las //
analyzed: the tshom gnas su gyur pa las //
translated: is a place of doubt.🔽Those who are outside, those who are common,

original: phyi rol gyur dang thun mong dang // ji bzhin sgra @404b dang ma yin dang // bstan la rang dgar 'jug pa can //
analyzed: phyi rol gyur dang thun mong dang // ji bzhin sgra @404b dang ma yin dang // bstan la rang dgar 'jug pa can //
translated: those who engage in the literal meaning, those who are not, and those who engage in the teachings on their own

original: yin nam snyam du rtog pa la //
analyzed: yin nam snyam du rtog pa la //
translated: think, “Is it so?”

original: bzlog pa de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
analyzed: bzlog pa de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
translated: The tathāgatas reverse

original: phyin ci log tu gyur las bzlog /
analyzed: phyin ci log tu gyur las bzlog /
translated: that which has become distorted.

original: lan gsungs sgro 'dogs bcad pa'o //
analyzed: lan gsungs sgro 'dogs bcad pa'o //
translated: The reply is given, and misconceptions are eliminated.

original: sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa //
analyzed: sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa //
translated: The focus on mind is the meaning of selflessness.

original: rnam par dben don bstan pa las //
analyzed: rnam par dben don bstan pa las //
translated: The meaning of emptiness is taught.🔽The secret is the stages of awakening,

original: gsang ba byang chub rim gyis dang // cig car rim pa nyer bstan pa; ;de nyid lam du mngon par 'byung //
analyzed: gsang ba byang chub rim gyis dang // cig car rim pa nyer bstan pa; ;de nyid lam du mngon par 'byung //
translated: and the instantaneous path is fully revealed.

original: spyod dang grol ba bla med pa //
analyzed: spyod dang grol ba bla med pa //
translated: The conduct and liberation are unsurpassed.

original: sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul don du //
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul don du //
translated: For the sake of taming with various methods,

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i spyod pa spyod //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i spyod pa spyod //
translated: one engages in conduct that is like an illusion.

original: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin pa'i //
analyzed: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin pa'i //
translated: Upholding the supreme yogic discipline,

original: kun 'gro kun la dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: kun 'gro kun la dbang bskur ba //
translated: one is empowered in all-pervasiveness and all-pervadingness.

original: mi 'jigs dgra las rgyal ba ste //
analyzed: mi 'jigs dgra las rgyal ba ste //
translated: Fearless, one conquers enemies.

original: rig pa brtul zhugs sbyod bya ba //
analyzed: rig pa brtul zhugs sbyod bya ba //
translated: One engages in the conduct of awareness and discipline.

original: kun bzang mgon po kun spyod do //
analyzed: kun bzang mgon po kun spyod do //
translated: One engages in the conduct of the protector Samantabhadra.🔽In equipoise and post-equipoise, one takes the conceptual and nonconceptual conduct

original: spros pa'i spyod pas mnyam gzhag dang // rjes thob gnyis med lam du blang //
analyzed: spros pa'i spyod pas mnyam gzhag dang // rjes thob gnyis med lam du blang //
translated: onto the path.

original: phyogs las rnam rgyal spyod thob nas //
analyzed: phyogs las rnam rgyal spyod thob nas //
translated: Having attained the conduct of total victory,

original: ye shes chen po'i spyod bya ba //
analyzed: ye shes chen po'i spyod bya ba //
translated: one engages in the conduct of great wisdom.

original: zung 'jug bde chen ro mnyam las //
analyzed: zung 'jug bde chen ro mnyam las //
translated: From the equal taste of the great bliss of unity,

original: mthar thug sbang blang med par grol //
analyzed: mthar thug sbang blang med par grol //
translated: one is ultimately liberated without accepting or rejecting.

original: aa ba dh'u t'i'i spyod pa las //🔽spros bcas spros med dag dang ni //
analyzed: aa ba dh'u t'i'i spyod pa las // spros bcas spros med dag dang ni //
translated: In the conduct of the avadhūti,🔽one engages in the conduct that is elaborate, unelaborate,

original: shin tu spros med sbyod pa spyod //
analyzed: shin tu spros med sbyod pa spyod //
translated: and very unelaborate.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
translated: The twenty-first chapter of the glorious Wisdom Vajra Compendium.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bla med pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bla med pa //
translated: The unsurpassed of all buddhas

original: gsang ba byang chub sems @405a *//
analyzed: gsang ba byang chub sems @405a *//
translated: is the secret empowerment of bodhicitta.🔽The empowerments are given according to the faculties of those who are superior,

original: dbang bskur // dbang po rab dang yang rab dang // 'bring gyur mos pa'i dbang byas pas //
analyzed: dbang bskur // dbang po rab dang yang rab dang // 'bring gyur mos pa'i dbang byas pas //
translated: very superior, and middling, and according to their interest.

original: thams cad mos spyod lam mtshon pa /
analyzed: thams cad mos spyod lam mtshon pa /
translated: All of them are illustrated by the conduct of interest.

original: gsang chen mchog gi don las ni //
analyzed: gsang chen mchog gi don las ni //
translated: The meaning of the supreme secret

original: ye shes lam bstan de nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes lam bstan de nyid do //
translated: is the path of wisdom that is taught.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po tshad gyur pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po tshad gyur pa //
translated: The great maṇḍala is the measure

original: ye shes tshad med ri rab ste //
analyzed: ye shes tshad med ri rab ste //
translated: of the wisdom that is immeasurable, the king of mountains.🔽The object of the unsurpassed is taught here:

original: spyod yul bla med 'dir bstan pa; ;mchod pa'i rol pa lha mo ste //
analyzed: spyod yul bla med 'dir bstan pa; ;mchod pa'i rol pa lha mo ste //
translated: the goddess of the display of offerings

original: padma sna tshogs bde bas mchod //
analyzed: padma sna tshogs bde bas mchod //
translated: is the various lotuses that are offered with bliss.

original: phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba kun //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba kun //
translated: All the victors of the three times and ten directions🔽rely on the Great Vehicle of the secret

original: gsang chen theg pa la brten nas //
analyzed: gsang chen theg pa la brten nas //
translated: mantra.

original: rdo rje ye shes ting 'dzin brnyes //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes ting 'dzin brnyes //
translated: You have attained the vajra wisdom samadhi.

original: rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bor ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bor ni //
translated: You have become the essence of Vajradhara,

original: bde chen mnyam pa nyid gyur pas //
analyzed: bde chen mnyam pa nyid gyur pas //
translated: The equality of great bliss.

original: mi phyed ye shes mngon sangs rgyas //
analyzed: mi phyed ye shes mngon sangs rgyas //
translated: You have manifestly become enlightened with indivisible wisdom.

original: rigs ldan mchod pa bla na med pa ste //
analyzed: rigs ldan mchod pa bla na med pa ste //
translated: The offering of the one of the family is unsurpassed.

original: dran pa gcig pa nas ni lus dben par //
analyzed: dran pa gcig pa nas ni lus dben par //
translated: From the single mindfulness, the body is isolated.

original: rags pa'i ting 'dzin slob dus mnyam rjes las //🔽yul lnga gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs //
analyzed: rags pa'i ting 'dzin slob dus mnyam rjes las // yul lnga gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs //
translated: In the time of training in the coarse samadhi, in the post-equipoise state,🔽The five objects are Vajra Body, etc.

original: sa yi snying po la sogs dbang po lnga //
analyzed: sa yi snying po la sogs dbang po lnga //
translated: The five sense organs are Kshitigarbha, etc.

original: yab yum lhar brten slob pa spyod pa ste //
analyzed: yab yum lhar brten slob pa spyod pa ste //
translated: The training conduct is to rely on the father and mother as deities.

original: gzung 'dzin ma spangs spros pa ldan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin ma spangs spros pa ldan pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of not abandoning the apprehended and the apprehender, and having elaborations,

original: spros bcas spyod pa zhes ni grags pa'o //
analyzed: spros bcas spyod pa zhes ni grags pa'o //
translated: It is known as the conduct with elaborations.

original: mchod yul rigs lnga rnam snang la sogs pa //
analyzed: mchod yul rigs lnga rnam snang la sogs pa //
translated: The five families of the objects of offering are Vairochana, etc.

original: mchod rdzas yul lnga lha dang lha mor snang //
analyzed: mchod rdzas yul lnga lha dang lha mor snang //
translated: The offering substances are the five objects appearing as male and female deities.

original: mchod byed spros bcas spyod pa lag nas pa //
analyzed: mchod byed spros bcas spyod pa lag nas pa //
translated: The one who makes the offerings is the one with elaborations.

original: mchod thabs so sor rigs kyis mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mchod thabs so sor rigs kyis mchod pa'o //
translated: The method of offering is to make offerings with each family.

original: rten slob spros med ngag dben sems dben ldan //
analyzed: rten slob spros med ngag dben sems dben ldan //
translated: The support is the one with training. The one without elaborations has the mind isolation of speech isolation.

original: @405b bdag byin brlabs pas ting 'dzin phra ba sa //🔽slob ma mnyam rjes thabs dang shes rab dag /
analyzed: @405b bdag byin brlabs pas ting 'dzin phra ba sa // slob ma mnyam rjes thabs dang shes rab dag /
translated: The consecration of oneself is the training in subtle meditative absorption.

original: gnyis med rten pa'i lus sems brten slob pa //
analyzed: gnyis med rten pa'i lus sems brten slob pa //
translated: The training in the support is the training in the union of equipoise and post-equipoise, method and wisdom, and nonduality.

original: mchod bya rigs kyi bdag po lnga sogs so //
analyzed: mchod bya rigs kyi bdag po lnga sogs so //
translated: The objects of offering are the five lords of the buddha families and so forth.

original: mchod dngos rnam gsum khyad par dag tu ro //
analyzed: mchod dngos rnam gsum khyad par dag tu ro //
translated: The actual offering is the three kinds of offerings, and in particular, the enjoyment.

original: mchod byed rnal 'byor gyis ni thabs bcas mchod //🔽rten slob shin tu spros med 'od gsal nas //
analyzed: mchod byed rnal 'byor gyis ni thabs bcas mchod // rten slob shin tu spros med 'od gsal nas //
translated: The one who offers is the yogin, who makes the offering with method.

original: sgyu lus dag pa'i bar du ting 'dzin ni //
analyzed: sgyu lus dag pa'i bar du ting 'dzin ni //
translated: The training in the support is the training in the very unelaborate [offering] from the luminosity of the completion stage up to the pure illusory body.

original: shin tu phra ba slob pa mnyam rjes la //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba slob pa mnyam rjes la //
translated: The meditative absorption is the training in the subtle from the union of equipoise and post-equipoise.

original: bsams pas thabs dang shes rab dbang po dang // yul lnga gnyis med rang bzhin med par bslab //🔽spros pa rnam par byed pa de yi phyir //
analyzed: bsams pas thabs dang shes rab dbang po dang // yul lnga gnyis med rang bzhin med par bslab // spros pa rnam par byed pa de yi phyir //
translated: The training in the thought is the training in method and wisdom, the five faculties, and the nonduality of the object and subject, which are without inherent nature.

original: shin tu sbros med de la bye brag tu //
analyzed: shin tu sbros med de la bye brag tu //
translated: Because of that, the very unelaborate [offering] is distinguished.

original: mchod bya'i yul ni ye shes sku 'byung ba //
analyzed: mchod bya'i yul ni ye shes sku 'byung ba //
translated: The object of offering is the arising of the wisdom body.

original: mchod byed gang zag sgyu mar gnas pas so //
analyzed: mchod byed gang zag sgyu mar gnas pas so //
translated: The person who offers is the one who abides in the illusion.

original: don ni snang gsum sgyu mar ldan pa las //
analyzed: don ni snang gsum sgyu mar ldan pa las //
translated: The meaning is the three appearances endowed with illusion.

original: mchod dngos sgyu ma'i 'dod yon nyid yin no //
analyzed: mchod dngos sgyu ma'i 'dod yon nyid yin no //
translated: The actual offering is the illusory sense objects themselves.

original: mchod pa'i thabs ni bsam gtan gnyis kyis ni //
analyzed: mchod pa'i thabs ni bsam gtan gnyis kyis ni //
translated: The method of offering is the two meditative absorptions

original: 'od gsal dang du thim pa de nyid do //
analyzed: 'od gsal dang du thim pa de nyid do //
translated: dissolving into lucid clarity.

original: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the twenty-second chapter, on the perfection of wisdom, in the Ornament of Vajra Essence Tantra.

original: rjes su mdor bstan drug gis ni //
analyzed: rjes su mdor bstan drug gis ni //
translated: The six brief topics that follow🔽are the three isolations, illusory body,

original: dben pa gsum dang sgyu lus dang // 'od gsal sngon 'gro rgyu dag las //
analyzed: dben pa gsum dang sgyu lus dang // 'od gsal sngon 'gro rgyu dag las //
translated: and lucid clarity, the preliminaries, and the cause.🔽The conduct of meditative absorption

original: ting 'dzin las spyod des spyod pa'i //
analyzed: ting 'dzin las spyod des spyod pa'i //
translated: is the conduct of one who practices

original: snyoms 'jug rim pa gnyis ldan pas //
analyzed: snyoms 'jug rim pa gnyis ldan pas //
translated: with the two stages of meditative absorption.

original: dag pa'i sgyu lus rdzogs rim gyi //
analyzed: dag pa'i sgyu lus rdzogs rim gyi //
translated: The pure illusory body is the completion stage.

original: rigs lnga'i gsang ba'i spyod pa las //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i gsang ba'i spyod pa las //
translated: The secret conduct of the five families🔽is the conduct of the one who is training.

original: slob bzhin zung 'jug ye shes @406a *//🔽'thob / ;bskyed rim pas ni mkha' gsang dag /
analyzed: slob bzhin zung 'jug ye shes @406a *// 'thob / ;bskyed rim pas ni mkha' gsang dag /
translated: The pristine consciousness of union is attained.🔽The one on the generation stage practices the conduct

original: byin brlabs snyoms zhugs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: byin brlabs snyoms zhugs spyod pa'o //
translated: of consecration and union in the space and the secret place.

original: rjes su dran pa bcu drug gis //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa bcu drug gis //
translated: The sixteen recollections

original: lam dang spyod pa bstan pa las //
analyzed: lam dang spyod pa bstan pa las //
translated: are taught as the path and the conduct.

original: dag pa'i sgyu mal gnas nas //
analyzed: dag pa'i sgyu mal gnas nas //
translated: From abiding in the pure illusory body,🔽the conduct of the five families is practiced.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
translated: The samadhi of the absence of signs

original: rigs lnga'i dang po'i sbyor ba bstan //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i dang po'i sbyor ba bstan //
translated: Is taught as the first yoga of the five families.

original: sangs rgyas rjes dran la sogs ldas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes dran la sogs ldas //
translated: The recollection of the Buddha and so forth

original: sgyu dag 'od gsal lugs bzlog las //
analyzed: sgyu dag 'od gsal lugs bzlog las //
translated: Are the reverse process of the luminosity of the illusions.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching of the completion stage.

original: snang gsum dang las longs sku ni //
analyzed: snang gsum dang las longs sku ni //
translated: The three appearances and the saṃbhogakāya

original: rdo rje 'chang du gnas pa las //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang du gnas pa las //
translated: Abide as Vajradhara.

original: yab yum bde ba'i ngang las ni //🔽rnam snang mdzad kyi spro bsdu yis //
analyzed: yab yum bde ba'i ngang las ni // rnam snang mdzad kyi spro bsdu yis //
translated: From the state of bliss of the father and mother,🔽Through the emanation and re-absorption of Vairocana,

original: sprul sku'i spros nas bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: sprul sku'i spros nas bsdu bar bya //
translated: The emanation of the nirmāṇakāya is emanated and re-absorbed.

original: rjes dran drug pas lce chung gi /🔽dud rtsi 'bab byed bcud len bstan //
analyzed: rjes dran drug pas lce chung gi / dud rtsi 'bab byed bcud len bstan //
translated: The sixth recollection is the nectar🔽That flows from the uvula.

original: bdun pas bdag nyid yab yum ldan //
analyzed: bdun pas bdag nyid yab yum ldan //
translated: The seventh is the self-empowerment of the father and mother.
